17 #include "Context.h"

19 using namespace helios;

21 Context::Context(void){
22 
23  //---- ALL DEFAULT VALUES ARE SET HERE ----//
24 
25  iscontextinitialized=1;
26 
27  sim_date = make_Date(1,6,2000);
28 
29  sim_time = make_Time(12,0);
30 
31  // --- Initialize random number generator ---- //
32 
33  unsigned seed = std::chrono::system_clock::now().time_since_epoch().count();
34  generator.seed(seed);
35 
36  // --- Set Geometry as `Clean' --- //
37 
38  isgeometrydirty = false;
39 
40  currentUUID = 0;
41 
42  currentObjectID = 1; //object ID of 0 is reserved for default object
43 
44 }
45 
46 int Context::selfTest(void){
47 
48  std::cout << "Running Context self-test..." << std::flush;
49 
50  Context context_test;
51 
52  uint error_count=0;
53 
54  double errtol = 1e-7;
55 
56  std::string answer;
57 
58  //------- Add Patch --------//
59 
60  vec3 center,center_r;
61  vec2 size, size_r;
62  std::vector<vec3> vertices, vertices_r;
63  SphericalCoord rotation, rotation_r;
64  vec3 normal, normal_r;
65  RGBcolor color, color_r;
66  uint UUID;
67  std::vector<uint> UUIDs;
68  PrimitiveType type;
69  float area_r;
70  Primitive* prim;
71  uint objID;
72 
73  //uint addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size );
74  center = make_vec3(1,2,3);
75  size = make_vec2(1,2);
76  vertices.resize(4);
77  vertices.at(0) = center + make_vec3( -0.5f*size.x, -0.5f*size.y, 0.f);
78  vertices.at(1) = center + make_vec3( 0.5f*size.x, -0.5f*size.y, 0.f);
79  vertices.at(2) = center + make_vec3( 0.5f*size.x, 0.5f*size.y, 0.f);
80  vertices.at(3) = center + make_vec3( -0.5f*size.x, 0.5f*size.y, 0.f);
81  UUID = context_test.addPatch(center,size);
82  prim = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID);
83  type = prim->getType();
84  center_r = context_test.getPatchPointer(UUID)->getCenter();
85  size_r = context_test.getPatchPointer(UUID)->getSize();
86  normal_r = prim->getNormal();
87  vertices_r = prim->getVertices();
88  area_r = prim->getArea();
89  color_r = prim->getColor();
90 
91  if( type!=PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
92  error_count++;
93  std::cerr << "failed: uint addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ). Patch::getType did not return `PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH'." << std::endl;
94  }
95  if( center_r.x!=center.x || center_r.y!=center.y || center_r.z!=center.z ){
96  std::cerr << "failed: uint addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ). Patch::getCenter returned incorrect value." << std::endl;
97  }
98  if( size_r.x!=size.x || size_r.y!=size.y ){
99  error_count++;
100  std::cerr << "failed: uint addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ). Patch::getSize returned incorrect value." << std::endl;
101  }
102  if( normal_r.x!=0.f || normal_r.y!=0.f || normal_r.z!=1.f ){
103  error_count++;
104  std::cerr << "failed: uint addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ). Patch::getNormal did not return correct value." << std::endl;
105  }
106  if( vertices.at(0).x!=vertices_r.at(0).x || vertices.at(0).y!=vertices_r.at(0).y || vertices.at(0).z!=vertices_r.at(0).z ||
107  vertices.at(1).x!=vertices_r.at(1).x || vertices.at(1).y!=vertices_r.at(1).y || vertices.at(1).z!=vertices_r.at(1).z ||
108  vertices.at(2).x!=vertices_r.at(2).x || vertices.at(2).y!=vertices_r.at(2).y || vertices.at(2).z!=vertices_r.at(2).z ||
109  vertices.at(3).x!=vertices_r.at(3).x || vertices.at(3).y!=vertices_r.at(3).y || vertices.at(3).z!=vertices_r.at(3).z ){
110  error_count++;
111  std::cerr << "failed: uint addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ). Patch::getVertices did not return correct value." << std::endl;
112  }
113  if( fabs( area_r - size.x*size.y )>1e-5 ){
114  error_count++;
115  std::cerr << "failed: uint addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ). Patch::getArea did not return correct value." << std::endl;
116  }
117  if( color_r.r!=0.f || color_r.g!=0.f || color_r.b!=0.f ){
118  error_count++;
119  std::cerr << "failed: uint addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ). Patch::getColor did not return default color of black." << std::endl;
120  }
121 
122  if( prim->hasTexture() ){
123  error_count++;
124  std::cerr << "failed: Patch without texture mapping returned true for texture map test." << std::endl;
125  }
126 
127  //------- Copy Patch --------//
128 
129  std::vector<float> cpdata;
130  cpdata.push_back(5.2);
131  cpdata.push_back(2.5);
132  cpdata.push_back(3.1);
133 
134  context_test.setPrimitiveData( UUID, "somedata", HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT, cpdata.size(), &cpdata[0] );
135 
136  uint UUID_cpy = context_test.copyPrimitive(UUID);
137 
138  vec3 center_cpy = context_test.getPatchPointer(UUID_cpy)->getCenter();
139  vec2 size_cpy = context_test.getPatchPointer(UUID_cpy)->getSize();
140 
141  if( UUID_cpy != 1 ){
142  error_count++;
143  std::cerr << "failed: copyPrimitive. Copied patch does not have the correct UUID." << std::endl;
144  }
145  if( center_cpy.x!=center.x || center_cpy.y!=center.y || center_cpy.z!=center.z ){
146  error_count++;
147  std::cerr << "failed: copyPrimitive. Copied patch did not return correct center coordinates." << std::endl;
148  }
149  if( size_cpy.x!=size.x || size_cpy.y!=size.y ){
150  error_count++;
151  std::cerr << "failed: copyPrimitive. Copied patch did not return correct size." << std::endl;
152  }
153 
154  std::vector<float> cpdata_copy;
155  context_test.getPrimitiveData( UUID_cpy, "somedata", cpdata_copy );
156 
157  if( cpdata.size() != cpdata_copy.size() ){
158  error_count++;
159  std::cerr << "failed: copyPrimitive. Copied patch primitive data does not have correct size." << std::endl;
160  }
161  for( int i=0; i<cpdata.size(); i++ ){
162  if( cpdata.at(i) != cpdata_copy.at(i) ){
163  error_count++;
164  std::cerr << "failed: copyPrimitive. Copied patch primitive data does not match." << std::endl;
165  }
166  break;
167  }
168 
169  //translate the copied patch
170  vec3 shift = make_vec3(5,4,3);
171  context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID_cpy)->translate(shift);
172  center_cpy = context_test.getPatchPointer(UUID_cpy)->getCenter();
173  center_r = context_test.getPatchPointer(UUID)->getCenter();
174 
175  if( fabs(center_cpy.x-center.x-shift.x)>errtol || fabs(center_cpy.y-center.y-shift.y)>errtol || fabs(center_cpy.z-center.z-shift.z)>errtol || center_r.x!=center.x || center_r.y!=center.y || center_r.z!=center.z ){
176  error_count++;
177  std::cerr << "failed: copyPrimitive. Copied patch could not be properly translated." << std::endl;
178  }
179 
180  //------- Delete Patch --------//
181 
182  context_test.deletePrimitive(UUID);
183 
184  if( context_test.getPrimitiveCount()!= 1 ){
185  error_count++;
186  std::cerr << "failed: deletePrimitive. Patch not properly deleted based on primitive count." << std::endl;
187  }
188  if( context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) ){
189  error_count++;
190  std::cerr << "failed: deletePrimitive. Patch not properly deleted." << std::endl;
191  }
192 
193  UUID = UUID_cpy;
194 
195  //------- Add a Rotated Patch --------//
196 
197  center = make_vec3(1,2,3);
198  size = make_vec2(1,2);
199  rotation.elevation = 0.15*M_PI;
200  rotation.azimuth = 0.5f*M_PI;;
201  UUID = context_test.addPatch(center,size,rotation);
202  prim = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID);
203  normal_r = prim->getNormal();
204 
205  rotation_r = make_SphericalCoord( 0.5*M_PI-asinf( normal_r.z ), atan2(normal_r.x,normal_r.y) );
206 
207  context_test.deletePrimitive(UUID);
208 
209  if( fabs(rotation_r.elevation-rotation.elevation)>errtol || fabs(rotation_r.azimuth-rotation.azimuth)>errtol ){
210  error_count++;
211  std::cerr << "failed: Rotated patch did not return correct normal vector." << std::endl;
212  }
213 
214  //------- Add Triangle --------//
215 
216  vec3 v0,v0_r;
217  vec3 v1,v1_r;
218  vec3 v2,v2_r;
219 
220  //uint addTriangle( const vec3& v0, const vec3& v1, const vec3& v2, const RGBcolor &color );
221  v0 = make_vec3(1,2,3);
222  v1 = make_vec3(2,4,6);
223  v2 = make_vec3(3,6,5);
224  vertices.at(0) = v0;
225  vertices.at(1) = v1;
226  vertices.at(2) = v2;
227  color = RGB::red;
228  UUID = context_test.addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,color);
229 
230  prim = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID);
231  type = prim->getType();
232  normal_r = prim->getNormal();
233  vertices_r = prim->getVertices();
234  area_r = prim->getArea();
235  color_r = prim->getColor();
236 
237  if( type!=PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
238  error_count++;
239  std::cerr << "failed: uint addTriangle(const vec3& v0, const vec3& v1, const vec3& v2, const RGBcolor &color ). Triangle::getType did not return `PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE'." << std::endl;
240  }
241  normal = cross( v1-v0, v2-v1 );
242  normal.normalize();
243  if( normal_r.x!=normal.x || normal_r.y!=normal.y || normal_r.z!=normal.z ){
244  error_count++;
245  std::cerr << "failed: uint addTriangle(const vec3& v0, const vec3& v1, const vec3& v2, const RGBcolor &color ). Triangle::getNormal did not return correct value." << std::endl;
246  }
247  if( vertices.at(0).x!=vertices_r.at(0).x || vertices.at(0).y!=vertices_r.at(0).y || vertices.at(0).z!=vertices_r.at(0).z ||
248  vertices.at(1).x!=vertices_r.at(1).x || vertices.at(1).y!=vertices_r.at(1).y || vertices.at(1).z!=vertices_r.at(1).z ||
249  vertices.at(2).x!=vertices_r.at(2).x || vertices.at(2).y!=vertices_r.at(2).y || vertices.at(2).z!=vertices_r.at(2).z ){
250  error_count++;
251  std::cerr << "failed: uint addTriangle(const vec3& v0, const vec3& v1, const vec3& v2, const RGBcolor &color ). Triangle::getVertices did not return correct value." << std::endl;
252  }
253  vec3 A(v1-v0);
254  vec3 B(v2-v0);
255  vec3 C(v2-v1);
256  float a = A.magnitude();
257  float b = B.magnitude();
258  float c = C.magnitude();
259  float s = 0.5f*( a+b+c );
260  if( area_r!=sqrtf(s*(s-a)*(s-b)*(s-c)) ){
261  error_count++;
262  std::cerr << "failed: uint addTriangle(const vec3& v0, const vec3& v1, const vec3& v2, const RGBcolor &color ). Triangle::getArea did not return correct value." << std::endl;
263  }
264  if( color_r.r!=color.r || color_r.g!=color.g || color_r.b!=color.b ){
265  error_count++;
266  std::cerr << "failed: uint addTriangle(const vec3& v0, const vec3& v1, const vec3& v2, const RGBcolor &color ). Triangle::getColor did not return correct color." << std::endl;
267  }
268 
269  if( prim->hasTexture() ){
270  error_count++;
271  std::cerr << "failed: Triangle without texture mapping returned true for texture map test." << std::endl;
272  }
273 
274  //------- Copy Triangle --------//
275 
276  UUID_cpy = context_test.copyPrimitive(UUID);
277 
278  std::vector<vec3> vertices_cpy = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID_cpy)->getVertices();
279 
280  if( vertices.at(0).x!=vertices_cpy.at(0).x || vertices.at(0).y!=vertices_cpy.at(0).y || vertices.at(0).z!=vertices_cpy.at(0).z ||
281  vertices.at(1).x!=vertices_cpy.at(1).x || vertices.at(1).y!=vertices_cpy.at(1).y || vertices.at(1).z!=vertices_cpy.at(1).z ||
282  vertices.at(2).x!=vertices_cpy.at(2).x || vertices.at(2).y!=vertices_cpy.at(2).y || vertices.at(2).z!=vertices_cpy.at(2).z ){
283  error_count++;
284  std::cerr << "failed: copied triangle did not return correct vertices." << std::endl;
285  }
286 
287  //translate the copied patch
288  shift = make_vec3(5,4,3);
289  context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID_cpy)->translate(shift);
290 
291  vertices_cpy = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID_cpy)->getVertices();
292 
293  if( vertices.at(0).x!=(vertices_cpy.at(0).x-shift.x) || vertices.at(0).y!=(vertices_cpy.at(0).y-shift.y) || vertices.at(0).z!=(vertices_cpy.at(0).z-shift.z) ||
294  vertices.at(1).x!=(vertices_cpy.at(1).x-shift.x) || vertices.at(1).y!=(vertices_cpy.at(1).y-shift.y) || vertices.at(1).z!=(vertices_cpy.at(1).z-shift.z) ||
295  vertices.at(2).x!=(vertices_cpy.at(2).x-shift.x) || vertices.at(2).y!=(vertices_cpy.at(2).y-shift.y) || vertices.at(2).z!=(vertices_cpy.at(2).z-shift.z) ){
296  error_count++;
297  std::cerr << "failed: translated triangle did not return correct vertices." << std::endl;
298  }
299 
300  //------- Delete Patch --------//
301 
302  context_test.deletePrimitive(UUID);
303 
304  if( context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) ){
305  error_count++;
306  std::cerr << "failed: deletePrimitive. Triangle not properly deleted." << std::endl;
307  }
308 
309  UUID = UUID_cpy;
310 
311  //------- Add a Box --------//
312 
313  //vector<uint> addBox( const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const int3& subdiv );
314  center = make_vec3(1,2,3);
315  vec3 size3(3,2,1);
316  int3 subdiv(1,1,1);
317  objID = context_test.addBoxObject( center, size3, subdiv );
318  UUIDs = context_test.getObjectPointer(objID)->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
319 
320  normal_r = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs.at(0))->getNormal();
321  rotation_r = make_SphericalCoord( 0.5*M_PI-asinf( normal_r.z ), atan2(normal_r.x,normal_r.y) );
322 
323  if( fabs(rotation_r.zenith-0.f)>errtol || fabs(rotation_r.azimuth-0.f)>errtol ){
324  error_count++;
325  std::cerr << "failed: addBox(). Face normals incorrect." << std::endl;
326  }
327 
328  normal_r = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs.at(2))->getNormal();
329  rotation_r = make_SphericalCoord( 0.5*M_PI-asinf( normal_r.z ), atan2(normal_r.x,normal_r.y) );
330 
331  if( fabs(rotation_r.zenith-0.f)>errtol || fabs(rotation_r.azimuth-0.5f*M_PI)>errtol ){
332  error_count++;
333  std::cerr << "failed: addBox(). Face normals incorrect." << std::endl;
334  }
335 
336  size_r = context_test.getPatchPointer(UUIDs.at(0))->getSize();
337 
338  if( fabs(size_r.x-size3.x)>errtol || fabs(size_r.y-size3.z)>errtol ){
339  error_count++;
340  std::cerr << "failed: addBox(). Face sizes incorrect." << std::endl;
341  }
342 
343  size_r = context_test.getPatchPointer(UUIDs.at(2))->getSize();
344 
345  if( fabs(size_r.x-size3.y)>errtol || fabs(size_r.y-size3.z)>errtol ){
346  error_count++;
347  std::cerr << "failed: addBox(). Face sizes incorrect." << std::endl;
348  }
349 
350  //------- Add a Rotated Tile --------//
351 
352  center = make_vec3(1,2,3);
353  size = make_vec2(3,2);
354  int2 subdiv2(3,3);
355  rotation = make_SphericalCoord( 0.25*M_PI, 1.4*M_PI );
356  objID = context_test.addTileObject( center, size, rotation, subdiv2 );
357  UUIDs = context_test.getObjectPointer(objID)->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
358 
359  for( int p=0; p<UUIDs.size(); p++ ){
360 
361  normal_r = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs.at(p))->getNormal();
362 
363  rotation_r = cart2sphere(normal_r);
364 
365  if( fabs(rotation_r.zenith-rotation.zenith)>errtol || fabs(rotation_r.azimuth-rotation.azimuth)>errtol ){
366  error_count++;
367  std::cerr << "failed: addTile(). Sub-patch normals incorrect." << std::endl;
368  break;
369  }
370 
371  }
372 
373  //------- Add a Textured Tile with Transparency (disk) --------//
374 
375  center = make_vec3(1,2,3);
376  size = make_vec2(3,2);
377  subdiv2 = make_int2(5,5);
378  rotation = make_SphericalCoord( 0.1*M_PI, 2.4*M_PI );
379  objID = context_test.addTileObject( center, size, rotation, subdiv2, "lib/images/disk_texture.png" );
380  UUIDs = context_test.getObjectPointer(objID)->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
381 
382  float At = 0;
383  for( int p=0; p<UUIDs.size(); p++ ){
384 
385  float area = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs.at(p))->getArea();
386 
387  At+=area;
388 
389  }
390 
391  float area_exact = 0.25*M_PI*size.x*size.y;
392 
393  if( fabs(At-area_exact)>0.005 ){
394  error_count++;
395  std::cerr << "failed: addTile(). Texture masked area is incorrect." << std::endl;
396  std::cout << At << " " << area_exact << std::endl;
397  }
398 
399  //------- Primitive Transformations --------//
400 
401  vec2 sz_0(0.5,3.f);
402  float A_0 = sz_0.x*sz_0.y;
403 
404  float scale = 2.6f;
405 
406  UUID = context_test.addPatch( make_vec3(0,0,0), sz_0 );
407  context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID)->scale( make_vec3(scale,scale,scale) );
408 
409  float A_1 = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID)->getArea();
410 
411  if( fabs( A_1 - scale*scale*A_0 )>1e-5 ){
412  error_count ++;
413  std::cerr << "failed: Patch scaling - scaled area not correct." << std::endl;
414  }
415 
416  //------- Primitive Data --------//
417 
418  float data = 5;
419  context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID)->setPrimitiveData("some_data",HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT,1,&data);
420 
421  if( !context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID)->doesPrimitiveDataExist("some_data") ){
422  error_count ++;
423  std::cerr << "failed: setPrimitiveData - data was added but was not actually created." << std::endl;
424  }
425 
426  float data_return;
427  context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID)->getPrimitiveData("some_data", data_return);
428  if( data_return!=data ){
429  error_count ++;
430  std::cerr << "failed: set/getPrimitiveData (setting/getting through primitive). Get data did not match set data." << std::endl;
431  std::cout << data_return << std::endl;
432  }
433 
434  context_test.setPrimitiveData(UUID,"some_data",HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT,1,&data);
435  context_test.getPrimitiveData(UUID,"some_data",data_return);
436  if( data_return!=data ){
437  error_count ++;
438  std::cerr << "failed: set/getPrimitiveData (setting/getting through Context). Get data did not match set data." << std::endl;
439  std::cout << data_return << std::endl;
440  }
441 
442  std::vector<float> data_v;
443  for( uint i=0; i<5; i++ ){
444  data_v.push_back(i);
445  }
446  context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID)->setPrimitiveData("some_data",HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT,5,&data_v[0] );
447 
448  std::vector<float> data_return_v;
449  context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID)->getPrimitiveData("some_data", data_return_v);
450  for( uint i=0; i<5; i++ ){
451  if( data_return_v.at(i)!=data_v.at(i) ){
452  error_count ++;
453  std::cerr << "failed: set/getPrimitiveData (setting/getting through primitive). Get data did not match set data." << std::endl;
454  std::cout << data_return << std::endl;
455  break;
456  }
457  }
458 
459  data = 10;
460  context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID)->setPrimitiveData("some_data_2",data);
461 
462  if( !context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID)->doesPrimitiveDataExist("some_data_2") ){
463  error_count ++;
464  std::cerr << "failed: setPrimitiveData - data was added but was not actually created." << std::endl;
465  }
466 
467  context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID)->getPrimitiveData("some_data_2", data_return);
468  if( data_return!=data ){
469  error_count ++;
470  std::cerr << "failed: set/getPrimitiveData (setting/getting scalar data). Get data did not match set data." << std::endl;
471  std::cout << data_return << std::endl;
472  }
473 
474  //------- Textures --------- //
475 
476  vec2 sizep = make_vec2(2,3);
477 
478  const char* texture = "lib/images/disk_texture.png";
479 
480  vec2 uv0(1,0);
481  vec2 uv1(0,0);
482  vec2 uv2(0,1);
483  vec2 uv3(1,1);
484 
485  uint UUIDp = context_test.addPatch( make_vec3(2,3,4), sizep, make_SphericalCoord(0,0), texture, 0.5*(uv3+uv1), uv3-uv1 );
486 
487  if( !context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUIDp)->hasTexture() ){
488  error_count ++;
489  std::cerr << "failed: Texture-mapped patch was found not to have texture." << std::endl;
490  }
491 
492  std::string texture2 = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUIDp)->getTextureFile();
493 
494  if( texture2.compare(texture)!=0 ){
495  error_count ++;
496  std::cerr << "failed: textures - queried texture file does not match that provided when adding primitive." << std::endl;
497  }
498 
499  float Ap = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUIDp)->getArea();
500 
501  if( fabs(Ap-0.25f*M_PI*sizep.x*sizep.y)/(0.25f*M_PI*sizep.x*sizep.y)>0.01f ){
502  error_count ++;
503  std::cerr << "failed: Texture-masked patch does not have correct area." << std::endl;
504  }
505 
506  std::vector<vec2> uv;
507  uv = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUIDp)->getTextureUV();
508 
509  if( uv.size()!=4 ){
510  error_count ++;
511  std::cerr << "failed: Texture (u,v) coordinates for patch should have length of 4." << std::endl;
512  }
513  if( uv.at(0).x!=uv0.x || uv.at(0).y!=uv0.y || uv.at(1).x!=uv1.x || uv.at(1).y!=uv1.y || uv.at(2).x!=uv2.x || uv.at(2).y!=uv2.y || uv.at(3).x!=uv3.x || uv.at(3).y!=uv3.y ){
514  error_count ++;
515  std::cerr << "failed: Queried texture (u,v) coordinates do not match that provided when adding primitive." << std::endl;
516  }
517 
518  uv0 = make_vec2( 0.25, 0.25 );
519  uv1 = make_vec2( 0.75, 0.25 );
520  uv2 = make_vec2( 0.75, 0.75 );
521  uv3 = make_vec2( 0.25, 0.75 );
522 
523  uint UUIDp2 = context_test.addPatch( make_vec3(2,3,4), sizep, make_SphericalCoord(0,0), texture, 0.5*(uv2+uv0), uv2-uv0 );
524 
525  float area = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUIDp2)->getArea();
526 
527  if( fabs(area-sizep.x*sizep.y)>0.001f ){
528  error_count ++;
529  std::cerr << "failed: Patch masked with (u,v) coordinates did not return correct area." << std::endl;
530  }
531 
532  uv0 = make_vec2( 0, 0 );
533  uv1 = make_vec2( 1, 1 );
534  uv2 = make_vec2( 0, 1 );
535 
536  uint UUIDp3 = context_test.addTriangle( make_vec3(2,3,4), make_vec3(2,3+sizep.y,4), make_vec3(2+sizep.x,3+sizep.y,4), texture, uv0, uv1, uv2 );
537 
538  area = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUIDp3)->getArea();
539 
540  if( fabs(area-0.5*0.25f*M_PI*sizep.x*sizep.y)>0.01f ){
541  error_count ++;
542  std::cerr << "failed: Triangle masked with (u,v) coordinates did not return correct area." << std::endl;
543  }
544 
545  //------- Global Data --------//
546 
547  float gdata = 5;
548  context_test.setGlobalData("some_data",HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT,1,&gdata);
549 
550  if( !context_test.doesGlobalDataExist("some_data") ){
551  error_count ++;
552  std::cerr << "failed: setGlobalData - data was added but was not actually created." << std::endl;
553  }
554 
555  float gdata_return;
556  context_test.getGlobalData("some_data", gdata_return);
557  if( gdata_return!=gdata ){
558  error_count ++;
559  std::cerr << "failed: set/getGlobalData (setting/getting through primitive). Get data did not match set data." << std::endl;
560  }
561 
562  std::vector<float> gdata_v;
563  for( uint i=0; i<5; i++ ){
564  gdata_v.push_back(i);
565  }
566  context_test.setGlobalData("some_data",HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT,5,&gdata_v[0] );
567 
568  std::vector<float> gdata_return_v;
569  context_test.getGlobalData("some_data", gdata_return_v);
570  for( uint i=0; i<5; i++ ){
571  if( gdata_return_v.at(i)!=gdata_v.at(i) ){
572  error_count ++;
573  std::cerr << "failed: set/getGlobalData (setting/getting vector data). Get data did not match set data." << std::endl;
574  break;
575  }
576  }
577 
578  gdata = 10;
579  context_test.setGlobalData("some_data_2",gdata);
580 
581  if( !context_test.doesGlobalDataExist("some_data_2") ){
582  error_count ++;
583  std::cerr << "failed: setGlobalData - data was added but was not actually created." << std::endl;
584  }
585 
586  context_test.getGlobalData("some_data_2", gdata_return);
587  if( gdata_return!=gdata ){
588  error_count ++;
589  std::cerr << "failed: set/getGlobalData (setting/getting scalar data). Get data did not match set data." << std::endl;
590  }
591 
592 
593 
594  //------- Cartesian/Spherical Coordinate Conversion --------//
595 
596  SphericalCoord sph1 = make_SphericalCoord(1.f,0.25*M_PI,1.5*M_PI);
597  vec3 cart = sphere2cart(sph1);
598  SphericalCoord sph2 = cart2sphere(cart);
599 
600  if( fabs(sph1.radius-sph2.radius)>errtol || fabs(sph1.elevation-sph2.elevation)>errtol || fabs(sph1.zenith-sph2.zenith)>errtol || fabs(sph1.azimuth-sph2.azimuth)>errtol ){
601  std::cerr << "failed: cart2sphere and sphere2cart are not inverses." << std::endl;
602  error_count++;
603  }
604 
605  //------- Julian Day Conversion ---------//
606 
607  int JulianDay = 10;
608  int year = 2000; //leap year
609 
610  Date date = Julian2Calendar(JulianDay,year);
611  if( date.year!=year || date.month!=1 || date.day!=JulianDay ){
612  std::cerr << "failed: Julian2Calendar conversion #1 incorrect." << std::endl;
613  error_count++;
614  }
615 
616  JulianDay = 230;
617  date = Julian2Calendar(JulianDay,year);
618  if( date.year!=year || date.month!=8 || date.day!=17 ){
619  std::cerr << "failed: Julian2Calendar conversion #2 incorrect." << std::endl;
620  error_count++;
621  }
622 
623  year = 2001; //non-leap year
624  date = Julian2Calendar(JulianDay,year);
625  if( date.year!=year || date.month!=8 || date.day!=18 ){
626  std::cerr << "failed: Julian2Calendar conversion #3 incorrect." << std::endl;
627  error_count++;
628  }
629 
630  //-------- Timeseries -----------//
631 
632  Context context_ts;
633 
634  Date date_ts( 12, 3, 2010 );
635  context_ts.setDate( date_ts );
636 
637  Time time_ts( 13, 15, 39 );
638  context_ts.setTime( time_ts );
639 
640  float T0 = 302.3;
641  float T1 = 305.3;
642  Time time0_ts = time_ts;
643  Time time1_ts = make_Time( time_ts.hour, 49, 14 );
644 
645  context_ts.addTimeseriesData( "timeseries", T0, date_ts, time0_ts );
646  context_ts.addTimeseriesData( "timeseries", T1, date_ts, time1_ts );
647 
648  context_ts.setCurrentTimeseriesPoint( "timeseries", 0 );
649 
650  if( context_ts.getTimeseriesLength( "timeseries" )!=2 ){
651  std::cerr << "failed. getTimeseriesLength() did not give correct length." << std::endl;
652  error_count++;
653  }
654 
655  Date d = context_ts.queryTimeseriesDate( "timeseries", 0 );
656 
657  if( d.year!=date_ts.year || d.month!=date_ts.month || d.day!=date_ts.day ){
658  std::cerr << "failed. Set/query timeseries date do not match." << std::endl;
659  error_count++;
660  }
661 
662  d = context_ts.queryTimeseriesDate( "timeseries", 1 );
663 
664  if( d.year!=date_ts.year || d.month!=date_ts.month || d.day!=date_ts.day ){
665  std::cerr << "failed. Set/query timeseries date do not match." << std::endl;
666  error_count++;
667  }
668 
669  Time t = context_ts.queryTimeseriesTime( "timeseries", 0 );
670 
671  if( t.hour!=time0_ts.hour || t.minute!=time0_ts.minute || t.second!=time0_ts.second ){
672  std::cerr << "failed. Set/query timeseries time do not match." << std::endl;
673  error_count++;
674  }
675 
676  t = context_ts.queryTimeseriesTime( "timeseries", 1 );
677 
678  if( t.hour!=time1_ts.hour || t.minute!=time1_ts.minute || t.second!=time1_ts.second ){
679  std::cerr << "failed. Set/query timeseries time do not match." << std::endl;
680  error_count++;
681  }
682 
683  float T_ts = context_ts.queryTimeseriesData( "timeseries", 0 );
684 
685  if( T_ts!=T0 ){
686  std::cerr << "failed: Timeseries set/query data #0 do not match." << std::endl;
687  error_count++;
688  }
689 
690  T_ts = context_ts.queryTimeseriesData( "timeseries", 1 );
691 
692  if( T_ts!=T1 ){
693  std::cerr << "failed: Timeseries set/query data #1 do not match." << std::endl;
694  error_count++;
695  }
696 
697  T_ts = context_ts.queryTimeseriesData( "timeseries", date_ts, time0_ts );
698 
699  if( T_ts!=T0 ){
700  std::cerr << "failed: Timeseries set/query data #0 do not match." << std::endl;
701  error_count++;
702  }
703 
704  T_ts = context_ts.queryTimeseriesData( "timeseries", date_ts, time1_ts );
705 
706  if( T_ts!=T1 ){
707  std::cerr << "failed: Timeseries set/query data #1 do not match." << std::endl;
708  error_count++;
709  }
710 
711  //context_ts.queryTimeseriesData( "timeseries", date_ts, make_Time(0,0,0) ); //this is to test that querying outside of dataset does not throw a segmentation fault.
712 
713  context_ts.queryTimeseriesData( "timeseries", date_ts, make_Time(time0_ts.hour,time0_ts.minute,time0_ts.second+10) );
714 
715  //------- XML I/O --------//
716 
717  Context context_io;
718 
719  RGBcolor color_io = RGB::red;
720 
721  //date/time
722 
723  Date date_io( 12, 3, 2010 );
724  context_io.setDate( date_io );
725 
726  Time time_io( 13, 15, 0 );
727  context_io.setTime( time_io );
728 
729  //patch
730 
731  vec3 p_io(2,3,5);
732  vec2 size_io(3,2);
733  SphericalCoord rot_io(1,0.3*M_PI,0.4*M_PI);
734 
735  uint UUIDp_io = context_io.addPatch( p_io, size_io, rot_io, color_io );
736 
737  int pdatai_p = 4;
738  float pdataf_p = 7.2;
739  context_io.setPrimitiveData( UUIDp_io, "pdatai", pdatai_p );
740  context_io.setPrimitiveData( UUIDp_io, "pdataf", pdataf_p );
741 
742  //triangle
743 
744  vec3 v0_io(2,3,5);
745  vec3 v1_io(5,1,2);
746  vec3 v2_io(8,4,6);
747 
748  uint UUIDt_io = context_io.addTriangle( v0_io, v1_io, v2_io, color_io );
749 
750  int pdatai_t = 9;
751  float pdataf_t = 2.7;
752  context_io.setPrimitiveData( UUIDt_io, "pdatai", pdatai_t );
753  context_io.setPrimitiveData( UUIDt_io, "pdataf", pdataf_t );
754 
755  //global data
756 
757  std::vector<double> gdatad_io;
758  gdatad_io.push_back( 9.432 );
759  gdatad_io.push_back( 2939.9292 );
760  context_io.setGlobalData( "gdatad", HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE, gdatad_io.size(), &gdatad_io[0] );
761 
762  //timeseries
763 
764  float T0_io = 302.3;
765  float T1_io = 305.3;
766  Time time0_io = time_io;
767  Time time1_io = make_Time( time_io.hour, 30, 0 );
768 
769  context_io.addTimeseriesData( "ts_io", T0_io, date_io, time0_io );
770  context_io.addTimeseriesData( "ts_io", T1_io, date_io, time1_io );
771 
772  context_io.writeXML( "xmltest_io.xml" );
773 
774  Context context_oi;
775 
776  context_oi.loadXML( "xmltest_io.xml" );
777 
778  float pdataf;
779  int pdatai;
780 
781  context_oi.getPrimitiveData(0,"pdataf",pdataf);
782  context_oi.getPrimitiveData(0,"pdatai",pdatai);
783 
784  if( pdataf!=pdataf_p || pdatai!=pdatai_p ){
785  std::cerr << "failed. Patch primitive data write/read do not match." << std::endl;
786  error_count ++;
787  }
788 
789  std::vector<double> gdatad;
790  context_oi.getGlobalData("gdatad",gdatad);
791 
792  bool failio = false;
793  if( gdatad_io.size() != gdatad.size() ){
794  failio = true;
795  }
796  for( int i=0; i<gdatad_io.size(); i++ ){
797  if( fabs(gdatad.at(i)-gdatad_io.at(i))>1e-3 ){
798  failio = true;
799  }
800  }
801  if( failio ){
802  std::cerr << "failed. Global data write/read do not match." << std::endl;
803  error_count ++;
804  }
805 
806  //-------------------------------------------//
807 
808  if( error_count==0 ){
809  std::cout << "passed." << std::endl;
810  return 0;
811  }else{
812  return 1;
813  }
814 
815 }
816 
817 Texture* Context::addTexture( const char* texture_file ){
818  if( textures.find(texture_file)==textures.end() ){//texture has not already been added
819  Texture text( texture_file );
820  textures[ texture_file ] = text;
821  }
822  return &textures.at(texture_file);
823 }
824 
825 Texture::Texture( const char* texture_file ){
826  filename = texture_file;
827 
828  //------ determine if transparency channel exists ---------//
829 
830  //check if texture file has extension ".png"
831  std::string ext;
832  for( int i=filename.size()-4; i<filename.size(); i++ ){
833  ext.push_back(filename.at(i));
834  }
835  if( ext.compare(".png")!=0 ){
836  hastransparencychannel = false;
837  }else{
838  hastransparencychannel = PNGHasAlpha( filename.c_str() );
839  }
840 
841  //-------- load transparency channel (if exists) ------------//
842 
843  if( hastransparencychannel ){
844  transparencydata = readPNGAlpha( filename.c_str() );
845  }
846 
847  //-------- determine solid fraction --------------//
848 
849  if( hastransparencychannel ){
850  size_t p = 0.f;
851  for( uint j=0; j<transparencydata.size(); j++ ){
852  for( uint i=0; i<transparencydata.at(j).size(); i++ ){
853  if( transparencydata.at(j).at(i) ){
854  p += 1;
855  }
856  }
857  }
858  float sf = float(p)/float(transparencydata.size()*transparencydata.front().size());
859  if( sf!=sf ){
860  sf = 0.f;
861  }
862  solidfraction = sf;
863  }else{
864  solidfraction = 1.f;
865  }
866 
867 
868 }
869 
870 std::string Texture::getTextureFile( void ) const{
871  return filename;
872 }
873 
874 helios::int2 Texture::getSize( void )const {
875  return make_int2(transparencydata.front().size(),transparencydata.size());
876 }
877 
878 bool Texture::hasTransparencyChannel( void ) const{
879  return hastransparencychannel;
880 }
881 
882 std::vector<std::vector<bool> >* Texture::getTransparencyData( void ){
883  return &transparencydata;
884 }
885 
886 float Texture::getSolidFraction( void ) const{
887  return solidfraction;
888 }
889 
890 void Context::markGeometryClean(void){
891  isgeometrydirty = false;
892 }
893 
894 void Context::markGeometryDirty(void){
895  isgeometrydirty = true;
896 }
897 
898 bool Context::isGeometryDirty(void){
899  return isgeometrydirty;
900 }

902 uint Primitive::getUUID() const{
903  return UUID;
904 }

906 PrimitiveType Primitive::getType() const{
907  return prim_type;
908 }

910 void Primitive::setParentObjectID( const uint objID ){
911  parent_object_ID = objID;
912 }
913 
914 uint Primitive::getParentObjectID( void ) const{
915  return parent_object_ID;
916 }
917 
918 void Primitive::getTransformationMatrix( float (&T)[16] )const {
919  for( int i=0; i<16; i++ ){
920  T[i]=transform[i];
921  }
922 }
923 
924 void Primitive::setTransformationMatrix( float (&T)[16] ){
925 
926  for( int i=0; i<16; i++ ){
927  transform[i] = T[i];
928  }
929 }
930 
931 float Patch::getArea() const{
932 
933  vec2 size = getSize();
934 
935  float area = size.x*size.y*solid_fraction;
936 
937  return area;
938 
939 }
940 
941 float Triangle::getArea() const{
942 
943  std::vector<vec3> vertices = getVertices();
944 
945  float area = calculateTriangleArea( vertices.at(0), vertices.at(1), vertices.at(2) );
946  area = area*solid_fraction;
947 
948  return area;
949 }
950 
951 float Voxel::getArea() const{
952 
953  vec3 size(transform[0],transform[5],transform[10]);
954 
955  float area = 2.f*size.x*size.y+2*size.x*size.z+2*size.y*size.z;
956 
957  return area;
958 }
959 
960 vec3 Patch::getNormal() const{
961 
962  vec3 normal;
963 
964  normal.x = transform[2];
965  normal.y = transform[6];
966  normal.z = transform[10];
967 
968  normal.normalize();
969 
970  return normal;
971 
972 }
973 
974 vec3 Triangle::getNormal() const{
975  std::vector<vec3> vertices = getVertices();
976  vec3 norm = cross(vertices.at(1)-vertices.at(0),vertices.at(2)-vertices.at(1));
977  norm.normalize();
978  return norm;
979 }
980 
981 vec3 Voxel::getNormal() const{
982  return make_vec3(0,0,0);
983 }
984 
985 std::vector<vec3> Patch::getVertices() const{
986 
987  vec3 Y[4];
988  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
989  vertices.resize(4);
990  Y[0] = make_vec3( -0.5f, -0.5f, 0.f);
991  Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.5f, -0.5f, 0.f);
992  Y[2] = make_vec3( 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.f);
993  Y[3] = make_vec3( -0.5f, 0.5f, 0.f);
994 
995  for( int i=0; i<4; i++ ){
996  vertices[i].x = transform[0] * Y[i].x + transform[1] * Y[i].y + transform[2] * Y[i].z + transform[3];
997  vertices[i].y = transform[4] * Y[i].x + transform[5] * Y[i].y + transform[6] * Y[i].z + transform[7];
998  vertices[i].z = transform[8] * Y[i].x + transform[9] * Y[i].y + transform[10] * Y[i].z + transform[11];
999  }
1000  return vertices;
1001 }
1002 
1003 std::vector<vec3> Triangle::getVertices() const{
1004 
1005  vec3 Y[3];
1006  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
1007  vertices.resize(3);
1008  Y[0] = make_vec3( 0.f, 0.f, 0.f);
1009  Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.f, 1.f, 0.f);
1010  Y[2] = make_vec3( 1.f, 1.f, 0.f);
1011 
1012  for( int i=0; i<3; i++ ){
1013  vertices[i].x = transform[0] * Y[i].x + transform[1] * Y[i].y + transform[2] * Y[i].z + transform[3];
1014  vertices[i].y = transform[4] * Y[i].x + transform[5] * Y[i].y + transform[6] * Y[i].z + transform[7];
1015  vertices[i].z = transform[8] * Y[i].x + transform[9] * Y[i].y + transform[10] * Y[i].z + transform[11];
1016  }
1017  return vertices;
1018 
1019 }
1020 
1021 std::vector<vec3> Voxel::getVertices() const{
1022 
1023  vec3 Y[8];
1024  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
1025  vertices.resize(8);
1026  Y[0] = make_vec3( -0.5f, -0.5f, -0.5f);
1027  Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.5f, -0.5f, -0.5f);
1028  Y[2] = make_vec3( 0.5f, 0.5f, -0.5f);
1029  Y[3] = make_vec3( -0.5f, 0.5f, -0.5f);
1030  Y[4] = make_vec3( -0.5f, -0.5f, 0.5f);
1031  Y[5] = make_vec3( 0.5f, -0.5f, 0.5f);
1032  Y[6] = make_vec3( 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f);
1033  Y[7] = make_vec3( -0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f);
1034 
1035  for( int i=0; i<8; i++ ){
1036  vertices[i].x = transform[0] * Y[i].x + transform[1] * Y[i].y + transform[2] * Y[i].z + transform[3];
1037  vertices[i].y = transform[4] * Y[i].x + transform[5] * Y[i].y + transform[6] * Y[i].z + transform[7];
1038  vertices[i].z = transform[8] * Y[i].x + transform[9] * Y[i].y + transform[10] * Y[i].z + transform[11];
1039  }
1040  return vertices;
1041 }
1042 
1043 RGBcolor Primitive::getColor() const{
1044  return make_RGBcolor(color.r,color.g,color.b);
1045 }
1046 
1047 RGBcolor Primitive::getColorRGB() const{
1048  return make_RGBcolor(color.r,color.g,color.b);
1049 }
1050 
1051 RGBAcolor Primitive::getColorRGBA() const{
1052  return color;
1053 }
1054 
1055 void Primitive::setColor( const helios::RGBcolor __color ){
1056 
1057  if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
1058  std::cout << "WARNING (Primitive::setColor): Cannot set the color of individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
1059  return;
1060  }
1061 
1062  color = make_RGBAcolor(__color,1);
1063 }
1064 
1065 void Primitive::setColor( const helios::RGBAcolor __color ){
1066 
1067  if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
1068  std::cout << "WARNING (Primitive::setColor): Cannot set the color of individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
1069  return;
1070  }
1071 
1072  color = __color;
1073 }
1074 
1075 Texture* Primitive::getTexture() const{
1076  return texture;
1077 }
1078 
1079 bool Primitive::hasTexture( void ) const{
1080  if( texture!=NULL ){
1081  return true;
1082  }else{
1083  return false;
1084  }
1085 }
1086 
1087 std::string Primitive::getTextureFile() const{
1088  if( hasTexture() ){
1089  return texture->getTextureFile();
1090  }else{
1091  std::string blank;
1092  return blank;
1093  }
1094 }
1095 
1096 std::vector<vec2> Primitive::getTextureUV( void ){
1097  return uv;
1098 }
1099 
1100 void Primitive::overrideTextureColor( void ){
1101 
1102  if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
1103  std::cout << "WARNING (Primitive::overrideTextureColor): Cannot set the texture options of individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
1104  return;
1105  }
1106 
1107  texturecoloroverridden = true;
1108 }
1109 
1110 void Primitive::useTextureColor( void ){
1111 
1112  if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
1113  std::cout << "WARNING (Primitive::useTextureColor): Cannot set the texture options of individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
1114  return;
1115  }
1116 
1117  texturecoloroverridden = false;
1118 }
1119 
1120 bool Primitive::isTextureColorOverridden( void ) const{
1121  return texturecoloroverridden;
1122 }
1123 
1124 void Primitive::scale( const vec3 S ){
1125 
1126  if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
1127  std::cout << "WARNING (Primitive::scale): Cannot scale individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
1128  return;
1129  }
1130 
1131  float T[16];
1132  makeScaleMatrix(S,T);
1133  matmult(T,transform,transform);
1134 }
1135 
1136 void Primitive::translate( const helios::vec3 shift ){
1137 
1138  if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
1139  std::cout << "WARNING (Primitive::translate): Cannot translate individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
1140  return;
1141  }
1142 
1143  float T[16];
1144  makeTranslationMatrix(shift,T);
1145  matmult(T,transform,transform);
1146 }
1147 
1148 void Patch::rotate( const float rot, const char* axis ){
1149 
1150  if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
1151  std::cout << "WARNING (Patch::rotate): Cannot rotate individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
1152  return;
1153  }
1154 
1155  if( strcmp(axis,"z")==0 ){
1156  float Rz[16];
1157  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"z",Rz);
1158  matmult(Rz,transform,transform);
1159  }else if( strcmp(axis,"y")==0 ){
1160  float Ry[16];
1161  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"y",Ry);
1162  matmult(Ry,transform,transform);
1163  }else if( strcmp(axis,"x")==0 ){
1164  float Rx[16];
1165  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"x",Rx);
1166  matmult(Rx,transform,transform);
1167  }else{
1168  std::cerr << "ERROR (Patch::rotate): Rotation axis should be one of x, y, or z." << std::endl;
1169  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1170  }
1171 
1172 }
1173 
1174 void Patch::rotate( const float rot, const helios::vec3 axis ){
1175 
1176  if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
1177  std::cout << "WARNING (Patch::rotate): Cannot rotate individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
1178  return;
1179  }
1180 
1181  float R[16];
1182  makeRotationMatrix(rot,axis,R);
1183  matmult(R,transform,transform);
1184 }
1185 
1186 void Triangle::rotate( const float rot, const char* axis ){
1187 
1188  if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
1189  std::cout << "WARNING (Triangle::rotate): Cannot rotate individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
1190  return;
1191  }
1192 
1193  if( strcmp(axis,"z")==0 ){
1194  float Rz[16];
1195  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"z",Rz);
1196  matmult(Rz,transform,transform);
1197  }else if( strcmp(axis,"y")==0 ){
1198  float Ry[16];
1199  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"y",Ry);
1200  matmult(Ry,transform,transform);
1201  }else if( strcmp(axis,"x")==0 ){
1202  float Rx[16];
1203  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"x",Rx);
1204  matmult(Rx,transform,transform);
1205  }else{
1206  std::cerr << "ERROR (Triangle::rotate): Rotation axis should be one of x, y, or z." << std::endl;
1207  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1208  }
1209 
1210 }
1211 
1212 void Triangle::rotate( const float rot, const helios::vec3 axis ){
1213 
1214  if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
1215  std::cout << "WARNING (Triangle::rotate): Cannot rotate individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
1216  return;
1217  }
1218 
1219  float R[16];
1220  makeRotationMatrix(rot,axis,R);
1221  matmult(R,transform,transform);
1222 }
1223 
1224 void Voxel::rotate( const float rot, const char* axis ){
1225 
1226  if( parent_object_ID!=0 ){
1227  std::cout << "WARNING (Voxel::rotate): Cannot rotate individual primitives within a compound object. Use the setter function for objects." << std::endl;
1228  return;
1229  }
1230 
1231  float Rz[16];
1232  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"z",Rz);
1233  matmult(Rz,transform,transform);
1234 
1235 }
1236 
1237 void Voxel::rotate( const float rot, const helios::vec3 axis ){
1238  std::cout << "WARNING (Voxel::rotate) - Voxels can only be rotated about the z-axis. Ignoring this call to rotate()." << std::endl;
1239 }
1240 
1241 void Triangle::makeTransformationMatrix( const helios::vec3 vertex0, const helios::vec3 vertex1, const helios::vec3 vertex2 ){
1242 
1243  //We need to construct the Affine transformation matrix that transforms some generic triangle to a triangle with vertices at vertex0, vertex1, vertex2.
1244 
1245  //V1 is going to be our generic triangle. This is the triangle that we'll intersect in the OptiX ray intersection program. We just need to pass the transformation matrix to OptiX so that we'll end up with the right triangle.
1246 
1247  //We'll assume our generic triangle has vertices
1248  //v0 = (0,0,0)
1249  //v1 = (0,1,0)
1250  //v2 = (1,1,0)
1251  //this needs to match up with the triangle in triangle_intersect() and triangle_bounds() (see primitiveIntersection.cu).
1252  //Note that the matrix is padded with 1's to make it 4x4
1253 
1254  float V1[16];
1255 
1256  /* [0,0] */ V1[0] = 0.f;
1257  /* [0,1] */ V1[1] = 0.f;
1258  /* [0,2] */ V1[2] = 1.f;
1259 
1260  /* [1,0] */ V1[4] = 0.f;
1261  /* [1,1] */ V1[5] = 1.f;
1262  /* [1,2] */ V1[6] = 1.f;
1263 
1264  /* [2,0] */ V1[8] = 0.f;
1265  /* [2,1] */ V1[9] = 0.f;
1266  /* [2,2] */ V1[10] = 0.f;
1267 
1268  /* [0,3] */ V1[3] = 1.f;
1269  /* [1,3] */ V1[7] = 1.f;
1270  /* [2,3] */ V1[11] = 1.f;
1271  /* [3,0] */ V1[12] = 1.f;
1272  /* [3,1] */ V1[13] = 1.f;
1273  /* [3,2] */ V1[14] = 1.f;
1274  /* [3,3] */ V1[15] = 1.f;
1275 
1276  //V2 holds the vertex locations we want to transform to
1277  //Note that the matrix is padded with 1's to make it 4x4
1278 
1279  float V2[16];
1280  /* [0,0] */ V2[0] = vertex0.x;
1281  /* [0,1] */ V2[1] = vertex1.x;
1282  /* [0,2] */ V2[2] = vertex2.x;
1283  /* [0,3] */ V2[3] = 1.f;
1284  /* [1,0] */ V2[4] = vertex0.y;
1285  /* [1,1] */ V2[5] = vertex1.y;
1286  /* [1,2] */ V2[6] = vertex2.y;
1287  /* [1,3] */ V2[7] = 1.f;
1288  /* [2,0] */ V2[8] = vertex0.z;
1289  /* [2,1] */ V2[9] = vertex1.z;
1290  /* [2,2] */ V2[10] = vertex2.z;
1291  /* [2,3] */ V2[11] = 1.f;
1292  /* [3,0] */ V2[12] = 1.f;
1293  /* [3,1] */ V2[13] = 1.f;
1294  /* [3,2] */ V2[14] = 1.f;
1295  /* [3,3] */ V2[15] = 1.f;
1296 
1297  //Now we just need to solve the linear system for our transform matrix T
1298  // [T][V1] = [V2] -->
1299  // [T] = [V2]([V1]^-1)
1300 
1301  double inv[16], det, invV1[16];
1302 
1303  inv[0] = V1[5] * V1[10] * V1[15] -
1304  V1[5] * V1[11] * V1[14] -
1305  V1[9] * V1[6] * V1[15] +
1306  V1[9] * V1[7] * V1[14] +
1307  V1[13] * V1[6] * V1[11] -
1308  V1[13] * V1[7] * V1[10];
1309 
1310  inv[4] = -V1[4] * V1[10] * V1[15] +
1311  V1[4] * V1[11] * V1[14] +
1312  V1[8] * V1[6] * V1[15] -
1313  V1[8] * V1[7] * V1[14] -
1314  V1[12] * V1[6] * V1[11] +
1315  V1[12] * V1[7] * V1[10];
1316 
1317  inv[8] = V1[4] * V1[9] * V1[15] -
1318  V1[4] * V1[11] * V1[13] -
1319  V1[8] * V1[5] * V1[15] +
1320  V1[8] * V1[7] * V1[13] +
1321  V1[12] * V1[5] * V1[11] -
1322  V1[12] * V1[7] * V1[9];
1323 
1324  inv[12] = -V1[4] * V1[9] * V1[14] +
1325  V1[4] * V1[10] * V1[13] +
1326  V1[8] * V1[5] * V1[14] -
1327  V1[8] * V1[6] * V1[13] -
1328  V1[12] * V1[5] * V1[10] +
1329  V1[12] * V1[6] * V1[9];
1330 
1331  inv[1] = -V1[1] * V1[10] * V1[15] +
1332  V1[1] * V1[11] * V1[14] +
1333  V1[9] * V1[2] * V1[15] -
1334  V1[9] * V1[3] * V1[14] -
1335  V1[13] * V1[2] * V1[11] +
1336  V1[13] * V1[3] * V1[10];
1337 
1338  inv[5] = V1[0] * V1[10] * V1[15] -
1339  V1[0] * V1[11] * V1[14] -
1340  V1[8] * V1[2] * V1[15] +
1341  V1[8] * V1[3] * V1[14] +
1342  V1[12] * V1[2] * V1[11] -
1343  V1[12] * V1[3] * V1[10];
1344 
1345  inv[9] = -V1[0] * V1[9] * V1[15] +
1346  V1[0] * V1[11] * V1[13] +
1347  V1[8] * V1[1] * V1[15] -
1348  V1[8] * V1[3] * V1[13] -
1349  V1[12] * V1[1] * V1[11] +
1350  V1[12] * V1[3] * V1[9];
1351 
1352  inv[13] = V1[0] * V1[9] * V1[14] -
1353  V1[0] * V1[10] * V1[13] -
1354  V1[8] * V1[1] * V1[14] +
1355  V1[8] * V1[2] * V1[13] +
1356  V1[12] * V1[1] * V1[10] -
1357  V1[12] * V1[2] * V1[9];
1358 
1359  inv[2] = V1[1] * V1[6] * V1[15] -
1360  V1[1] * V1[7] * V1[14] -
1361  V1[5] * V1[2] * V1[15] +
1362  V1[5] * V1[3] * V1[14] +
1363  V1[13] * V1[2] * V1[7] -
1364  V1[13] * V1[3] * V1[6];
1365 
1366  inv[6] = -V1[0] * V1[6] * V1[15] +
1367  V1[0] * V1[7] * V1[14] +
1368  V1[4] * V1[2] * V1[15] -
1369  V1[4] * V1[3] * V1[14] -
1370  V1[12] * V1[2] * V1[7] +
1371  V1[12] * V1[3] * V1[6];
1372 
1373  inv[10] = V1[0] * V1[5] * V1[15] -
1374  V1[0] * V1[7] * V1[13] -
1375  V1[4] * V1[1] * V1[15] +
1376  V1[4] * V1[3] * V1[13] +
1377  V1[12] * V1[1] * V1[7] -
1378  V1[12] * V1[3] * V1[5];
1379 
1380  inv[14] = -V1[0] * V1[5] * V1[14] +
1381  V1[0] * V1[6] * V1[13] +
1382  V1[4] * V1[1] * V1[14] -
1383  V1[4] * V1[2] * V1[13] -
1384  V1[12] * V1[1] * V1[6] +
1385  V1[12] * V1[2] * V1[5];
1386 
1387  inv[3] = -V1[1] * V1[6] * V1[11] +
1388  V1[1] * V1[7] * V1[10] +
1389  V1[5] * V1[2] * V1[11] -
1390  V1[5] * V1[3] * V1[10] -
1391  V1[9] * V1[2] * V1[7] +
1392  V1[9] * V1[3] * V1[6];
1393 
1394  inv[7] = V1[0] * V1[6] * V1[11] -
1395  V1[0] * V1[7] * V1[10] -
1396  V1[4] * V1[2] * V1[11] +
1397  V1[4] * V1[3] * V1[10] +
1398  V1[8] * V1[2] * V1[7] -
1399  V1[8] * V1[3] * V1[6];
1400 
1401  inv[11] = -V1[0] * V1[5] * V1[11] +
1402  V1[0] * V1[7] * V1[9] +
1403  V1[4] * V1[1] * V1[11] -
1404  V1[4] * V1[3] * V1[9] -
1405  V1[8] * V1[1] * V1[7] +
1406  V1[8] * V1[3] * V1[5];
1407 
1408  inv[15] = V1[0] * V1[5] * V1[10] -
1409  V1[0] * V1[6] * V1[9] -
1410  V1[4] * V1[1] * V1[10] +
1411  V1[4] * V1[2] * V1[9] +
1412  V1[8] * V1[1] * V1[6] -
1413  V1[8] * V1[2] * V1[5];
1414 
1415  det = V1[0] * inv[0] + V1[1] * inv[4] + V1[2] * inv[8] + V1[3] * inv[12];
1416 
1417  //if (det == 0)
1418  //return false;
1419 
1420  det = 1.0 / det;
1421 
1422  for (int i = 0; i < 16; i++)
1423  invV1[i] = inv[i] * det;
1424 
1425  for( int i=0;i<4;i++){
1426  for(int j=0;j<4;j++){
1427  transform[ j+i*4 ] = 0.f;
1428  }
1429  }
1430 
1431  // Multiply to get transformation matrix [T] = [V2]([V1]^-1)
1432  for( int i=0;i<4;i++){
1433  for(int j=0;j<4;j++){
1434  for(int k=0;k<4;k++){
1435  transform[ j+i*4 ] += V2[k+i*4]*invV1[j+k*4];
1436  }
1437  }
1438  }
1439 
1440 }
1441 
1442 void Primitive::setPrimitiveData( const char* label, const int& data ){
1443  std::vector<int> vec;
1444  vec.push_back(data);
1445  primitive_data_int[label] = vec;
1446  primitive_data_types[label] = HELIOS_TYPE_INT;
1447 }
1448

1451  vec.push_back(data);
1452  primitive_data_uint[label] = vec;
1453  primitive_data_types[label] = HELIOS_TYPE_UINT;
1454 }
1455

1458  vec.push_back(data);

1461 }

1518 
1519 void Primitive::setPrimitiveData( const char* label, HeliosDataType type, uint size, void* data ){
1520 
1521  primitive_data_types[label] = type;
1522 
1523  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
1524 
1525  int* data_ptr = (int*)data;
1526 
1527  std::vector<int> vec;
1528  vec.resize(size);
1529  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
1530  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
1531  }
1532  primitive_data_int[label] = vec;
1533 
1534  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
1535 
1536  uint* data_ptr = (uint*)data;
1537 
1538  std::vector<uint> vec;
1539  vec.resize(size);
1540  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
1541  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
1542  }
1543  primitive_data_uint[label] = vec;
1544 
1545  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
1546 
1547  float* data_ptr = (float*)data;
1548 
1549  std::vector<float> vec;
1550  vec.resize(size);
1551  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
1552  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
1553  }
1554  primitive_data_float[label] = vec;
1555 
1556  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
1557 
1558  double* data_ptr = (double*)data;
1559 
1560  std::vector<double> vec;
1561  vec.resize(size);
1562  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
1563  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
1564  }
1565  primitive_data_double[label] = vec;
1566 
1567  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
1568 
1569  vec2* data_ptr = (vec2*)data;
1570 
1571  std::vector<vec2> vec;
1572  vec.resize(size);
1573  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
1574  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
1575  }
1576  primitive_data_vec2[label] = vec;
1577 
1578  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
1579 
1580  vec3* data_ptr = (vec3*)data;
1581 
1582  std::vector<vec3> vec;
1583  vec.resize(size);
1584  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
1585  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
1586  }
1587  primitive_data_vec3[label] = vec;
1588 
1589  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
1590 
1591  vec4* data_ptr = (vec4*)data;
1592 
1593  std::vector<vec4> vec;
1594  vec.resize(size);
1595  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
1596  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
1597  }
1598  primitive_data_vec4[label] = vec;
1599 
1600  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
1601 
1602  int2* data_ptr = (int2*)data;
1603 
1604  std::vector<int2> vec;
1605  vec.resize(size);
1606  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
1607  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
1608  }
1609  primitive_data_int2[label] = vec;
1610 
1611  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
1612 
1613  int3* data_ptr = (int3*)data;
1614 
1615  std::vector<int3> vec;
1616  vec.resize(size);
1617  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
1618  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
1619  }
1620  primitive_data_int3[label] = vec;
1621 
1622  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
1623 
1624  int4* data_ptr = (int4*)data;
1625 
1626  std::vector<int4> vec;
1627  vec.resize(size);
1628  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
1629  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
1630  }
1631  primitive_data_int4[label] = vec;
1632 
1633  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
1634 
1635  std::string* data_ptr = (std::string*)data;
1636 
1637  std::vector<std::string> vec;
1638  vec.resize(size);
1639  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
1640  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
1641  }
1642  primitive_data_string[label] = vec;
1643 
1644  }
1645 
1646 }
1647 
1648 void Primitive::getPrimitiveData( const char* label, int& data ) const{
1649 
1650  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
1651  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " << label << " does not exist for primitive " << UUID << std::endl;
1652  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1653  }
1654 
1655  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
1656 
1657  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
1658  std::vector<int> d = primitive_data_int.at(label);
1659  data = d.at(0);
1660  }else{
1661  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Attempted to get data for type int, but data '" << label << "' for primitive " << UUID << " does not have type int." << std::endl;
1662  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1663  }
1664 
1665 }
1666 
1667 void Primitive::getPrimitiveData( const char* label, std::vector<int>& data ) const{
1668 
1669  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
1670  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " << label << " does not exist for primitive " << UUID << std::endl;
1671  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1672  }
1673 
1674  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
1675 
1676  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
1677  std::vector<int> d = primitive_data_int.at(label);
1678  data = d;
1679  }else{
1680  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Attempted to get data for type int, but data '" << label << "' for primitive " << UUID << " does not have type int." << std::endl;
1681  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1682  }
1683 
1684 }

1689  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " << label << " does not exist for primitive " << UUID << std::endl;
1690  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1691  }

1694 
1695  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
1696  std::vector<uint> d = primitive_data_uint.at(label);
1697  data = d.front();
1698  }else{
1699  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Attempted to get data for type uint, but data '" << label << "' for primitive " << UUID << " does not have type uint." << std::endl;

2030  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
2031  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " << label << " does not exist for primitive " << UUID << std::endl;
2032  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2033  }
2034 
2035  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
2036 
2037  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
2038  std::vector<std::string> d = primitive_data_string.at(label);
2039  data = d.front();
2040  }else{

2066 HeliosDataType Primitive::getPrimitiveDataType( const char* label ) const{
2067 
2068  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
2069  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveDataType): Primitive data " << label << " does not exist for primitive " << UUID << std::endl;
2070  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2071  }
2072 
2073  return primitive_data_types.at(label);
2074 
2075 }
2076 
2077 uint Primitive::getPrimitiveDataSize( const char* label ) const{
2078 
2079  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
2080  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveDataSize): Primitive data " << label << " does not exist for primitive " << UUID << std::endl;
2081  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2082  }
2083 
2084  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
2085 
2086  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
2087  return primitive_data_int.at(label).size();
2088  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
2089  return primitive_data_uint.at(label).size();
2090  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
2091  return primitive_data_float.at(label).size();
2092  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
2093  return primitive_data_double.at(label).size();
2094  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
2095  return primitive_data_vec2.at(label).size();
2096  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
2097  return primitive_data_vec3.at(label).size();
2098  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
2099  return primitive_data_vec4.at(label).size();
2100  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
2101  return primitive_data_int2.at(label).size();
2102  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
2103  return primitive_data_int3.at(label).size();
2104  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
2105  return primitive_data_int4.at(label).size();
2106  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
2107  return primitive_data_string.at(label).size();
2108  }else{
2109  assert( false );
2110  }
2111 
2112  return 0;
2113 
2114 }
2115 
2116 void Primitive::clearPrimitiveData( const char* label ){
2117 
2118  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
2119  return;
2120  }
2121 
2122  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
2123 
2124  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
2125  primitive_data_int.erase(label);
2126  primitive_data_types.erase(label);
2127  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
2128  primitive_data_uint.erase(label);
2129  primitive_data_types.erase(label);
2130  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
2131  primitive_data_float.erase(label);
2132  primitive_data_types.erase(label);
2133  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
2134  primitive_data_double.erase(label);
2135  primitive_data_types.erase(label);
2136  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
2137  primitive_data_vec2.erase(label);
2138  primitive_data_types.erase(label);
2139  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
2140  primitive_data_vec3.erase(label);
2141  primitive_data_types.erase(label);
2142  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
2143  primitive_data_vec4.erase(label);
2144  primitive_data_types.erase(label);
2145  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
2146  primitive_data_int2.erase(label);
2147  primitive_data_types.erase(label);
2148  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
2149  primitive_data_int3.erase(label);
2150  primitive_data_types.erase(label);
2151  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
2152  primitive_data_int4.erase(label);
2153  primitive_data_types.erase(label);
2154  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
2155  primitive_data_string.erase(label);
2156  primitive_data_types.erase(label);
2157  }else{
2158  assert(false);
2159  }
2160 
2161 }
2162 
2163 bool Primitive::doesPrimitiveDataExist( const char* label ) const{
2164 
2165  if( primitive_data_types.find(label) == primitive_data_types.end() ){
2166  return false;
2167  }else{
2168  return true;
2169  }
2170 
2171 }
2172 
2173 std::vector<std::string> Primitive::listPrimitiveData( void ) const{
2174 
2175  std::vector<std::string> labels;
2176 
2177  for( std::map<std::string,HeliosDataType>::const_iterator iter = primitive_data_types.begin(); iter!=primitive_data_types.end(); ++iter ){
2178  labels.push_back( iter->first );
2179  }
2180 
2181  return labels;
2182 
2183 }
2184 
2185 void Context::setPrimitiveData( const uint UUID, const char* label, const int& data ){
2186  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
2187  std::cerr << "ERROR (setPrimitiveData): UUID of " << UUID << " does not exist in the Context." << std::endl;
2188  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2189  }
2190  primitives.at(UUID)->setPrimitiveData(label,data);
2191 }
2192 
2193 void Context::setPrimitiveData( const uint UUID, const char* label, const uint& data ){
2194  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
2195  std::cerr << "ERROR (setPrimitiveData): UUID of " << UUID << " does not exist in the Context." << std::endl;
2196  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2197  }
2198  primitives.at(UUID)->setPrimitiveData(label,data);
2199 }
2200 
2201 void Context::setPrimitiveData( const uint UUID, const char* label, const float& data ){
2202  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
2203  std::cerr << "ERROR (setPrimitiveData): UUID of " << UUID << " does not exist in the Context." << std::endl;
2204  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2205  }
2206  primitives.at(UUID)->setPrimitiveData(label,data);
2207 }

2657 void Context::getPrimitiveData( const uint UUID, const char* label, int2& data ) const{
2658  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
2659  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): UUID of " << UUID << " does not exist in the Context." << std::endl;
2660  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2661  }
2662  primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label,data);
2663 }
2664

2667  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): UUID of " << UUID << " does not exist in the Context." << std::endl;
2668  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2669  }
2670  primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label,data);
2671 }

2752 
2753 void Context::clearPrimitiveData( const std::vector<uint> UUIDs, const char* label ){
2754  for( size_t p=0; p<UUIDs.size(); p++ ){
2755  if( primitives.find(UUIDs.at(p)) == primitives.end() ){
2756  std::cerr << "ERROR (clearPrimitiveData): UUID of " << UUIDs.at(p) << " does not exist in the Context." << std::endl;
2757  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2758  }
2759  primitives.at(UUIDs.at(p))->clearPrimitiveData(label);
2760  }
2761 }
2762 
2763 void Context::setGlobalData( const char* label, const int& data ){
2764  std::vector<int> vec;
2765  vec.push_back(data);
2766  globaldata[label].type = HELIOS_TYPE_INT;
2767  globaldata[label].size = 1;
2768  globaldata[label].global_data_int = vec;
2769 }

2850 
2851 void Context::setGlobalData( const char* label, HeliosDataType type, size_t size, void* data ){
2852 
2853  globaldata[label].type = type;
2854  globaldata[label].size = size;
2855 
2856  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
2857 
2858  int* data_ptr = (int*)data;
2859 
2860  std::vector<int> vec;
2861  vec.resize(size);
2862  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2863  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2864  }
2865  globaldata[label].global_data_int = vec;
2866 
2867  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
2868 
2869  uint* data_ptr = (uint*)data;
2870 
2871  std::vector<uint> vec;
2872  vec.resize(size);
2873  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2874  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2875  }
2876  globaldata[label].global_data_uint = vec;
2877 
2878  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
2879 
2880  float* data_ptr = (float*)data;
2881 
2882  std::vector<float> vec;
2883  vec.resize(size);
2884  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2885  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2886  }
2887  globaldata[label].global_data_float = vec;
2888 
2889  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
2890 
2891  double* data_ptr = (double*)data;
2892 
2893  std::vector<double> vec;
2894  vec.resize(size);
2895  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2896  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2897  }
2898  globaldata[label].global_data_double = vec;
2899 
2900  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
2901 
2902  vec2* data_ptr = (vec2*)data;
2903 
2904  std::vector<vec2> vec;
2905  vec.resize(size);
2906  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2907  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2908  }
2909  globaldata[label].global_data_vec2 = vec;
2910 
2911  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
2912 
2913  vec3* data_ptr = (vec3*)data;
2914 
2915  std::vector<vec3> vec;
2916  vec.resize(size);
2917  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2918  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2919  }
2920  globaldata[label].global_data_vec3= vec;
2921 
2922  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
2923 
2924  vec4* data_ptr = (vec4*)data;
2925 
2926  std::vector<vec4> vec;
2927  vec.resize(size);
2928  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2929  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2930  }
2931  globaldata[label].global_data_vec4 = vec;
2932 
2933  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
2934 
2935  int2* data_ptr = (int2*)data;
2936 
2937  std::vector<int2> vec;
2938  vec.resize(size);
2939  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2940  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2941  }
2942  globaldata[label].global_data_int2 = vec;
2943 
2944  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
2945 
2946  int3* data_ptr = (int3*)data;
2947 
2948  std::vector<int3> vec;
2949  vec.resize(size);
2950  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2951  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2952  }
2953  globaldata[label].global_data_int3 = vec;
2954 
2955  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
2956 
2957  int4* data_ptr = (int4*)data;
2958 
2959  std::vector<int4> vec;
2960  vec.resize(size);
2961  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2962  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2963  }
2964  globaldata[label].global_data_int4 = vec;
2965 
2966  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
2967 
2968  std::string* data_ptr = (std::string*)data;
2969 
2970  std::vector<std::string> vec;
2971  vec.resize(size);
2972  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2973  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2974  }
2975  globaldata[label].global_data_string = vec;
2976 
2977  }
2978 
2979 }
2980 
2981 void Context::getGlobalData( const char* label, int& data ) const{
2982 
2983  if( !doesGlobalDataExist( label ) ){
2984  std::cerr << "ERROR (getGlobalData): Primitive data " << label << " does not exist." << std::endl;
2985  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2986  }
2987 
2988  GlobalData gdata = globaldata.at(label);
2989 
2990  if( gdata.type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
2991  std::vector<int> d = gdata.global_data_int;
2992  data = d.front();
2993  }else{
2994  std::cerr << "ERROR (getGlobalData): Attempted to get global data for type int, but data does not have type int." << std::endl;
2995  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2996  }
2997 
2998 }
2999 
3000 void Context::getGlobalData( const char* label, std::vector<int>& data ) const{
3001 
3002  if( !doesGlobalDataExist( label ) ){
3003  std::cerr << "ERROR (getGlobalData): Global data " << label << " does not exist." << std::endl;
3004  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3005  }
3006 
3007  GlobalData gdata = globaldata.at(label);
3008 
3009  if( gdata.type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
3010  std::vector<int> d = gdata.global_data_int;
3011  data = d;
3012  }else{
3013  std::cerr << "ERROR (getGlobalData): Attempted to get data for type int, but data does not have type int." << std::endl;
3014  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3015  }
3016 
3017 }

3228 void Context::getGlobalData( const char* label, std::vector<helios::vec4>& data ) const{
3229 
3230  if( !doesGlobalDataExist( label ) ){
3231  std::cerr << "ERROR (getGlobalData): Global data " << label << " does not exist." << std::endl;
3232  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3233  }
3234 
3235  GlobalData gdata = globaldata.at(label);
3236 
3237  if( gdata.type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
3238  std::vector<vec4> d = gdata.global_data_vec4;
3239  data = d;
3240  }else{
3241  std::cerr << "ERROR (getGlobalData): Attempted to get data for type vec4, but data does not have type vec4." << std::endl;
3242  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3243  }
3244 
3245 }
3246 
3247 void Context::getGlobalData( const char* label, helios::int2& data ) const{
3248 
3249  if( !doesGlobalDataExist( label ) ){
3250  std::cerr << "ERROR (getGlobalData): Primitive data " << label << " does not exist." << std::endl;
3251  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3252  }
3253 
3254  GlobalData gdata = globaldata.at(label);
3255 
3256  if( gdata.type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
3257  std::vector<int2> d = gdata.global_data_int2;
3258  data = d.front();
3259  }else{
3260  std::cerr << "ERROR (getGlobalData): Attempted to get global data for type int2, but data does not have type int2." << std::endl;
3261  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3262  }
3263 
3264 }
3265

3268  if( !doesGlobalDataExist( label ) ){
3269  std::cerr << "ERROR (getGlobalData): Global data " << label << " does not exist." << std::endl;
3270  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3271  }
3272 
3273  GlobalData gdata = globaldata.at(label);
3274 
3275  if( gdata.type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
3276  std::vector<int2> d = gdata.global_data_int2;
3277  data = d;
3278  }else{
3279  std::cerr << "ERROR (getGlobalData): Attempted to get data for type int2, but data does not have type int2." << std::endl;
3280  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3281  }
3282 
3283 }

3300  }
