3399 bool Context::doesGlobalDataExist( const char* label ) const{
3400 
3401  if( globaldata.find(label) == globaldata.end() ){
3402  return false;
3403  }else{
3404  return true;
3405  }
3406 
3407 }
3408 
3409 
3410 Patch::Patch( const RGBAcolor _color_, const uint _UUID_ ){
3411 
3412  makeIdentityMatrix( transform );
3413 
3414  color = _color_;
3415  assert( color.r>=0 && color.r<=1 && color.g>=0 && color.g<=1 && color.b>=0 && color.b<=1 );
3416  UUID = _UUID_;
3417  prim_type = PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH;
3418  solid_fraction = 1.f;
3419  texture = 0;
3420  texturecoloroverridden = false;
3421 
3422 }
3423 
3424 Patch::Patch( Texture* _texture_, const uint _UUID_ ){
3425 
3426  makeIdentityMatrix( transform );
3427 
3428  UUID = _UUID_;
3429  prim_type = PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH;
3430  texture = _texture_;
3431  solid_fraction = texture->getSolidFraction();
3432  texturecoloroverridden = false;
3433 
3434 }
3435 
3436 Patch::Patch( Texture* _texture_, const std::vector<vec2> _uv_, const float _solid_fraction_, const uint _UUID_ ){
3437 
3438  makeIdentityMatrix( transform );
3439 
3440  UUID = _UUID_;
3441  prim_type = PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH;
3442 
3443  texture = _texture_;
3444  uv = _uv_;
3445  solid_fraction = _solid_fraction_;
3446  texturecoloroverridden = false;
3447 
3448 }
3449 
3450 helios::vec2 Patch::getSize(void) const{
3451  std::vector<vec3> vertices = getVertices();
3452  float l = (vertices.at(1)-vertices.at(0)).magnitude();
3453  float w = (vertices.at(3)-vertices.at(0)).magnitude();
3454  return make_vec2(l,w);
3455 }
3456 
3457 helios::vec3 Patch::getCenter(void) const{
3458  return make_vec3(transform[3],transform[7],transform[11]);
3459 }
3460 
3461 Triangle::Triangle( const vec3 vertex0, const vec3 vertex1, const vec3 vertex2, const RGBAcolor _color_, const uint _UUID_ ){
3462 
3463  makeTransformationMatrix(vertex0,vertex1,vertex2);
3464  color = _color_;
3465  UUID = _UUID_;
3466  prim_type = PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE;
3467  texture = 0;
3468  solid_fraction = 1.f;
3469  texturecoloroverridden = false;
3470 
3471 }
3472 
3473 Triangle::Triangle( const vec3 vertex0, const vec3 vertex1, const vec3 vertex2, Texture* _texture_, const std::vector<vec2> _uv_, const float _solid_fraction_, const uint _UUID_ ){
3474 
3475  makeTransformationMatrix(vertex0,vertex1,vertex2);
3476  color = make_RGBAcolor(RGB::red,1);
3477  UUID = _UUID_;
3478  prim_type = PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE;
3479 
3480  texture = _texture_;
3481  uv = _uv_;
3482  solid_fraction = _solid_fraction_;
3483  texturecoloroverridden = false;
3484 
3485 }
3486 
3487 vec3 Triangle::getVertex( int number ){
3488 
3489  if( number<0 || number>2 ){
3490  std::cerr << "getVertex ERROR: vertex number must be 0, 1, or 2." << std::endl;
3491  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3492  }
3493 
3494  vec3 Y[3];
3495  Y[0] = make_vec3( 0.f, 0.f, 0.f);
3496  Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.f, 1.f, 0.f);
3497  Y[2] = make_vec3( 1.f, 1.f, 0.f);
3498 
3499  vec3 vertex;
3500 
3501  vertex.x = transform[0] * Y[number].x + transform[1] * Y[number].y + transform[2] * Y[number].z + transform[3];
3502  vertex.y = transform[4] * Y[number].x + transform[5] * Y[number].y + transform[6] * Y[number].z + transform[7];
3503  vertex.z = transform[8] * Y[number].x + transform[9] * Y[number].y + transform[10] * Y[number].z + transform[11];
3504 
3505  return vertex;
3506 
3507 }
3508 
3509 Voxel::Voxel( const RGBAcolor _color_, const uint _UUID_ ){
3510 
3511  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
3512 
3513  color = _color_;
3514  assert( color.r>=0 && color.r<=1 && color.g>=0 && color.g<=1 && color.b>=0 && color.b<=1 );
3515  UUID = _UUID_;
3516  prim_type = PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL;
3517  texture = 0;
3518  texturecoloroverridden = false;
3519 
3520 }
3521 
3522 float Voxel::getVolume(void){
3523 
3524  return transform[0]*transform[5]*transform[10];
3525 }
3526 
3527 vec3 Voxel::getCenter(void){
3528  return make_vec3(transform[3],transform[7],transform[11]);
3529 }
3530 
3531 vec3 Voxel::getSize(void){
3532  return make_vec3(transform[0],transform[5],transform[10]);
3533 }
3534 
3535 void Context::setDate( int day, int month, int year ){
3536 
3537  if( day<1 || day>31 ){
3538  std::cerr << "ERROR (setDate): Day of month is out of range (day of " << day << " was given)." << std::endl;
3539  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3540  }else if( month<1 || month>12){
3541  std::cerr << "ERROR (setDate): Month of year is out of range (month of " << month << " was given)." << std::endl;
3542  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3543  }else if( year<1000 ){
3544  std::cerr << "ERROR (setDate): Year should be specified in YYYY format." << std::endl;
3545  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3546  }
3547 
3548  sim_date = make_Date(day,month,year);
3549 
3550  return;
3551 
3552 }
3553 
3554 void Context::setDate( Date date ){
3555 
3556  if( date.day<1 || date.day>31 ){
3557  std::cerr << "ERROR (setDate): Day of month is out of range (day of " << date.day << " was given)." << std::endl;
3558  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3559  }else if( date.month<1 || date.month>12){
3560  std::cerr << "ERROR (setDate): Month of year is out of range (month of " << date.month << " was given)." << std::endl;
3561  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3562  }else if( date.year<1000 ){
3563  std::cerr << "ERROR (setDate): Year should be specified in YYYY format." << std::endl;
3564  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3565  }
3566 
3567  sim_date = date;
3568 
3569  return;
3570 
3571 }
3572 
3573 void Context::setDate( int Julian_day, int year ){
3574 
3575  if( Julian_day<1 || Julian_day>366 ){
3576  std::cerr << "ERROR (setDate): Julian day out of range." << std::endl;
3577  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3578  }else if( year<1000 ){
3579  std::cerr << "ERROR (setDate): Year should be specified in YYYY format." << std::endl;
3580  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3581  }
3582 
3583  sim_date = CalendarDay( Julian_day, year );
3584 
3585  return;
3586 
3587 }
3588 
3589 Date Context::getDate( void ) const{
3590  return sim_date;
3591 }
3592 
3593 const char* Context::getMonthString( void ) const{
3594  if( sim_date.month==1 ){
3595  return "JAN";
3596  }else if( sim_date.month==2 ){
3597  return "FEB";
3598  }else if( sim_date.month==3 ){
3599  return "MAR";
3600  }else if( sim_date.month==4 ){
3601  return "APR";
3602  }else if( sim_date.month==5 ){
3603  return "MAY";
3604  }else if( sim_date.month==6 ){
3605  return "JUN";
3606  }else if( sim_date.month==7 ){
3607  return "JUL";
3608  }else if( sim_date.month==8 ){
3609  return "AUG";
3610  }else if( sim_date.month==9 ){
3611  return "SEP";
3612  }else if( sim_date.month==10 ){
3613  return "OCT";
3614  }else if( sim_date.month==11 ){
3615  return "NOV";
3616  }else{
3617  return "DEC";
3618  }
3619 
3620 }
3621 
3622 int Context::getJulianDate( void ) const{
3623  return JulianDay( sim_date.day, sim_date.month, sim_date.year );
3624 }
3625 
3626 void Context::setTime( int minute, int hour ){
3627  setTime(0,minute,hour);
3628 }
3629 
3630 void Context::setTime( int second, int minute, int hour ){
3631 
3632  if( second<0 || second>59 ){
3633  std::cerr << "ERROR (setTime): Second out of range (0-59)." << std::endl;
3634  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3635  }else if( minute<0 || minute>59 ){
3636  std::cerr << "ERROR (setTime): Minute out of range (0-59)." << std::endl;
3637  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3638  }else if( hour<0 || hour>23 ){
3639  std::cerr << "ERROR (setTime): Hour out of range (0-23)." << std::endl;
3640  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3641  }
3642 
3643  sim_time = make_Time(hour,minute,second);
3644 
3645 }
3646 
3647 void Context::setTime( Time time ){
3648 
3649  if( time.minute<0 || time.minute>59 ){
3650  std::cerr << "ERROR (setTime): Minute out of range (0-59)." << std::endl;
3651  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3652  }else if( time.hour<0 || time.hour>23 ){
3653  std::cerr << "ERROR (setTime): Hour out of range (0-23)." << std::endl;
3654  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3655  }
3656 
3657  sim_time = time;
3658 
3659 }
3660 
3661 Time Context::getTime( void ) const{
3662  return sim_time;
3663 }
3664 
3665 float Context::randu(void){
3666  return unif_distribution(generator);
3667 }
3668 
3669 float Context::randu( float min, float max ){
3670  if( max<min ){
3671  std::cerr << "ERROR (randu): Maximum value of range must be greater than minimum value of range." << std::endl;
3672  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3673  }else if( max==min ){
3674  return min;
3675  }else{
3676  return min+unif_distribution(generator)*(max-min);
3677  }
3678 }
3679 
3680 int Context::randu( int min, int max ){
3681  if( max<min ){
3682  std::cerr << "ERROR (randu): Maximum value of range must be greater than minimum value of range." << std::endl;
3683  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3684  }else if( max==min ){
3685  return min;
3686  }else{
3687  return min+round(unif_distribution(generator)*float(max-min));
3688  }
3689 }
3690 
3691 float Context::randn(void){
3692  return norm_distribution(generator);
3693 }
3694 
3695 float Context::randn( float mean, float stddev ){
3696  return mean+norm_distribution(generator)*fabs(stddev);
3697 }
3698 
3699 uint Context::addPatch( void ){
3700  return addPatch(make_vec3(0,0,0),make_vec2(1,1),make_SphericalCoord(0,0),make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1));
3701 }
3702 
3703 uint Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ){
3704  return addPatch(center,size,make_SphericalCoord(0,0),make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1));
3705 }
3706 
3707 uint Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation ){
3708  return addPatch(center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1));
3709 }
3710 
3711 uint Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation, const RGBcolor& color ){
3712  return addPatch(center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(color,1));
3713 }
3714 
3715 uint Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation, const RGBAcolor& color ){
3716 
3717  if( size.x==0 || size.y==0 ){
3718  std::cerr << "ERROR (addPatch): Size of patch must be greater than 0." << std::endl;
3719  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3720  }
3721 
3722  Patch* patch_new = (new Patch( color, currentUUID ));
3723 
3724  patch_new->setParentObjectID(0);
3725 
3726  patch_new->scale( make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1) );
3727 
3728  if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
3729  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.elevation, "x");
3730  }
3731  if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
3732  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.azimuth, "z");
3733  }
3734 
3735  patch_new->translate( center );
3736 
3737  primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
3738  markGeometryDirty();
3739  currentUUID++;
3740  return currentUUID-1;
3741 }
3742 
3743 uint Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation, const char* texture_file ){
3744 
3745  Texture* texture = addTexture( texture_file );
3746 
3747  Patch* patch_new = (new Patch( texture, currentUUID ));
3748 
3749  patch_new->setParentObjectID(0);
3750 
3751  assert( size.x>0.f && size.y>0.f );
3752  patch_new->scale( make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1) );
3753 
3754  if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
3755  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.elevation, "x");
3756  }
3757  if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
3758  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.azimuth, "z");
3759  }
3760 
3761  patch_new->translate( center );
3762 
3763  primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
3764  markGeometryDirty();
3765  currentUUID++;
3766  return currentUUID-1;
3767 }
3768 
3769 uint Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation,const char* texture_file, const helios::vec2& uv_center, const helios::vec2& uv_size ){
3770 
3771  if( size.x==0 || size.y==0 ){
3772  std::cerr << "ERROR (addPatch): Size of patch must be greater than 0." << std::endl;
3773  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3774  }
3775 
3776  if( uv_center.x-0.5*uv_size.x<-1e-3 || uv_center.y-0.5*uv_size.y<-1e-3 || uv_center.x+0.5*uv_size.x-1.f>1e-3 || uv_center.y+0.5*uv_size.y-1.f>1e-3 ){
3777  std::cerr << "ERROR (addPatch): Invalid texture coordinates. uv_center-0.5*uv_size should be >=0 and uv_center+0.5*uv_size should be <=1." << std::endl;
3778  std::cout << (uv_center.x-0.5*uv_size.x>=0.f) << " " << (uv_center.y-0.5*uv_size.y>=0.f) << " " << (uv_center.x+0.5*uv_size.x<=1.f) << " " << (uv_center.y+0.5*uv_size.y<=1.f) << std::endl;
3779  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3780  }
3781 
3782  Texture* texture = addTexture( texture_file );
3783 
3784  std::vector<helios::vec2> uv;
3785  uv.resize(4);
3786  uv.at(0) = uv_center+make_vec2(+0.5*uv_size.x,-0.5*uv_size.y);
3787  uv.at(1) = uv_center+make_vec2(-0.5*uv_size.x,-0.5*uv_size.y);
3788  uv.at(2) = uv_center+make_vec2(-0.5*uv_size.x,+0.5*uv_size.y);
3789  uv.at(3) = uv_center+make_vec2(+0.5*uv_size.x,+0.5*uv_size.y);
3790 
3791  float solid_fraction;
3792  if( texture->hasTransparencyChannel() ){
3793  std::vector<std::vector<bool> >* alpha = texture->getTransparencyData();
3794  int A = 0;
3795  int At = 0;
3796  int2 sz = texture->getSize();
3797  int2 uv_min( floor(uv.at(1).x*sz.x), floor(uv.at(1).y*sz.y) );
3798  int2 uv_max( floor(uv.at(3).x*sz.x), floor(uv.at(3).y*sz.y) );
3799  for( int j=uv_min.y; j<uv_max.y; j++ ){
3800  for( int i=uv_min.x; i<uv_max.x; i++ ){
3801  At += 1;
3802  if( alpha->at(j).at(i) ){
3803  A += 1;
3804  }
3805  }
3806  }
3807  if( At==0 ){
3808  solid_fraction = 0;
3809  }else{
3810  solid_fraction = float(A)/float(At);
3811  }
3812  }else{
3813  solid_fraction = 1.f;
3814  }
3815 
3816  Patch* patch_new = (new Patch( texture, uv, solid_fraction, currentUUID ));
3817 
3818  patch_new->setParentObjectID(0);
3819 
3820  assert( size.x>0.f && size.y>0.f );
3821  patch_new->scale( make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1) );
3822 
3823  if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
3824  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.elevation, "x");
3825  }
3826  if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
3827  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.azimuth, "z");
3828  }
3829 
3830  patch_new->translate( center );
3831 
3832  primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
3833  markGeometryDirty();
3834  currentUUID++;
3835  return currentUUID-1;
3836 }
3837 
3838 uint Context::addTriangle( const vec3& vertex0, const vec3& vertex1, const vec3& vertex2 ){
3839  return addTriangle( vertex0, vertex1, vertex2, make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1) );
3840 }
3841 
3842 uint Context::addTriangle( const vec3& vertex0, const vec3& vertex1, const vec3& vertex2, const RGBcolor& color ){
3843  return addTriangle( vertex0, vertex1, vertex2, make_RGBAcolor(color,1) );
3844 }
3845 
3846 bool edgeFunction(const helios::vec2 &a, const helios::vec2 &b, const helios::vec2 &c)
3847 {
3848  return ((c.y - a.y) * (b.x - a.x)-(c.x - a.x) * (b.y - a.y) >= 0);
3849 }
3850 
3851 uint Context::addTriangle( const vec3& vertex0, const vec3& vertex1, const vec3& vertex2, const RGBAcolor& color ){
3852 
3853  Triangle* tri_new = (new Triangle( vertex0, vertex1, vertex2, color, currentUUID ));
3854 
3855  tri_new->setParentObjectID(0);
3856  primitives[currentUUID] = tri_new;
3857  markGeometryDirty();
3858  currentUUID++;
3859  return currentUUID-1;
3860 }
3861 
3862 uint Context::addTriangle( const helios::vec3& vertex0, const helios::vec3& vertex1, const helios::vec3& vertex2, const char* texture_file, const helios::vec2& uv0, const helios::vec2& uv1, const helios::vec2& uv2 ){
3863 
3864  Texture* texture = addTexture( texture_file );
3865 
3866  std::vector<helios::vec2> uv;
3867  uv.resize(3);
3868  uv.at(0) = uv0;
3869  uv.at(1) = uv1;
3870  uv.at(2) = uv2;
3871 
3872  float solid_fraction;
3873  if( texture->hasTransparencyChannel() ){
3874  std::vector<std::vector<bool> >* alpha = texture->getTransparencyData();
3875  int2 sz = texture->getSize();
3876  int2 uv_min( round(fmin(fmin(uv0.x,uv1.x),uv2.x)*sz.x), round(fmin(fmin(uv0.y,uv1.y),uv2.y)*sz.y) );
3877  int2 uv_max( round(fmax(fmax(uv0.x,uv1.x),uv2.x)*sz.x), round(fmax(fmax(uv0.y,uv1.y),uv2.y)*sz.y) );
3878  int A = 0;
3879  int At = 0;
3880  vec2 xy;
3881  for( int j=uv_min.y; j<uv_max.y; j++ ){
3882  for( int i=uv_min.x; i<uv_max.x; i++ ){
3883  xy.x = float(i+0.5)/float(sz.x-1);
3884  xy.y = float(j+0.5)/float(sz.y-1);
3885  if( edgeFunction( uv.at(0), uv.at(1), xy ) && edgeFunction( uv.at(1), uv.at(2), xy )&& edgeFunction( uv.at(2), uv.at(0), xy ) ){
3886  At += 1;
3887  if( alpha->at(j).at(i) ){
3888  A += 1;
3889  }
3890  }
3891  }
3892  }
3893  if( At==0 ){
3894  solid_fraction = 0;
3895  }else{
3896  solid_fraction = float(A)/float(At);
3897  }
3898  }else{
3899  solid_fraction = 1.f;
3900  }
3901 
3902  Triangle* tri_new = (new Triangle( vertex0, vertex1, vertex2, texture, uv, solid_fraction, currentUUID ));
3903 
3904  tri_new->setParentObjectID(0);
3905  primitives[currentUUID] = tri_new;
3906  markGeometryDirty();
3907  currentUUID++;
3908  return currentUUID-1;
3909 }
3910 
3911 uint Context::addVoxel( const vec3& center, const vec3& size ){
3912  return addVoxel(center,size,0,make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1));
3913 }
3914 
3915 uint Context::addVoxel( const vec3& center, const vec3& size, const float& rotation ){
3916  return addVoxel(center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1));
3917 }
3918 
3919 uint Context::addVoxel( const vec3& center, const vec3& size, const float& rotation, const RGBcolor& color ){
3920  return addVoxel(center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(color,1));
3921 }
3922 
3923 uint Context::addVoxel( const vec3& center, const vec3& size, const float& rotation, const RGBAcolor& color ){
3924 
3925  Voxel* voxel_new = (new Voxel( color, currentUUID ));
3926 
3927  voxel_new->setParentObjectID(0);
3928 
3929  voxel_new->scale( size );
3930 
3931  if( rotation!=0 ){
3932  voxel_new->rotate( rotation, "z" );
3933  }
3934 
3935  voxel_new->translate( center );
3936 
3937  primitives[currentUUID] = voxel_new;
3938  markGeometryDirty();
3939  currentUUID++;
3940  return currentUUID-1;
3941 }
3942

3945 }

3950  }

3959  getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs.at(p))->rotate(rot,axis);
3960  }

3986  }

3988 
3989 void Context::deletePrimitive( const uint UUID ){
3990 
3991  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
3992  std::cerr << "ERROR (deletePrimitive: UUID of " << UUID << " not found in the context." << std::endl;
3993  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3994  }
3995 
3996  Primitive* prim = primitives.at(UUID);
3997 
3998  std::vector<std::string> pdata = prim->listPrimitiveData();
3999 
4000  delete prim;
4001  primitives.erase(UUID);
4002 
4003  markGeometryDirty();
4004 
4005 }
4006 
4007 std::vector<uint> Context::copyPrimitive( const std::vector<uint> UUIDs ){
4008 
4009  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_copy;
4010  for( size_t p=0; p<UUIDs.size(); p++ ){
4011  UUIDs_copy.push_back( copyPrimitive( UUIDs.at(p) ) );
4012  }
4013 
4014  return UUIDs_copy;
4015 
4016 }
4017 
4018 uint Context::copyPrimitive( const uint UUID ){
4019 
4020  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
4021  std::cerr << "ERROR (copyPrimitive: UUID of " << UUID << " not found in the context." << std::endl;
4022  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
4023  }
4024 
4025  PrimitiveType type = primitives.at(UUID)->getType();
4026 
4027  if( type==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
4028  Patch* p = getPatchPointer(UUID);
4029  std::vector<vec2> uv = p->getTextureUV();
4030  vec2 size = p->getSize();
4031  float solid_fraction = p->getArea()/(size.x*size.y);
4032  Patch* patch_new;
4033  if( !p->hasTexture() ){
4034  patch_new = (new Patch( p->getColorRGBA(), currentUUID ));
4035  }else{
4036  Texture* texture = p->getTexture();
4037  if( uv.size()==4 ){
4038  patch_new = (new Patch( texture, uv, solid_fraction, currentUUID ));
4039  }else{
4040  patch_new = (new Patch( texture, currentUUID ));
4041  }
4042  }
4043  float transform[16];
4044  p->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
4045  patch_new->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
4046  patch_new->setParentObjectID(0);
4047  primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
4048  }else if( type==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
4049  Triangle* p = getTrianglePointer(UUID);
4050  std::vector<vec3> vertices = p->getVertices();
4051  std::vector<vec2> uv = p->getTextureUV();
4052  Triangle* tri_new;
4053  if( !p->hasTexture() ){
4054  tri_new = (new Triangle( vertices.at(0), vertices.at(1), vertices.at(2), p->getColorRGBA(), currentUUID ));
4055  }else{
4056  Texture* texture = p->getTexture();
4057  float solid_fraction = p->getArea()/calculateTriangleArea( vertices.at(0), vertices.at(1), vertices.at(2) );
4058  tri_new = (new Triangle( vertices.at(0), vertices.at(1), vertices.at(2), texture, uv, solid_fraction, currentUUID ));
4059  }
4060  float transform[16];
4061  p->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
4062  tri_new->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
4063  tri_new->setParentObjectID(0);
4064  primitives[currentUUID] = tri_new;
4065  }else if( type==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL ){
4066  Voxel* p = getVoxelPointer(UUID);
4067  Voxel* voxel_new;
4068  if( !p->hasTexture() ){
4069  voxel_new = (new Voxel( p->getColorRGBA(), currentUUID ));
4070  }else{
4071  voxel_new = (new Voxel( p->getColorRGBA(), currentUUID ));
4072  /* \todo Texture-mapped voxels constructor here */
4073  }
4074  float transform[16];
4075  p->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
4076  voxel_new->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
4077  voxel_new->setParentObjectID(0);
4078  primitives[currentUUID] = voxel_new;
4079  }
4080 
4081  //copy the primitive data
4082  std::vector<std::string> plabel = getPrimitivePointer(UUID)->listPrimitiveData();
4083  for( uint p=0; p<plabel.size(); p++ ){
4084 
4085  HeliosDataType type = getPrimitiveDataType( UUID, plabel.at(p).c_str() );
4086 
4087  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
4088  std::vector<int> pdata;
4089  getPrimitiveData( UUID, plabel.at(p).c_str(), pdata );
4090  setPrimitiveData( currentUUID, plabel.at(p).c_str(), HELIOS_TYPE_INT, pdata.size(), &pdata.at(0) );
4091  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
4092  std::vector<uint> pdata;
4093  getPrimitiveData( UUID, plabel.at(p).c_str(), pdata );
4094  setPrimitiveData( currentUUID, plabel.at(p).c_str(), HELIOS_TYPE_UINT, pdata.size(), &pdata.at(0) );
4095  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
4096  std::vector<float> pdata;
4097  getPrimitiveData( UUID, plabel.at(p).c_str(), pdata );
4098  setPrimitiveData( currentUUID, plabel.at(p).c_str(), HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT, pdata.size(), &pdata.at(0) );
4099  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
4100  std::vector<double> pdata;
4101  getPrimitiveData( UUID, plabel.at(p).c_str(), pdata );
4102  setPrimitiveData( currentUUID, plabel.at(p).c_str(), HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE, pdata.size(), &pdata.at(0) );
4103  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
4104  std::vector<vec2> pdata;
4105  getPrimitiveData( UUID, plabel.at(p).c_str(), pdata );
4106  setPrimitiveData( currentUUID, plabel.at(p).c_str(), HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2, pdata.size(), &pdata.at(0) );
4107  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
4108  std::vector<vec3> pdata;
4109  getPrimitiveData( UUID, plabel.at(p).c_str(), pdata );
4110  setPrimitiveData( currentUUID, plabel.at(p).c_str(), HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3, pdata.size(), &pdata.at(0) );
4111  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
4112  std::vector<vec4> pdata;
4113  getPrimitiveData( UUID, plabel.at(p).c_str(), pdata );
4114  setPrimitiveData( currentUUID, plabel.at(p).c_str(), HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4, pdata.size(), &pdata.at(0) );
4115  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
4116  std::vector<int2> pdata;
4117  getPrimitiveData( UUID, plabel.at(p).c_str(), pdata );
4118  setPrimitiveData( currentUUID, plabel.at(p).c_str(), HELIOS_TYPE_INT2, pdata.size(), &pdata.at(0) );
4119  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
4120  std::vector<int3> pdata;
4121  getPrimitiveData( UUID, plabel.at(p).c_str(), pdata );
4122  setPrimitiveData( currentUUID, plabel.at(p).c_str(), HELIOS_TYPE_INT3, pdata.size(), &pdata.at(0) );
4123  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
4124  std::vector<int4> pdata;
4125  getPrimitiveData( UUID, plabel.at(p).c_str(), pdata );
4126  setPrimitiveData( currentUUID, plabel.at(p).c_str(), HELIOS_TYPE_INT4, pdata.size(), &pdata.at(0) );
4127  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
4128  std::vector<std::string> pdata;
4129  getPrimitiveData( UUID, plabel.at(p).c_str(), pdata );
4130  setPrimitiveData( currentUUID, plabel.at(p).c_str(), HELIOS_TYPE_STRING, pdata.size(), &pdata.at(0) );
4131  }else{
4132  assert(false);
4133  }
4134 
4135  }
4136 
4137  markGeometryDirty();
4138  currentUUID++;
4139  return currentUUID-1;
4140 }
4141 
4142 Primitive* Context::getPrimitivePointer( uint UUID ) const{
4143  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
4144  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitivePointer): UUID of " << UUID << " does not exist in the Context." << std::endl;
4145  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
4146  }
4147  return primitives.at(UUID);
4148 }
4149 
4150 bool Context::doesPrimitiveExist( const uint UUID ) const{
4151  return primitives.find(UUID) != primitives.end();
4152 }
4153 
4154 Patch* Context::getPatchPointer( const uint UUID ) const{
4155  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
4156  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPatchPointer): UUID of " << UUID << " not found in the context." << std::endl;
4157  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
4158  }else if( primitives.at(UUID)->getType()!=PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
4159  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPatchPointer): Primitive " << UUID << " is not a patch." << std::endl;
4160  }
4161  return static_cast<Patch*>(primitives.at(UUID));
4162 }
4163 Triangle* Context::getTrianglePointer( const uint UUID ) const{
4164  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
4165  std::cerr << "ERROR (getTrianglePointer): UUID of " << UUID << " not found in the context." << std::endl;
4166  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
4167  }else if( primitives.at(UUID)->getType()!=PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
4168  std::cerr << "ERROR (getTrianglePointer): Primitive " << UUID << " is not a triangle." << std::endl;
4169  }
4170  return static_cast<Triangle*>(primitives.at(UUID));
4171 }
4172 
4173 Voxel* Context::getVoxelPointer( const uint UUID ) const{
4174  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
4175  std::cerr << "ERROR (getVoxelPointer): UUID of " << UUID << " not found in the context." << std::endl;
4176  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
4177  }else if( primitives.at(UUID)->getType()!=PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL ){
4178  std::cerr << "ERROR (getVoxelPointer): Primitive " << UUID << " is not a voxel." << std::endl;
4179  }
4180  return static_cast<Voxel*>(primitives.at(UUID));
4181 }

4183 uint Context::getPrimitiveCount( void ) const{
4184  return primitives.size();
4185 }
4186 
4187 std::vector<uint> Context::getAllUUIDs( void ) const{
4188  std::vector<uint> UUIDs;
4189  UUIDs.resize(primitives.size());
4190  size_t i=0;
4191  for(std::map<uint,Primitive*>::const_iterator iter = primitives.begin(); iter != primitives.end(); ++iter){
4192  UUIDs.at(i) = iter->first;
4193  i++;
4194  }
4195  return UUIDs;
4196 }
4197 
4198 void Context::addTimeseriesData( const char* label, float value, Date date, Time time ){
4199 
4200  //floating point value corresponding to date and time
4201  double date_value = floor(date.year*366.25) + date.JulianDay();
4202  date_value += double(time.hour)/24. + double(time.minute)/1440. + double(time.second)/86400.;
4203 
4204  //Check if data label already exists
4205  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
4206  timeseries_data[label].push_back( value );
4207  timeseries_datevalue[label].push_back( date_value );
4208  return;
4209  }else{ //exists
4210 
4211  uint N = getTimeseriesLength(label);
4212 
4213  std::vector<float>::iterator it_data = timeseries_data[label].begin();
4214  std::vector<double>::iterator it_datevalue = timeseries_datevalue[label].begin();
4215 
4216  if( N==1 ){
4217 
4218  if( date_value<timeseries_datevalue[label].front() ){
4219  timeseries_data[label].insert(it_data, value);
4220  timeseries_datevalue[label].insert(it_datevalue, date_value);
4221  return;
4222  }else{
4223  timeseries_data[label].insert(it_data+1, value);
4224  timeseries_datevalue[label].insert(it_datevalue+1, date_value);
4225  return;
4226  }
4227 
4228  }else{
4229 
4230  if( date_value<timeseries_datevalue[label].front() ){ //check if data should be inserted at beginning of timeseries
4231  timeseries_data[label].insert(it_data, value);
4232  timeseries_datevalue[label].insert(it_datevalue, date_value);
4233  return;
4234  }else if( date_value>timeseries_datevalue[label].back() ){ //check if data should be inserted at end of timeseries
4235  timeseries_data[label].push_back( value);
4236  timeseries_datevalue[label].push_back( date_value);
4237  return;
4238  }
4239 
4240  //data should be inserted somewhere in the middle of timeseries
4241  for( uint t=0; t<N-1; t++ ){
4242  if( date_value==timeseries_datevalue[label].at(t) ){
4243  std::cout << "WARNING (addTimeseriesData): Skipping duplicate timeseries date/time." << std::endl;
4244  continue;
4245  }
4246  if( date_value>timeseries_datevalue[label].at(t) && date_value<timeseries_datevalue[label].at(t+1) ){
4247  timeseries_data[label].insert(it_data+t+1, value);
4248  timeseries_datevalue[label].insert(it_datevalue+t+1, date_value);
4249  return;
4250  }
4251  }
4252 
4253  }
4254 
4255  }
4256 
4257  std::cerr << "ERROR (addTimeseriesData): Failed to insert timeseries data for unknown reason." << std::endl;
4258  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
4259 
4260 }
4261 
4262 void Context::setCurrentTimeseriesPoint( const char* label, const uint index ){
4263  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
4264  std::cerr << "ERROR (setCurrentTimeseriesPoint): Timeseries variable `" << label << "' does not exist." << std::endl;
4265  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
4266  }
4267  setDate( queryTimeseriesDate( label, index ) );
4268  setTime( queryTimeseriesTime( label, index ) );
4269 }
4270 
4271 float Context::queryTimeseriesData( const char* label, const Date date, const Time time ) const{
4272  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
4273  std::cerr << "ERROR (queryTimeseriesData): Timeseries variable `" << label << "' does not exist." << std::endl;
4274  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
4275  }
4276 
4277  double date_value = floor(date.year*366.25) + date.JulianDay();
4278  date_value += double(time.hour)/24. + double(time.minute)/1440. + double(time.second)/86400.;
4279 
4280  double tmin = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).front();
4281  double tmax = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).back();
4282 
4283  if( date_value<tmin ){
4284  std::cerr << "WARNING (queryTimeseriesData): Timeseries date and time is outside of the range of the data. Using the earliest data point in the timeseries." << std::endl;
4285  return timeseries_data.at(label).front();
4286  }else if( date_value>tmax ){
4287  std::cout << date_value << " " << tmax << std::endl;
4288  std::cerr << "WARNING (queryTimeseriesData): Timeseries date and time is outside of the range of the data. Using the latest data point in the timeseries." << std::endl;
4289  return timeseries_data.at(label).back();
4290  }
4291 
4292  if( timeseries_datevalue.at(label).size() == 0 ){
4293  std::cout << "WARNING (queryTimeseriesData): timeseries " << label << " does not contain any data." << std::endl;
4294  return 0;
4295  }else if( timeseries_datevalue.at(label).size() == 1 ){
4296  return timeseries_data.at(label).front();
4297  }else{
4298  int i;
4299  bool success=false;
4300  for( i=0; i<timeseries_data.at(label).size()-1; i++ ){
4301  if( date_value>=timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(i) && date_value<=timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(i+1) ){
4302  success = true;
4303  break;
4304  }
4305  }
4306 
4307  if(!success){
4308 
4309  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
4310  }
4311 
4312  double xminus = timeseries_data.at(label).at(i);
4313  double xplus = timeseries_data.at(label).at(i+1);
4314 
4315  double tminus = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(i);
4316  double tplus = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(i+1);
4317 
4318  return xminus + (xplus-xminus)*(date_value-tminus)/(tplus-tminus);
4319 
4320  }
4321 
4322 }
4323 
4324 float Context::queryTimeseriesData( const char* label, const uint index ) const{
4325 
4326  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
4327  std::cerr << "ERROR (getTimeseriesData): Timeseries variable `" << label << "' does not exist." << std::endl;
4328  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
4329  }
4330 
4331  return timeseries_data.at(label).at(index);
4332 
4333 }
4334 
4335 Time Context::queryTimeseriesTime( const char* label, const uint index ) const{
4336 
4337  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
4338  std::cerr << "ERROR (getTimeseriesTime): Timeseries variable `" << label << "' does not exist." << std::endl;
4339  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
4340  }
4341 
4342  double dateval = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(index);
4343 
4344  int year = floor(floor(dateval)/366.25);
4345  assert( year>1000 && year<10000 );
4346 
4347  int JD = floor(dateval-floor(double(year)*366.25));
4348  assert( JD>0 && JD<367 );
4349 
4350  int hour = floor((dateval-floor(dateval))*24.);
4351  int minute = floor( ((dateval-floor(dateval))*24.-double(hour))*60. );
4352  int second = round( ( ( ( dateval - floor(dateval) )*24. - double(hour))*60. - double(minute) )*60.);
4353 
4354  if( second==60 ){
4355  second = 0;
4356  minute ++;
4357  }
4358 
4359  if( minute==60 ){
4360  minute = 0;
4361  hour ++;
4362  }
4363 
4364  assert( second>=0 && second<60 );
4365  assert( minute>=0 && minute<60 );
4366  assert( hour>=0 && hour<24 );
4367 
4368  return make_Time(hour,minute,second);
4369 
4370 }
4371 
4372 Date Context::queryTimeseriesDate( const char* label, const uint index ) const{
4373 
4374  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
4375  std::cerr << "ERROR (getTimeseriesDate): Timeseries variable `" << label << "' does not exist." << std::endl;
4376  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
4377  }
4378 
4379  double dateval = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(index);
4380 
4381  int year = floor(floor(dateval)/366.25);
4382  assert( year>1000 && year<10000 );
4383 
4384  int JD = floor(dateval-floor(double(year)*366.25));
4385  assert( JD>0 && JD<367 );
4386 
4387  Date date = Julian2Calendar(JD,year);
4388 
4389  return Julian2Calendar(JD,year);
4390 
4391 }
4392 
4393 uint Context::getTimeseriesLength( const char* label ) const{
4394 
4395  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
4396  std::cerr << "ERROR (getTimeseriesLength): Timeseries variable `" << label << "' does not exist." << std::endl;
4397  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
4398  }else{
4399  return timeseries_data.at(label).size();
4400  }
4401 
4402 }
4403 
4404 void Context::getDomainBoundingBox( vec2& xbounds, vec2& ybounds, vec2& zbounds ) const{
4405 
4406  xbounds.x = 1e8;
4407  xbounds.y = -1e8;
4408  ybounds.x = 1e8;
4409  ybounds.y = -1e8;
4410  zbounds.x = 1e8;
4411  zbounds.y = -1e8;
4412 
4413  for( std::map<uint,Primitive*>::const_iterator iter = primitives.begin(); iter != primitives.end(); ++iter ){
4414 
4415  std::vector<vec3> verts = getPrimitivePointer(iter->first)->getVertices();
4416 
4417  for( int j=0; j<verts.size(); j++ ){
4418  if( verts[j].x<xbounds.x ){
4419  xbounds.x = verts[j].x;
4420  }else if( verts[j].x>xbounds.y ){
4421  xbounds.y = verts[j].x;
4422  }
4423  if( verts[j].y<ybounds.x ){
4424  ybounds.x = verts[j].y;
4425  }else if( verts[j].y>ybounds.y ){
4426  ybounds.y = verts[j].y;
4427  }
4428  if( verts[j].z<zbounds.x ){
4429  zbounds.x = verts[j].z;
4430  }else if( verts[j].z>zbounds.y ){
4431  zbounds.y = verts[j].z;
4432  }
4433  }
4434 
4435  }
4436 
4437  return;
4438 
4439 }
4440 
4441 void Context::getDomainBoundingBox( const std::vector<uint>& UUIDs, vec2& xbounds, vec2& ybounds, vec2& zbounds ) const{
4442 
4443  xbounds.x = 1e8;
4444  xbounds.y = -1e8;
4445  ybounds.x = 1e8;
4446  ybounds.y = -1e8;
4447  zbounds.x = 1e8;
4448  zbounds.y = -1e8;
4449 
4450  for( int p=0; p<UUIDs.size(); p++ ){
4451 
4452  std::vector<vec3> verts = getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at(p) )->getVertices();
4453 
4454  for( int j=0; j<verts.size(); j++ ){
4455  if( verts[j].x<xbounds.x ){
4456  xbounds.x = verts[j].x;
4457  }else if( verts[j].x>xbounds.y ){
4458  xbounds.y = verts[j].x;
4459  }
4460  if( verts[j].y<ybounds.x ){
4461  ybounds.x = verts[j].y;
4462  }else if( verts[j].y>ybounds.y ){
4463  ybounds.y = verts[j].y;
4464  }
4465  if( verts[j].z<zbounds.x ){
4466  zbounds.x = verts[j].z;
4467  }else if( verts[j].z>zbounds.y ){
4468  zbounds.y = verts[j].z;
4469  }
4470  }
4471 
4472  }
4473 
4474  return;
4475 
4476 }
4477 
4478 void Context::getDomainBoundingSphere( vec3& center, float& radius ) const{
4479 
4480  vec2 xbounds, ybounds, zbounds;
4481  getDomainBoundingBox( xbounds, ybounds, zbounds );
4482 
4483  center.x = xbounds.x+0.5f*(xbounds.y - xbounds.x);
4484  center.y = ybounds.x+0.5f*(ybounds.y - ybounds.x);
4485  center.z = zbounds.x+0.5f*(zbounds.y - zbounds.x);
4486 
4487  radius = 0.5f*sqrtf( pow(xbounds.y-xbounds.x,2) + pow(ybounds.y-ybounds.x,2) + pow((zbounds.y-zbounds.x),2) );
4488 
4489 
4490 }
4491 
4492 void Context::getDomainBoundingSphere( const std::vector<uint>& UUIDs, vec3& center, float& radius ) const{
4493 
4494  vec2 xbounds, ybounds, zbounds;
4495  getDomainBoundingBox( UUIDs, xbounds, ybounds, zbounds );
4496 
4497  center.x = xbounds.x+0.5f*(xbounds.y - xbounds.x);
4498  center.y = ybounds.x+0.5f*(ybounds.y - ybounds.x);
4499  center.z = zbounds.x+0.5f*(zbounds.y - zbounds.x);
4500 
4501  radius = 0.5f*sqrtf( pow(xbounds.y-xbounds.x,2) + pow(ybounds.y-ybounds.x,2) + pow((zbounds.y-zbounds.x),2) );
4502 
4503 
4504 }
4505 
4506 void Context::cropDomainX( const helios::vec2 xbounds ){
4507 
4508  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
4509 
4510  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_all = getAllUUIDs();
4511 
4512  for( size_t p=0; p<UUIDs_all.size(); p++ ){
4513 
4514  vertices = getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs_all.at(p))->getVertices();
4515 
4516  for( int i=0; i<vertices.size(); i++ ){
4517  if( vertices.at(i).x<xbounds.x || vertices.at(i).x>xbounds.y ){
4518  deletePrimitive( UUIDs_all.at(p) );
4519  break;
4520  }
4521  }
4522 
4523  }
4524 
4525  if( getPrimitiveCount()==0 ){
4526  std::cout << "WARNING (cropDomainX): No primitives were inside cropped area, and thus all primitives were deleted." << std::endl;
4527  }
4528 
4529 }
4530 
4531 void Context::cropDomainY( const helios::vec2 ybounds ){
4532 
4533  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
4534 
4535  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_all = getAllUUIDs();
4536 
4537  for( size_t p=0; p<UUIDs_all.size(); p++ ){
4538 
4539  vertices = getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs_all.at(p))->getVertices();
4540 
4541  for( int i=0; i<vertices.size(); i++ ){
4542  if( vertices.at(i).y<ybounds.x || vertices.at(i).y>ybounds.y ){
4543  deletePrimitive( UUIDs_all.at(p) );
4544  break;
4545  }
4546  }
4547 
4548  }
4549 
4550  if( getPrimitiveCount()==0 ){
4551  std::cout << "WARNING (cropDomainY): No primitives were inside cropped area, and thus all primitives were deleted." << std::endl;
4552  }
4553 
4554 }
4555 
4556 void Context::cropDomainZ( const helios::vec2 zbounds ){
4557 
4558  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
4559 
4560  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_all = getAllUUIDs();
4561 
4562  for( size_t p=0; p<UUIDs_all.size(); p++ ){
4563 
4564  vertices = getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs_all.at(p))->getVertices();
4565 
4566  for( int i=0; i<vertices.size(); i++ ){
4567  if( vertices.at(i).z<zbounds.x || vertices.at(i).z>zbounds.y ){
4568  deletePrimitive( UUIDs_all.at(p) );
4569  break;
4570  }
4571  }
4572 
4573  }
4574 
4575  if( getPrimitiveCount()==0 ){
4576  std::cout << "WARNING (cropDomainZ): No primitives were inside cropped area, and thus all primitives were deleted." << std::endl;
4577  }
4578 
4579 }
4580 
4581 void Context::cropDomain( const helios::vec2 xbounds, const helios::vec2 ybounds, const helios::vec2 zbounds ){
4582 
4583  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
4584 
4585  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_all = getAllUUIDs();
4586 
4587  for( size_t p=0; p<UUIDs_all.size(); p++ ){
4588 
4589  vertices = getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs_all.at(p))->getVertices();
4590 
4591  for( int i=0; i<vertices.size(); i++ ){
4592  if( vertices.at(i).x<xbounds.x || vertices.at(i).x>xbounds.y ){
4593  deletePrimitive( UUIDs_all.at(p) );
4594  break;
4595  }
4596  if( vertices.at(i).y<ybounds.x || vertices.at(i).y>ybounds.y ){
4597  deletePrimitive( UUIDs_all.at(p) );
4598  break;
4599  }
4600  if( vertices.at(i).z<zbounds.x || vertices.at(i).z>zbounds.y ){
4601  deletePrimitive( UUIDs_all.at(p) );
4602  break;
4603  }
4604  }
4605 
4606  }
4607 
4608  if( getPrimitiveCount()==0 ){
4609  std::cout << "WARNING (cropDomain): No primitives were inside cropped area, and thus all primitives were deleted." << std::endl;
4610  }
4611 
4612 }

4614 uint CompoundObject::getObjectID( void ) const{
4615  return OID;

4618 helios::ObjectType CompoundObject::getObjectType( void ) const{
4619  return type;
4620 }

4622 uint CompoundObject::getPrimitiveCount( void ) const{
4623  return UUIDs.size();
4624 }
4625 
4626 
4627 std::vector<uint> CompoundObject::getPrimitiveUUIDs( void ) const{
4628 
4629  std::vector<uint> U;
4630 
4631  for( size_t o=0; o<UUIDs.size(); o++ ){
4632 
4633  /* \todo More efficient implementation possible. Copy all UUIDs to vector U, and swap-and-pop to delete if the primitive doesn't exist. */
4634  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUIDs.at(o) ) ){
4635  U.push_back( UUIDs.at(o) );
4636  }
4637  }
4638 
4639  return U;
4640 
4641 }
4642 
4643 bool CompoundObject::doesObjectContainPrimitive( const uint UUID ){
4644 
4645  return find(UUIDs.begin(),UUIDs.end(),UUID)!=UUIDs.end();
4646 
4647 }
4648 
4649 helios::vec3 CompoundObject::getObjectCenter( void ) const{
4650 
4651  vec2 xbounds, ybounds, zbounds;
4652 
4653  std::vector<uint> U = getPrimitiveUUIDs();
4654 
4655  context->getDomainBoundingBox( U, xbounds, ybounds, zbounds );
4656 
4657  vec3 origin;
4658 
4659  origin.x = 0.5f*(xbounds.x+xbounds.y);
4660  origin.y = 0.5f*(ybounds.x+ybounds.y);
4661  origin.z = 0.5f*(zbounds.x+zbounds.y);
4662 
4663  return origin;
4664 }
4665 
4666 float CompoundObject::getArea( void ) const{
4667 
4668  float area = 0.f;
4669 
4670  for( size_t o=0; o<UUIDs.size(); o++ ){
4671 
4672  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUIDs.at(o) ) ){
4673  area += context->getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at(o) )->getArea();
4674  }
4675 
4676  }
4677 
4678  return area;
4679 
4680 }
4681 
4682 void CompoundObject::setColor( const helios::RGBcolor __color ){
4683  for( size_t o=0; o<UUIDs.size(); o++ ){
4684 
4685  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUIDs.at(o) ) ){
4686  context->getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at(o) )->setColor( __color );
4687  }
4688 
4689  }
4690 
4691  color = make_RGBAcolor(__color, 1.f);
4692 
4693 }

4699  context->getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at(o) )->setColor( __color );
4700  }
4701 
4702  }
4703

4739 
4740 void CompoundObject::scale( const vec3 S ){
4741 
4742  float T[16], T_prim[16];
4743  makeScaleMatrix(S,T);
4744  matmult(T,transform,transform);
4745 
4746  for( size_t o=0; o<UUIDs.size(); o++ ){
4747 
4748  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUIDs.at(o) ) ){
4749 
4750  context->getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at(o) )->getTransformationMatrix(T_prim);
4751  matmult(T,T_prim,T_prim);
4752  context->getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at(o) )->setTransformationMatrix(T_prim);
4753 
4754  }
4755 
4756  }
4757 
4758 }
4759 
4760 void CompoundObject::translate( const helios::vec3 shift ){
4761 
4762  float T[16], T_prim[16];
4763  makeTranslationMatrix(shift,T);
4764 
4765  matmult(T,transform,transform);
4766 
4767  for( size_t o=0; o<UUIDs.size(); o++ ){
4768 
4769  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUIDs.at(o) ) ){
4770 
4771  context->getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at(o) )->getTransformationMatrix(T_prim);
4772  matmult(T,T_prim,T_prim);
4773  context->getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at(o) )->setTransformationMatrix(T_prim);
4774  }
4775 
4776  }
4777 
4778 }
4779 
4780 void CompoundObject::rotate( const float rot, const char* axis ){
4781 
4782  if( strcmp(axis,"z")==0 ){
4783  float Rz[16], Rz_prim[16];
4784  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"z",Rz);
4785  matmult(Rz,transform,transform);
4786 
4787  for( size_t o=0; o<UUIDs.size(); o++ ){
4788  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUIDs.at(o) ) ){
4789  context->getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at(o) )->getTransformationMatrix(Rz_prim);
4790  matmult(Rz,Rz_prim,Rz_prim);
4791  context->getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at(o) )->setTransformationMatrix(Rz_prim);
4792  }
4793  }
4794  }else if( strcmp(axis,"y")==0 ){
4795  float Ry[16], Ry_prim[16];
4796  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"y",Ry);
4797  matmult(Ry,transform,transform);
4798  for( size_t o=0; o<UUIDs.size(); o++ ){
4799  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUIDs.at(o) ) ){
4800  context->getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at(o) )->getTransformationMatrix(Ry_prim);
4801  matmult(Ry,Ry_prim,Ry_prim);
4802  context->getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at(o) )->setTransformationMatrix(Ry_prim);
4803  }
4804  }
4805  }else if( strcmp(axis,"x")==0 ){
4806  float Rx[16], Rx_prim[16];
4807  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"x",Rx);
4808  matmult(Rx,transform,transform);
4809  for( size_t o=0; o<UUIDs.size(); o++ ){
4810  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUIDs.at(o) ) ){
4811  context->getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at(o) )->getTransformationMatrix(Rx_prim);
4812  matmult(Rx,Rx_prim,Rx_prim);
4813  context->getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at(o) )->setTransformationMatrix(Rx_prim);
4814  }
4815  }
4816  }else{
4817  std::cerr << "ERROR (CompoundObject::rotate): Rotation axis should be one of x, y, or z." << std::endl;
4818  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
4819  }
4820 
4821 }
4822 
4823 void CompoundObject::rotate( const float rot, const helios::vec3 axis ){
4824 
4825  float R[16], R_prim[16];
4826  makeRotationMatrix(rot,axis,R);
4827  matmult(R,transform,transform);
4828 
4829  for( size_t o=0; o<UUIDs.size(); o++ ){
4830 
4831  if( context->doesPrimitiveExist( UUIDs.at(o) ) ){
4832 
4833  context->getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at(o) )->getTransformationMatrix(R_prim);
4834  matmult(R,R_prim,R_prim);
4835  context->getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at(o) )->setTransformationMatrix(R_prim);
4836 
4837  }
4838 
4839  }
4840 
4841 }
4842 
4843 void CompoundObject::getTransformationMatrix( float (&T)[16] ) const{
4844  for( int i=0; i<16; i++ ){
4845  T[i]=transform[i];
4846  }
4847 }
4848 
4849 void CompoundObject::setTransformationMatrix( float (&T)[16] ){
4850 
4851  for( int i=0; i<16; i++ ){
4852  transform[i] = T[i];
4853  }
4854 
4855 }
4856 
4857 CompoundObject* Context::getObjectPointer( uint ObjID ) const{
4858  if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
4859  std::cerr << "ERROR (getObjectPointer): ObjectID of " << ObjID << " does not exist in the Context." << std::endl;
4860  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
4861  }
4862  return objects.at(ObjID);
4863 }
4864 
4865 bool Context::doesObjectExist( const uint ObjID ) const{
4866  return objects.find(ObjID) != objects.end();
4867 }
4868 
4869 std::vector<uint> Context::getAllObjectIDs( void ) const{
4870  std::vector<uint> objIDs;
4871  objIDs.resize(objects.size());
4872  size_t i=0;
4873  for(std::map<uint,CompoundObject*>::const_iterator iter = objects.begin(); iter != objects.end(); ++iter){
4874  objIDs.at(i) = iter->first;
4875  i++;
4876  }
4877  return objIDs;
4878 }
4879 
4880 void Context::deleteObject( const std::vector<uint> ObjIDs ){
4881  for( size_t p=0; p<ObjIDs.size(); p++ ){
4882  deleteObject( ObjIDs.at(p) );
4883  }
4884 }
4885 
4886 void Context::deleteObject( const uint ObjID ){
4887 
4888  if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
4889  std::cerr << "ERROR (deleteObject): Object ID of " <<ObjID << " not found in the context." << std::endl;
4890  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
4891  }
4892 
4893  CompoundObject* obj = objects.at(ObjID);
4894 
4895  std::vector<uint> UUIDs = obj->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
4896  deletePrimitive(UUIDs);
4897 
4898  delete obj;
4899  objects.erase(ObjID);
4900 
4901  markGeometryDirty();
4902 
4903 }
4904 
4905 std::vector<uint> Context::copyObject( const std::vector<uint> ObjIDs ){
4906 
4907  std::vector<uint> ObjIDs_copy;
4908  for( size_t p=0; p<ObjIDs.size(); p++ ){
4909  ObjIDs_copy.push_back( copyObject( ObjIDs.at(p) ) );
4910  }
4911 
4912  return ObjIDs_copy;
4913 
4914 }
4915 
4916 uint Context::copyObject( const uint ObjID ){
4917 
4918  if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
4919  std::cerr << "ERROR (copyObject: Object ID of " <<ObjID << " not found in the context." << std::endl;
4920  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
4921  }
4922 
4923  ObjectType type = objects.at(ObjID)->getObjectType();
4924 
4925  std::vector<uint> UUIDs = getObjectPointer(ObjID)->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
4926 
4927  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_copy = copyPrimitive( UUIDs );
4928 
4929  if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_TILE ){
4930 
4931  Tile* o = getTileObjectPointer( ObjID );
4932 
4933  vec2 size = o->getSize();
4934  int2 subdiv = o->getSubdivisionCount();
4935 
4936  Tile* tile_new = (new Tile( currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, size, subdiv, this ) );
4937 
4938  objects[currentObjectID] = tile_new;
4939 
4940  }else if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_SPHERE ){
4941 
4942  Sphere* o = getSphereObjectPointer( ObjID );
4943 
4944  float radius = o->getRadius();
4945  uint subdiv = o->getSubdivisionCount();
4946 
4947  Sphere* sphere_new = (new Sphere( currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, radius, subdiv, this ) );
4948 
4949  objects[currentObjectID] = sphere_new;
4950 
4951  }else if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_TUBE ){
4952 
4953  Tube* o = getTubeObjectPointer( ObjID );
4954 
4955  std::vector<vec3> nodes = o->getNodes();
4956  std::vector<float> radius = o->getNodeRadii();
4957  uint subdiv = o->getSubdivisionCount();
4958 
4959  Tube* tube_new = (new Tube( currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, nodes, radius, subdiv, this ) );
4960 
4961  objects[currentObjectID] = tube_new;
4962 
4963  }else if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_BOX ){
4964 
4965  Box* o = getBoxObjectPointer( ObjID );
4966 
4967  vec3 size = o->getSize();
4968  int3 subdiv = o->getSubdivisionCount();
4969 
4970  Box* box_new = (new Box( currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, size, subdiv, this ) );
4971 
4972  objects[currentObjectID] = box_new;
4973 
4974  }else if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_DISK ){
4975 
4976  Disk* o = getDiskObjectPointer( ObjID );
4977 
4978  vec2 size = o->getSize();
4979  uint subdiv = o->getSubdivisionCount();
4980 
4981  Disk* disk_new = (new Disk( currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, size, subdiv, this ) );
4982 
4983  objects[currentObjectID] = disk_new;
4984 
4985  }else if( type==OBJECT_TYPE_POLYMESH ){
4986 
4987  Polymesh* o = getPolymeshObjectPointer( ObjID );
4988 
4989  Polymesh* polymesh_new = (new Polymesh( currentObjectID, UUIDs_copy, this ) );
4990 
4991  objects[currentObjectID] = polymesh_new;
4992 
4993  }
4994 
4995 
4996  markGeometryDirty();
4997  currentObjectID++;
4998  return currentObjectID-1;
4999 }
5000 
5001 Tile::Tile( const uint __OID, const std::vector<uint> __UUIDs, const helios::vec2 __size, const helios::int2 __subdiv, helios::Context* __context ){
5002 
5003  makeIdentityMatrix( transform );
5004 
5005  OID = __OID;
5006  type = helios::OBJECT_TYPE_TILE;
5007  UUIDs = __UUIDs;
5008  size = __size;
5009  subdiv = __subdiv;
5010  context = __context;
5011 
5012 }
5013 
5014 Tile* Context::getTileObjectPointer( const uint ObjID ) const{
5015  if( objects.find(ObjID) == objects.end() ){
5016  std::cerr << "ERROR (getTileObjectPointer): ObjectID of " << ObjID << " does not exist in the Context." << std::endl;
5017  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5018  }
5019  return static_cast<Tile*>(objects.at(ObjID));
5020 }
5021 
5022 helios::vec2 Tile::getSize( void ) const{
5023  return size;
5024 }
5025 
5026 helios::int2 Tile::getSubdivisionCount( void ) const{
5027  return subdiv;
5028 }
5029 
5030 std::vector<helios::vec3> Tile::getVertices( void ) const{
5031 
5032  std::vector<helios::vec3> vertices;
5033  vertices.resize(4);
5034 
5035  //subcenter = make_vec3(-0.5*size.x+(float(i)+0.5)*subsize.x,-0.5*size.y+(float(j)+0.5)*subsize.y,0);
5036  //Y[0] = make_vec3( -0.5f, -0.5f, 0.f);
5037  //Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.5f, -0.5f, 0.f);
5038  //Y[2] = make_vec3( 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.f);
5039  //Y[3] = make_vec3( -0.5f, 0.5f, 0.f);
5040 
5041  vertices.at(0) = context->getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at(0) )->getVertices().at(0);
5042 
5043  vertices.at(1) = context->getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at( subdiv.x-1 ) )->getVertices().at(1);
5044 
5045  vertices.at(2) = context->getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at( subdiv.x*subdiv.y-1 ) )->getVertices().at(2);
5046 
5047  vertices.at(3) = context->getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at( subdiv.x*subdiv.y-subdiv.x ) )->getVertices().at(3);
5048 
5049  return vertices;
5050 
5051 }
5052 
5053 std::vector<helios::vec2> Tile::getTextureUV( void ) const{
5054 
5055  std::vector<helios::vec2> uv;
5056  uv.resize(4);
5057 
5058  //uv.at(0) = uv_center+make_vec2(+0.5*uv_size.x,-0.5*uv_size.y);
5059  //uv.at(1) = uv_center+make_vec2(-0.5*uv_size.x,-0.5*uv_size.y);
5060  //uv.at(2) = uv_center+make_vec2(-0.5*uv_size.x,+0.5*uv_size.y);
5061  //uv.at(3) = uv_center+make_vec2(+0.5*uv_size.x,+0.5*uv_size.y);
5062 
5063  //Y[0] = make_vec3( -0.5f, -0.5f, 0.f);
5064  //Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.5f, -0.5f, 0.f);
5065  //Y[2] = make_vec3( 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.f);
5066  //Y[3] = make_vec3( -0.5f, 0.5f, 0.f);
5067 
5068  uv.at(0) = context->getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at( subdiv.x-1 ) )->getTextureUV().at(0);
5069 
5070  uv.at(1) = context->getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at( 0) )->getTextureUV().at(1);
5071 
5072  uv.at(2) = context->getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at( subdiv.x*subdiv.y-subdiv.y ) )->getTextureUV().at(2);
5073 
5074  uv.at(3) = context->getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at( subdiv.x*subdiv.y-1 ) )->getTextureUV().at(3);
5075 
5076  return uv;
5077 
5078 }
5079

5219 
5220 uint Context::addSphereObject( const uint Ndivs, const helios::vec3 center, const float radius ){
5221 
5222  RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
5223 
5224  return addSphereObject(Ndivs,center,radius,color);
5225 
5226 }
5227 
5228 uint Context::addSphereObject( const uint Ndivs, const vec3 center, const float radius, const RGBcolor color ){
5229 
5230  if( radius<=0.f ){
5231  std::cerr << "ERROR (addSphereObject): Radius of sphere must be positive." << std::endl;
5232  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5233  }
5234 
5235  std::vector<uint> UUID;
5236 
5237  float theta;
5238  float dtheta=M_PI/float(Ndivs);
5239  float dphi=2.0*M_PI/float(Ndivs);
5240 
5241  //bottom cap
5242  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
5243 
5244  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5*M_PI, 0 ) );
5245  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5*M_PI+dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
5246  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5*M_PI+dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
5247 
5248  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,color) );
5249 
5250  }
5251 
5252  //top cap
5253  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
5254 
5255  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5*M_PI, 0 ) );
5256  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5*M_PI-dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
5257  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5*M_PI-dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
5258 
5259  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v2,v1,v0,color) );
5260 
5261  }
5262 
5263  //middle
5264  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
5265  for( int i=1; i<Ndivs-1; i++ ){
5266 
5267  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5*M_PI+float(i)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
5268  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5*M_PI+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
5269  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5*M_PI+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
5270  vec3 v3 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5*M_PI+float(i)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
5271 
5272  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,color) );
5273  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v2,v3,color) );
5274 
5275  }
5276  }
5277 
5278  Sphere* sphere_new = (new Sphere( currentObjectID, UUID, radius, Ndivs, this ));
5279 
5280  float T[16], transform[16];
5281  sphere_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
5282 
5283  makeScaleMatrix(make_vec3(radius,radius,radius),T);
5284  matmult(T,transform,transform);
5285 
5286  makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
5287  matmult(T,transform,transform);
5288 
5289  sphere_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
5290 
5291  sphere_new->setColor( color );
5292 
5293  for( size_t p=0; p<UUID.size(); p++ ){
5294  getPrimitivePointer(UUID.at(p))->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
5295  }
5296 
5297  objects[currentObjectID] = sphere_new;
5298  currentObjectID++;
5299  return currentObjectID-1;
5300 
5301 
5302 }
5303 
5304 uint Context::addTileObject( const vec3 center, const vec2 size, const SphericalCoord rotation, const int2 subdiv ){
5305 
5306  RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
5307 
5308  return addTileObject(center,size,rotation,subdiv,color);
5309 }
5310 
5311 uint Context::addTileObject( const vec3 center, const vec2 size, const SphericalCoord rotation, const int2 subdiv, const RGBcolor color ){
5312 
5313  if( size.x==0 || size.y==0 ){
5314  std::cerr << "ERROR (addTileObject): Size of tile must be greater than 0." << std::endl;
5315  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5316  }
5317  if( subdiv.x<1 || subdiv.y<1 ){
5318  std::cerr << "ERROR (addTileObject): Number of tile subdivisions must be greater than 0." << std::endl;
5319  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5320  }
5321 
5322  std::vector<uint> UUID;
5323 
5324  vec2 subsize;
5325  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
5326  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
5327 
5328  vec3 subcenter;
5329 
5330  for( uint j=0; j<subdiv.y; j++ ){
5331  for( uint i=0; i<subdiv.x; i++ ){
5332 
5333  subcenter = make_vec3(-0.5*size.x+(float(i)+0.5)*subsize.x,-0.5*size.y+(float(j)+0.5)*subsize.y,0);
5334 
5335  UUID.push_back( addPatch( subcenter, subsize, make_SphericalCoord(0,0), color ) );
5336 
5337  if( rotation.elevation!=0.f ){
5338  getPrimitivePointer( UUID.back() )->rotate( -rotation.elevation, "x" );
5339  }
5340  if( rotation.azimuth!=0.f ){
5341  getPrimitivePointer( UUID.back() )->rotate( -rotation.azimuth, "z" );
5342  }
5343  getPrimitivePointer( UUID.back() )->translate( center );
5344 
5345  }
5346  }
5347 
5348  Tile* tile_new = (new Tile( currentObjectID, UUID, size, subdiv, this ));
5349 
5350  float T[16], S[16], R[16];
5351 
5352  float transform[16];
5353  tile_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
5354 
5355  makeScaleMatrix(make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1.f),S);
5356  matmult(S,transform,transform);
5357 
5358  makeRotationMatrix( -rotation.elevation,"x",R);
5359  matmult(R,transform,transform);
5360  makeRotationMatrix( -rotation.azimuth,"z",R);
5361  matmult(R,transform,transform);
5362 
5363  makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
5364  matmult(T,transform,transform);
5365 
5366  tile_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
5367 
5368  tile_new->setColor( color );
5369 
5370  for( size_t p=0; p<UUID.size(); p++ ){
5371  getPrimitivePointer(UUID.at(p))->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
5372  }
5373 
5374  objects[currentObjectID] = tile_new;
5375  currentObjectID++;
5376  return currentObjectID-1;
5377 
5378 }
5379 
5380 uint Context::addTileObject( const vec3 center, const vec2 size, const SphericalCoord rotation, const int2 subdiv, const char* texturefile ){
5381 
5382  if( size.x==0 || size.y==0 ){
5383  std::cerr << "ERROR (addTileObject): Size of tile must be greater than 0." << std::endl;
5384  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5385  }
5386  if( subdiv.x<1 || subdiv.y<1 ){
5387  std::cerr << "ERROR (addTileObject): Number of tile subdivisions must be greater than 0." << std::endl;
5388  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5389  }
5390 
5391  std::vector<uint> UUID;
5392 
5393  vec2 subsize;
5394  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
5395  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
5396 
5397  vec3 subcenter;
5398 
5399  std::vector<helios::vec2> uv;
5400  uv.resize(4);
5401  vec2 uv_sub;
5402  uv_sub.x = 1.f/float(subdiv.x);
5403  uv_sub.y = 1.f/float(subdiv.y);
5404 
5405  Texture* texture = addTexture( texturefile );
5406  std::vector<std::vector<bool> >* alpha;
5407  int2 sz;
5408  if( texture->hasTransparencyChannel() ){
5409  alpha = texture->getTransparencyData();
5410  sz = texture->getSize();
5411  }
5412 
5413  for( uint j=0; j<subdiv.y; j++ ){
5414  for( uint i=0; i<subdiv.x; i++ ){
5415 
5416  subcenter = make_vec3(-0.5*size.x+(float(i)+0.5)*subsize.x,-0.5*size.y+(float(j)+0.5)*subsize.y,0);
5417 
5418  uv.at(0) = make_vec2(1.f-float(i)*uv_sub.x,float(j)*uv_sub.y);
5419  uv.at(1) = make_vec2(1.f-float(i+1)*uv_sub.x,float(j)*uv_sub.y);
5420  uv.at(2) = make_vec2(1.f-float(i+1)*uv_sub.x,float(j+1)*uv_sub.y);
5421  uv.at(3) = make_vec2(1.f-float(i)*uv_sub.x,float(j+1)*uv_sub.y);
5422 
5423  float solid_fraction;
5424  if( texture->hasTransparencyChannel() ){
5425  int A = 0;
5426  int At = 0;
5427 
5428  int2 uv_min( floor(uv.at(1).x*(sz.x-1)), floor(uv.at(1).y*(sz.y-1)) );
5429  int2 uv_max( floor(uv.at(3).x*(sz.x-1)), floor(uv.at(3).y*(sz.y-1)) );
5430 
5431  assert( uv_min.x>=0 && uv_min.y>=0 && uv_max.x<sz.x && uv_max.y<sz.y );
5432 
5433  for( int j=uv_min.y; j<uv_max.y; j++ ){
5434  for( int i=uv_min.x; i<uv_max.x; i++ ){
5435  At += 1;
5436  if( alpha->at(j).at(i) ){
5437  A += 1;
5438  }
5439  }
5440  }
5441  if( At==0 ){
5442  solid_fraction = 0;
5443  }else{
5444  solid_fraction = float(A)/float(At);
5445  }
5446  }else{
5447  solid_fraction = 1.f;
5448  }
5449 
5450  Patch* patch_new = (new Patch( texture, uv, solid_fraction, currentUUID ));
5451 
5452  patch_new->setParentObjectID(0);
5453 
5454  assert( size.x>0.f && size.y>0.f );
5455  patch_new->scale( make_vec3(subsize.x,subsize.y,1) );
5456 
5457  patch_new->translate( subcenter );
5458 
5459  if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
5460  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.elevation, "x");
5461  }
5462  if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
5463  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.azimuth, "z");
5464  }
5465 
5466  patch_new->translate( center );
5467 
5468  primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
5469  markGeometryDirty();
5470  currentUUID++;
5471  UUID.push_back(currentUUID-1);
5472 
5473 
5474  }
5475  }
5476 
5477  Tile* tile_new = (new Tile( currentObjectID, UUID, size, subdiv, this ));
5478 
5479  float T[16], S[16], R[16];
5480 
5481  float transform[16];
5482  tile_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
5483 
5484  makeScaleMatrix(make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1.f),S);
5485  matmult(S,transform,transform);
5486 
5487  makeRotationMatrix( -rotation.elevation,"x",R);
5488  matmult(R,transform,transform);
5489  makeRotationMatrix( -rotation.azimuth,"z",R);
5490  matmult(R,transform,transform);
5491 
5492  makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
5493  matmult(T,transform,transform);
5494 
5495  tile_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
5496 
5497  for( size_t p=0; p<UUID.size(); p++ ){
5498  getPrimitivePointer(UUID.at(p))->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
5499  }
5500 
5501  objects[currentObjectID] = tile_new;
5502  currentObjectID++;
5503  return currentObjectID-1;
5504 
5505 }
5506 
5507 uint Context::addTubeObject( const uint Ndivs, const std::vector<helios::vec3> nodes, const std::vector<float> radius ){
5508 
5509  uint node_count = nodes.size();
5510 
5511  std::vector<RGBcolor> color;
5512  color.resize(node_count);
5513 
5514  for( uint i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){
5515  color.at(i) = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
5516  }
5517 
5518  return addTubeObject(Ndivs,nodes,radius,color);
5519 
5520 }
5521 
5522 uint Context::addTubeObject( const uint Ndivs, const std::vector<helios::vec3> nodes, const std::vector<float> radius, const std::vector<helios::RGBcolor> color ){
5523 
5524  const uint node_count = nodes.size();
5525 
5526  if( node_count==0 ){
5527  std::cerr << "ERROR (Context::addTubeObject): Node and radius arrays are empty." << std::endl;
5528  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5529  }else if( node_count!=radius.size() ){
5530  std::cerr << "ERROR (Context::addTubeObject): Size of `nodes' and `radius' arguments must agree." << std::endl;
5531  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5532  }else if( node_count!=color.size() ){
5533  std::cerr << "ERROR (Context::addTubeObject): Size of `nodes' and `color' arguments must agree." << std::endl;
5534  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5535  }
5536 
5537  vec3 vec, convec;
5538  float cfact[Ndivs+1], sfact[Ndivs+1];
5539  std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
5540  xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
5541  normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
5542  for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
5543  xyz.at(j).resize(node_count);
5544  normal.at(j).resize(node_count);
5545  }
5546  vec3 nvec(0.1817f,0.6198f,0.7634f);//random vector to get things going
5547 
5548  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
5549  cfact[j]=cos(2.f*M_PI*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
5550  sfact[j]=sin(2.f*M_PI*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
5551  }
5552 
5553  for( int i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){ //looping over tube segments
5554 
5555  if(i==0){
5556  vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
5557  vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
5558  vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
5559  }else if(i==node_count-1){
5560  vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
5561  vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
5562  vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
5563  }else{
5564  vec.x=0.5f*( (nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x)+(nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x) );
5565  vec.y=0.5f*( (nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y)+(nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y) );
5566  vec.z=0.5f*( (nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z)+(nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z) );
5567  }
5568 
5569  float norm;
5570  convec = cross(nvec,vec);
5571  norm=convec.magnitude();
5572  convec.x=convec.x/norm;
5573  convec.y=convec.y/norm;
5574  convec.z=convec.z/norm;
5575  nvec = cross(vec,convec);
5576  norm=nvec.magnitude();
5577  nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
5578  nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
5579  nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
5580 
5581 
5582 
5583  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
5584  normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.x;
5585  normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.y;
5586  normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.z;
5587 
5588  xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
5589  xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
5590  xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
5591 
5592  normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radius[i];
5593  }
5594 
5595  }
5596 
5597  vec3 v0, v1, v2;
5598  std::vector<uint> UUID;
5599 
5600  for( int i=0; i<node_count-1; i++ ){
5601  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
5602 
5603  v0 = xyz[j][i];
5604  v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
5605  v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
5606 
5607  //if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
5608  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color.at(i) ));
5609  //}
5610 
5611  v0 = xyz[j][i];
5612  v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
5613  v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
5614 
5615  //if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
5616  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color.at(i) ));
5617  //}
5618 
5619  }
5620  }
5621 
5622  Tube* tube_new = (new Tube( currentObjectID, UUID, nodes, radius, Ndivs, this ));
5623 
5624  float T[16], transform[16];
5625  tube_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
5626 
5627  makeTranslationMatrix(nodes.front(),T);
5628  matmult(T,transform,transform);
5629 
5630  tube_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
5631 
5632  //tube_new->setColor( color );
5633 
5634  for( size_t p=0; p<UUID.size(); p++ ){
5635  getPrimitivePointer(UUID.at(p))->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
5636  }
5637 
5638  objects[currentObjectID] = tube_new;
5639  currentObjectID++;
5640  return currentObjectID-1;
5641 
5642 }
5643 
5644 uint Context::addTubeObject( const uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> nodes, const std::vector<float> radius, const char* texturefile ){
5645 
5646  const uint node_count = nodes.size();
5647 
5648  if( node_count==0 ){
5649  std::cerr << "ERROR (Context::addTubeObject): Node and radius arrays are empty." << std::endl;
5650  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5651  }else if( node_count!=radius.size() ){
5652  std::cerr << "ERROR (Context::addTubeObject): Size of `nodes' and `radius' arguments must agree." << std::endl;
5653  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5654  }
5655 
5656  vec3 vec, convec;
5657  float cfact[Ndivs+1], sfact[Ndivs+1];
5658  std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
5659  std::vector<std::vector<vec2> > uv;
5660  xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
5661  normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
5662  uv.resize(Ndivs+1);
5663  for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
5664  xyz.at(j).resize(node_count);
5665  normal.at(j).resize(node_count);
5666  uv.at(j).resize(node_count);
5667  }
5668  vec3 nvec(0.f,1.f,0.f);
5669 
5670  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
5671  cfact[j]=cos(2.f*M_PI*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
5672  sfact[j]=sin(2.f*M_PI*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
5673  }
5674 
5675  for( int i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){ //looping over tube segments
5676 
5677  if(i==0){
5678  vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
5679  vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
5680  vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
5681  }else if(i==node_count-1){
5682  vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
5683  vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
5684  vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
5685  }else{
5686  vec.x=0.5f*( (nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x)+(nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x) );
5687  vec.y=0.5f*( (nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y)+(nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y) );
5688  vec.z=0.5f*( (nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z)+(nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z) );
5689  }
5690 
5691  float norm;
5692  convec = cross(nvec,vec);
5693  norm=convec.magnitude();
5694  convec.x=convec.x/norm;
5695  convec.y=convec.y/norm;
5696  convec.z=convec.z/norm;
5697  nvec = cross(vec,convec);
5698  norm=nvec.magnitude();
5699  nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
5700  nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
5701  nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
5702 
5703  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
5704  normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.x;
5705  normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.y;
5706  normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.z;
5707 
5708  xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
5709  xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
5710  xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
5711 
5712  uv[j][i].x = float(i)/float(node_count-1);
5713  uv[j][i].y = float(j)/float(Ndivs);
5714 
5715  normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radius[i];
5716  }
5717 
5718  }
5719 
5720  vec3 v0, v1, v2;
5721  vec2 uv0, uv1, uv2;
5722  std::vector<uint> UUID;
5723 
5724  for( int i=0; i<node_count-1; i++ ){
5725  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
5726 
5727  v0 = xyz[j][i];
5728  v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
5729  v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
5730 
5731  uv0 = uv[j][i];
5732  uv1 = uv[j+1][i+1];
5733  uv2 = uv[j+1][i];
5734 
5735  if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
5736  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
5737  }
5738 
5739  v0 = xyz[j][i];
5740  v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
5741  v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
5742 
5743  uv0 = uv[j][i];
5744  uv1 = uv[j][i+1];
5745  uv2 = uv[j+1][i+1];
5746 
5747  if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
5748  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
5749  }
5750 
5751  }
5752  }
5753 
5754  Tube* tube_new = (new Tube( currentObjectID, UUID, nodes, radius, Ndivs, this ));
5755 
5756  float T[16], transform[16];
5757  tube_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
5758 
5759  makeTranslationMatrix(nodes.front(),T);
5760  matmult(T,transform,transform);
5761 
5762  tube_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
5763 
5764  for( size_t p=0; p<UUID.size(); p++ ){
5765  getPrimitivePointer(UUID.at(p))->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
5766  }
5767 
5768  objects[currentObjectID] = tube_new;
5769  currentObjectID++;
5770  return currentObjectID-1;
5771 
5772 }
5773 
5774 uint Context::addBoxObject( const vec3 center, const vec3 size, const int3 subdiv ){
5775 
5776  RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
5777 
5778  return addBoxObject(center,size,subdiv,color,false);
5779 }
5780 
5781 uint Context::addBoxObject( const vec3 center, const vec3 size, const int3 subdiv, const RGBcolor color ){
5782  return addBoxObject(center,size,subdiv,color,false);
5783 }
5784 
5785 uint Context::addBoxObject( const vec3 center, const vec3 size, const int3 subdiv, const char* texturefile ){
5786  return addBoxObject(center,size,subdiv,texturefile,false);
5787 }
5788 
5789 uint Context::addBoxObject( const vec3 center, const vec3 size, const int3 subdiv, const RGBcolor color, const bool reverse_normals ){
5790 
5791  if( size.x<=0 || size.y<=0 || size.z<=0 ){
5792  std::cerr << "ERROR (addBoxObject): Size of box must be positive." << std::endl;
5793  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5794  }
5795  if( subdiv.x<1 || subdiv.y<1 || subdiv.z<1 ){
5796  std::cerr << "ERROR (addBoxObject): Number of box subdivisions must be positive." << std::endl;
5797  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5798  }
5799 
5800  std::vector<uint> UUID;
5801 
5802  vec3 subsize;
5803  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
5804  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
5805  subsize.z = size.z/float(subdiv.z);
5806 
5807  vec3 subcenter;
5808  uint objID;
5809  std::vector<uint> U, U_copy;
5810 
5811  if( reverse_normals ){ //normals point inward
5812 
5813  // x-z faces (vertical)
5814 
5815  //right
5816  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5*size.y,0);
5817  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
5818  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5819 
5820  //left
5821  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5*size.y,0);
5822  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
5823  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5824 
5825  // y-z faces (vertical)
5826 
5827  //front
5828  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5*size.x,0,0);
5829  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
5830  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5831 
5832  //back
5833  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5*size.x,0,0);
5834  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
5835  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5836 
5837  // x-y faces (horizontal)
5838 
5839  //top
5840  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5*size.z);
5841  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
5842  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5843 
5844  //bottom
5845  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5*size.z);
5846  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
5847  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5848 
5849  }else{ //normals point outward
5850 
5851  // x-z faces (vertical)
5852 
5853  //right
5854  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5*size.y,0);
5855  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
5856  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5857 
5858  //left
5859  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5*size.y,0);
5860  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
5861  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5862 
5863  // y-z faces (vertical)
5864 
5865  //front
5866  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5*size.x,0,0);
5867  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
5868  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5869 
5870  //back
5871  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5*size.x,0,0);
5872  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
5873  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5874 
5875  // x-y faces (horizontal)
5876 
5877  //top
5878  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5*size.z);
5879  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
5880  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5881 
5882  //bottom
5883  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5*size.z);
5884  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
5885  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5886 
5887  }
5888 
5889  Box* box_new = (new Box( currentObjectID, UUID, size, subdiv, this ));
5890 
5891  float T[16], transform[16];
5892  box_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
5893 
5894  makeScaleMatrix(size,T);
5895  matmult(T,transform,transform);
5896 
5897  makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
5898  matmult(T,transform,transform);
5899 
5900  box_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
5901 
5902  box_new->setColor( color );
5903 
5904  for( size_t p=0; p<UUID.size(); p++ ){
5905  getPrimitivePointer(UUID.at(p))->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
5906  }
5907 
5908  objects[currentObjectID] = box_new;
5909  currentObjectID++;
5910  return currentObjectID-1;
5911 
5912 }
5913 
5914 uint Context::addBoxObject( const vec3 center, const vec3 size, const int3 subdiv, const char* texturefile, const bool reverse_normals ){
5915 
5916  std::vector<uint> UUID;
5917 
5918  vec3 subsize;
5919  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
5920  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
5921  subsize.z = size.z/float(subdiv.z);
5922 
5923  vec3 subcenter;
5924  uint objID;
5925  std::vector<uint> U, U_copy;
5926 
5927  if( reverse_normals ){ //normals point inward
5928 
5929  // x-z faces (vertical)
5930 
5931  //right
5932  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5*size.y,0);
5933  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
5934  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5935 
5936  //left
5937  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5*size.y,0);
5938  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
5939  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5940 
5941  // y-z faces (vertical)
5942 
5943  //front
5944  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5*size.x,0,0);
5945  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
5946  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5947 
5948  //back
5949  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5*size.x,0,0);
5950  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
5951  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5952 
5953  // x-y faces (horizontal)
5954 
5955  //top
5956  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5*size.z);
5957  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
5958  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5959 
5960  //bottom
5961  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5*size.z);
5962  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
5963  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5964 
5965  }else{ //normals point outward
5966 
5967  // x-z faces (vertical)
5968 
5969  //right
5970  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5*size.y,0);
5971  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
5972  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5973 
5974  //left
5975  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5*size.y,0);
5976  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
5977  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5978 
5979  // y-z faces (vertical)
5980 
5981  //front
5982  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5*size.x,0,0);
5983  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
5984  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5985 
5986  //back
5987  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5*size.x,0,0);
