5988  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
5989  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5990 
5991  // x-y faces (horizontal)
5992 
5993  //top
5994  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5*size.z);
5995  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
5996  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
5997 
5998  //bottom
5999  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5*size.z);
6000  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
6001  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6002 
6003  }
6004 
6005  Box* box_new = (new Box( currentObjectID, UUID, size, subdiv, this ));
6006 
6007  float T[16], transform[16];
6008  box_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
6009 
6010  makeScaleMatrix(size,T);
6011  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6012 
6013  makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
6014  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6015 
6016  box_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
6017 
6018  for( size_t p=0; p<UUID.size(); p++ ){
6019  getPrimitivePointer(UUID.at(p))->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
6020  }
6021 
6022  objects[currentObjectID] = box_new;
6023  currentObjectID++;
6024  return currentObjectID-1;
6025 
6026 
6027 }
6028 
6029 uint Context::addDiskObject( const uint Ndivs, const vec3& center, const vec2& size ){
6030  return addDiskObject(Ndivs,center,size,make_SphericalCoord(0,0),make_RGBAcolor(1,0,0,1));
6031 }
6032 
6033 uint Context::addDiskObject( const uint Ndivs, const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation ){
6034  return addDiskObject(Ndivs,center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(1,0,0,1));
6035 }
6036 
6037 uint Context::addDiskObject( const uint Ndivs, const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation, const RGBcolor& color ){
6038  return addDiskObject(Ndivs,center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(color,1));
6039 }
6040 
6041 uint Context::addDiskObject( const uint Ndivs, const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation, const RGBAcolor& color ){
6042 
6043  std::vector<uint> UUID;
6044  UUID.resize(Ndivs);
6045 
6046  for( int i=0; i<Ndivs; i++ ){
6047 
6048  float dtheta = 1.f/float(Ndivs)*2.f*M_PI;
6049 
6050  UUID.at(i) = addTriangle( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i)),0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i+1)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i+1)),0), color );
6051  getPrimitivePointer(UUID.at(i))->rotate( rotation.elevation, "y" );
6052  getPrimitivePointer(UUID.at(i))->rotate( rotation.azimuth, "z" );
6053  getPrimitivePointer(UUID.at(i))->translate( center );
6054 
6055  }
6056 
6057  Disk* disk_new = (new Disk( currentObjectID, UUID, size, Ndivs, this ));
6058 
6059  float T[16], transform[16];
6060  disk_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
6061 
6062  makeScaleMatrix(make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1.f),T);
6063  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6064 
6065  makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
6066  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6067 
6068  disk_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
6069 
6070  disk_new->setColor( color );
6071 
6072  for( size_t p=0; p<UUID.size(); p++ ){
6073  getPrimitivePointer(UUID.at(p))->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
6074  }
6075 
6076  objects[currentObjectID] = disk_new;
6077  currentObjectID++;
6078  return currentObjectID-1;
6079 
6080 }
6081 
6082 uint Context::addDiskObject( const uint Ndivs, const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation, const char* texture_file ){
6083 
6084  std::vector<uint> UUID;
6085  UUID.resize(Ndivs);
6086 
6087  for( int i=0; i<Ndivs; i++ ){
6088 
6089  float dtheta = 1.f/float(Ndivs)*2.f*M_PI;
6090 
6091  UUID.at(i) = addTriangle( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i)),0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i+1)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i+1)),0), texture_file, make_vec2(0.5,0.5), make_vec2(0.5*(1+cosf(dtheta*float(i))),0.5*(1+sinf(dtheta*float(i)))), make_vec2(0.5*(1+cosf(dtheta*float(i+1))),0.5*(1+sinf(dtheta*float(i+1)))) );
6092  getPrimitivePointer(UUID.at(i))->rotate( rotation.elevation, "y" );
6093  getPrimitivePointer(UUID.at(i))->rotate( rotation.azimuth, "z" );
6094  getPrimitivePointer(UUID.at(i))->translate( center );
6095 
6096  }
6097 
6098  Disk* disk_new = (new Disk( currentObjectID, UUID, size, Ndivs, this ));
6099 
6100  float T[16], transform[16];
6101  disk_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
6102 
6103  makeScaleMatrix(make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1.f),T);
6104  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6105 
6106  makeTranslationMatrix(center,T);
6107  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6108 
6109  disk_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
6110 
6111  for( size_t p=0; p<UUID.size(); p++ ){
6112  getPrimitivePointer(UUID.at(p))->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
6113  }
6114 
6115  objects[currentObjectID] = disk_new;
6116  currentObjectID++;
6117  return currentObjectID-1;
6118 
6119 }
6120 
6121 uint Context::addPolymeshObject( const std::vector<uint> UUIDs ){
6122 
6123  Polymesh* polymesh_new = (new Polymesh( currentObjectID, UUIDs, this ));
6124 
6125  polymesh_new->setColor( getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.front())->getColor() );
6126 
6127  float T[16], transform[16];
6128  polymesh_new->getTransformationMatrix( transform );
6129 
6130  makeTranslationMatrix( getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.front())->getVertices().front(),T);
6131  matmult(T,transform,transform);
6132 
6133  polymesh_new->setTransformationMatrix( transform );
6134 
6135  for( size_t p=0; p<UUIDs.size(); p++ ){
6136  getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs.at(p))->setParentObjectID(currentObjectID);
6137  }
6138 
6139  objects[currentObjectID] = polymesh_new;
6140  currentObjectID++;
6141  return currentObjectID-1;
6142 
6143 }
6144 
6145 
6146 
6147 std::vector<uint> Context::addSphere( const uint Ndivs, const vec3 center, const float radius ){
6148 
6149  RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
6150 
6151  return addSphere(Ndivs,center,radius,color);
6152 
6153 }
6154 
6155 std::vector<uint> Context::addSphere( const uint Ndivs, const vec3 center, const float radius, const RGBcolor color ){
6156 
6157  std::vector<uint> UUID;
6158 
6159  float theta;
6160  float dtheta=M_PI/float(Ndivs);
6161  float dphi=2.0*M_PI/float(Ndivs);
6162 
6163  //bottom cap
6164  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
6165 
6166  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5*M_PI, 0 ) );
6167  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5*M_PI+dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
6168  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5*M_PI+dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
6169 
6170  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,color) );
6171 
6172  }
6173 
6174  //top cap
6175  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
6176 
6177  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5*M_PI, 0 ) );
6178  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5*M_PI-dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
6179  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5*M_PI-dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
6180 
6181  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v2,v1,v0,color) );
6182 
6183  }
6184 
6185  //middle
6186  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
6187  for( int i=1; i<Ndivs-1; i++ ){
6188 
6189  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5*M_PI+float(i)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
6190  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5*M_PI+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
6191  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5*M_PI+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
6192  vec3 v3 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5*M_PI+float(i)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
6193 
6194  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,color) );
6195  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v2,v3,color) );
6196 
6197  }
6198  }
6199 
6200  return UUID;
6201 
6202 
6203 }
6204 
6205 std::vector<uint> Context::addTile( const vec3 center, const vec2 size, const SphericalCoord rotation, const int2 subdiv ){
6206 
6207  RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
6208 
6209  return addTile(center,size,rotation,subdiv,color);
6210 }
6211 
6212 std::vector<uint> Context::addTile( const vec3 center, const vec2 size, const SphericalCoord rotation, const int2 subdiv, const RGBcolor color ){
6213 
6214  std::vector<uint> UUID;
6215 
6216  vec2 subsize;
6217  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
6218  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
6219 
6220  vec3 subcenter;
6221 
6222  for( uint j=0; j<subdiv.y; j++ ){
6223  for( uint i=0; i<subdiv.x; i++ ){
6224 
6225  subcenter = make_vec3(-0.5*size.x+(float(i)+0.5)*subsize.x,-0.5*size.y+(float(j)+0.5)*subsize.y,0);
6226 
6227  UUID.push_back( addPatch( subcenter, subsize, make_SphericalCoord(0,0), color ) );
6228 
6229  if( rotation.elevation!=0.f ){
6230  getPrimitivePointer( UUID.back() )->rotate( -rotation.elevation, "x" );
6231  }
6232  if( rotation.azimuth!=0.f ){
6233  getPrimitivePointer( UUID.back() )->rotate( -rotation.azimuth, "z" );
6234  }
6235  getPrimitivePointer( UUID.back() )->translate( center );
6236 
6237  }
6238  }
6239 
6240  return UUID;
6241 
6242 }
6243 
6244 std::vector<uint> Context::addTile( const vec3 center, const vec2 size, const SphericalCoord rotation, const int2 subdiv, const char* texturefile ){
6245 
6246  std::vector<uint> UUID;
6247 
6248  vec2 subsize;
6249  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
6250  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
6251 
6252  vec3 subcenter;
6253 
6254  std::vector<helios::vec2> uv;
6255  uv.resize(4);
6256  vec2 uv_sub;
6257  uv_sub.x = 1.f/float(subdiv.x);
6258  uv_sub.y = 1.f/float(subdiv.y);
6259 
6260  Texture* texture = addTexture( texturefile );
6261  std::vector<std::vector<bool> >* alpha;
6262  int2 sz;
6263  if( texture->hasTransparencyChannel() ){
6264  alpha = texture->getTransparencyData();
6265  sz = texture->getSize();
6266  }
6267 
6268  for( uint j=0; j<subdiv.y; j++ ){
6269  for( uint i=0; i<subdiv.x; i++ ){
6270 
6271  subcenter = make_vec3(-0.5*size.x+(float(i)+0.5)*subsize.x,-0.5*size.y+(float(j)+0.5)*subsize.y,0);
6272 
6273  uv.at(0) = make_vec2(1.f-float(i)*uv_sub.x,float(j)*uv_sub.y);
6274  uv.at(1) = make_vec2(1.f-float(i+1)*uv_sub.x,float(j)*uv_sub.y);
6275  uv.at(2) = make_vec2(1.f-float(i+1)*uv_sub.x,float(j+1)*uv_sub.y);
6276  uv.at(3) = make_vec2(1.f-float(i)*uv_sub.x,float(j+1)*uv_sub.y);
6277 
6278  float solid_fraction;
6279  if( texture->hasTransparencyChannel() ){
6280  int A = 0;
6281  int At = 0;
6282 
6283  int2 uv_min( floor(uv.at(1).x*(sz.x-1)), floor(uv.at(1).y*(sz.y-1)) );
6284  int2 uv_max( floor(uv.at(3).x*(sz.x-1)), floor(uv.at(3).y*(sz.y-1)) );
6285 
6286  assert( uv_min.x>=0 && uv_min.y>=0 && uv_max.x<sz.x && uv_max.y<sz.y );
6287 
6288  for( int j=uv_min.y; j<uv_max.y; j++ ){
6289  for( int i=uv_min.x; i<uv_max.x; i++ ){
6290  At += 1;
6291  if( alpha->at(j).at(i) ){
6292  A += 1;
6293  }
6294  }
6295  }
6296  if( At==0 ){
6297  solid_fraction = 0;
6298  }else{
6299  solid_fraction = float(A)/float(At);
6300  }
6301  }else{
6302  solid_fraction = 1.f;
6303  }
6304 
6305  if( solid_fraction==0.f ){
6306  continue;
6307  }
6308 
6309  Patch* patch_new = (new Patch( texture, uv, solid_fraction, currentUUID ));
6310 
6311  patch_new->setParentObjectID(0);
6312 
6313  assert( size.x>0.f && size.y>0.f );
6314  patch_new->scale( make_vec3(subsize.x,subsize.y,1) );
6315 
6316  patch_new->translate( subcenter );
6317 
6318  if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
6319  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.elevation, "x");
6320  }
6321  if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
6322  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.azimuth, "z");
6323  }
6324 
6325  patch_new->translate( center );
6326 
6327  primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
6328  markGeometryDirty();
6329  currentUUID++;
6330  UUID.push_back(currentUUID-1);
6331 
6332 
6333  }
6334  }
6335 
6336  return UUID;
6337 
6338 }
6339 
6340 std::vector<uint> Context::addTube( const uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> nodes, const std::vector<float> radius ){
6341 
6342  uint node_count = nodes.size();
6343 
6344  std::vector<RGBcolor> color;
6345  color.resize(node_count);
6346 
6347  for( uint i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){
6348  color.at(i) = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
6349  }
6350 
6351  return addTube(Ndivs,nodes,radius,color);
6352 
6353 }
6354 
6355 std::vector<uint> Context::addTube( const uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> nodes, const std::vector<float> radius, std::vector<RGBcolor> color ){
6356 
6357  const uint node_count = nodes.size();
6358 
6359  if( node_count==0 ){
6360  std::cerr << "ERROR (Context::addTube): Node and radius arrays are empty." << std::endl;
6361  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
6362  }else if( node_count!=radius.size() ){
6363  std::cerr << "ERROR (Context::addTube): Size of `nodes' and `radius' arguments must agree." << std::endl;
6364  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
6365  }else if( node_count!=color.size() ){
6366  std::cerr << "ERROR (Context::addTube): Size of `nodes' and `color' arguments must agree." << std::endl;
6367  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
6368  }
6369 
6370  vec3 vec, convec;
6371  float cfact[Ndivs+1], sfact[Ndivs+1];
6372  std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
6373  xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
6374  normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
6375  for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
6376  xyz.at(j).resize(node_count);
6377  normal.at(j).resize(node_count);
6378  }
6379  vec3 nvec(0.1817f,0.6198f,0.7634f);//random vector to get things going
6380 
6381  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
6382  cfact[j]=cos(2.f*M_PI*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
6383  sfact[j]=sin(2.f*M_PI*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
6384  }
6385 
6386  for( int i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){ //looping over tube segments
6387 
6388  if(i==0){
6389  vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
6390  vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
6391  vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
6392  }else if(i==node_count-1){
6393  vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
6394  vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
6395  vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
6396  }else{
6397  vec.x=0.5f*( (nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x)+(nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x) );
6398  vec.y=0.5f*( (nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y)+(nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y) );
6399  vec.z=0.5f*( (nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z)+(nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z) );
6400  }
6401 
6402  float norm;
6403  convec = cross(nvec,vec);
6404  norm=convec.magnitude();
6405  convec.x=convec.x/norm;
6406  convec.y=convec.y/norm;
6407  convec.z=convec.z/norm;
6408  nvec = cross(vec,convec);
6409  norm=nvec.magnitude();
6410  nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
6411  nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
6412  nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
6413 
6414 
6415 
6416  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
6417  normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.x;
6418  normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.y;
6419  normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.z;
6420 
6421  xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
6422  xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
6423  xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
6424 
6425  normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radius[i];
6426  }
6427 
6428  }
6429 
6430  vec3 v0, v1, v2;
6431  std::vector<uint> UUID;
6432 
6433  for( int i=0; i<node_count-1; i++ ){
6434  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
6435 
6436  v0 = xyz[j][i];
6437  v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
6438  v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
6439 
6440  //if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
6441  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color.at(i) ));
6442  //}
6443 
6444  v0 = xyz[j][i];
6445  v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
6446  v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
6447 
6448  //if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
6449  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color.at(i) ));
6450  //}
6451 
6452  }
6453  }
6454 
6455  return UUID;
6456 
6457 }
6458 
6459 std::vector<uint> Context::addTube( const uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> nodes, const std::vector<float> radius, const char* texturefile ){
6460 
6461  const uint node_count = nodes.size();
6462 
6463  if( node_count==0 ){
6464  std::cerr << "ERROR (Context::addTube): Node and radius arrays are empty." << std::endl;
6465  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
6466  }else if( node_count!=radius.size() ){
6467  std::cerr << "ERROR (Context::addTube): Size of `nodes' and `radius' arguments must agree." << std::endl;
6468  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
6469  }
6470 
6471  vec3 vec, convec;
6472  float cfact[Ndivs+1], sfact[Ndivs+1];
6473  std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
6474  std::vector<std::vector<vec2> > uv;
6475  xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
6476  normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
6477  uv.resize(Ndivs+1);
6478  for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
6479  xyz.at(j).resize(node_count);
6480  normal.at(j).resize(node_count);
6481  uv.at(j).resize(node_count);
6482  }
6483  vec3 nvec(0.f,1.f,0.f);
6484 
6485  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
6486  cfact[j]=cos(2.f*M_PI*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
6487  sfact[j]=sin(2.f*M_PI*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
6488  }
6489 
6490  for( int i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){ //looping over tube segments
6491 
6492  if(i==0){
6493  vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
6494  vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
6495  vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
6496  }else if(i==node_count-1){
6497  vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
6498  vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
6499  vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
6500  }else{
6501  vec.x=0.5f*( (nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x)+(nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x) );
6502  vec.y=0.5f*( (nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y)+(nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y) );
6503  vec.z=0.5f*( (nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z)+(nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z) );
6504  }
6505 
6506  float norm;
6507  convec = cross(nvec,vec);
6508  norm=convec.magnitude();
6509  convec.x=convec.x/norm;
6510  convec.y=convec.y/norm;
6511  convec.z=convec.z/norm;
6512  nvec = cross(vec,convec);
6513  norm=nvec.magnitude();
6514  nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
6515  nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
6516  nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
6517 
6518  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
6519  normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.x;
6520  normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.y;
6521  normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.z;
6522 
6523  xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
6524  xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
6525  xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
6526 
6527  uv[j][i].x = float(i)/float(node_count-1);
6528  uv[j][i].y = float(j)/float(Ndivs);
6529 
6530  normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radius[i];
6531  }
6532 
6533  }
6534 
6535  vec3 v0, v1, v2;
6536  vec2 uv0, uv1, uv2;
6537  std::vector<uint> UUID;
6538 
6539  for( int i=0; i<node_count-1; i++ ){
6540  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
6541 
6542  v0 = xyz[j][i];
6543  v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
6544  v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
6545 
6546  uv0 = uv[j][i];
6547  uv1 = uv[j+1][i+1];
6548  uv2 = uv[j+1][i];
6549 
6550  if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
6551  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
6552  }
6553 
6554  v0 = xyz[j][i];
6555  v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
6556  v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
6557 
6558  uv0 = uv[j][i];
6559  uv1 = uv[j][i+1];
6560  uv2 = uv[j+1][i+1];
6561 
6562  if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
6563  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
6564  }
6565 
6566  }
6567  }
6568 
6569  return UUID;
6570 
6571 }
6572 
6573 std::vector<uint> Context::addBox( const vec3 center, const vec3 size, const int3 subdiv ){
6574 
6575  RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
6576 
6577  return addBox(center,size,subdiv,color,false);
6578 }
6579 
6580 std::vector<uint> Context::addBox( const vec3 center, const vec3 size, const int3 subdiv, const RGBcolor color ){
6581  return addBox(center,size,subdiv,color,false);
6582 }
6583 
6584 std::vector<uint> Context::addBox( const vec3 center, const vec3 size, const int3 subdiv, const char* texturefile ){
6585  return addBox(center,size,subdiv,texturefile,false);
6586 }
6587 
6588 std::vector<uint> Context::addBox( const vec3 center, const vec3 size, const int3 subdiv, const RGBcolor color, const bool reverse_normals ){
6589 
6590  std::vector<uint> UUID;
6591 
6592  vec3 subsize;
6593  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
6594  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
6595  subsize.z = size.z/float(subdiv.z);
6596 
6597  vec3 subcenter;
6598  std::vector<uint> U;
6599 
6600  if( reverse_normals ){ //normals point inward
6601 
6602  // x-z faces (vertical)
6603 
6604  //right
6605  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5*size.y,0);
6606  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
6607  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6608 
6609  //left
6610  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5*size.y,0);
6611  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
6612  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6613 
6614  // y-z faces (vertical)
6615 
6616  //front
6617  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5*size.x,0,0);
6618  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
6619  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6620 
6621  //back
6622  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5*size.x,0,0);
6623  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
6624  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6625 
6626  // x-y faces (horizontal)
6627 
6628  //top
6629  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5*size.z);
6630  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
6631  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6632 
6633  //bottom
6634  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5*size.z);
6635  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
6636  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6637 
6638  }else{ //normals point outward
6639 
6640  // x-z faces (vertical)
6641 
6642  //right
6643  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5*size.y,0);
6644  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
6645  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6646 
6647  //left
6648  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5*size.y,0);
6649  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
6650  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6651 
6652  // y-z faces (vertical)
6653 
6654  //front
6655  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5*size.x,0,0);
6656  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
6657  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6658 
6659  //back
6660  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5*size.x,0,0);
6661  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
6662  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6663 
6664  // x-y faces (horizontal)
6665 
6666  //top
6667  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5*size.z);
6668  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
6669  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6670 
6671  //bottom
6672  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5*size.z);
6673  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
6674  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6675 
6676  }
6677 
6678  return UUID;
6679 
6680 }
6681 
6682 std::vector<uint> Context::addBox( const vec3 center, const vec3 size, const int3 subdiv, const char* texturefile, const bool reverse_normals ){
6683 
6684  std::vector<uint> UUID;
6685 
6686  vec3 subsize;
6687  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
6688  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
6689  subsize.z = size.z/float(subdiv.z);
6690 
6691  vec3 subcenter;
6692  std::vector<uint> U;
6693 
6694  if( reverse_normals ){ //normals point inward
6695 
6696  // x-z faces (vertical)
6697 
6698  //right
6699  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5*size.y,0);
6700  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
6701  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6702 
6703  //left
6704  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5*size.y,0);
6705  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
6706  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6707 
6708  // y-z faces (vertical)
6709 
6710  //front
6711  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5*size.x,0,0);
6712  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
6713  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6714 
6715  //back
6716  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5*size.x,0,0);
6717  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
6718  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6719 
6720  // x-y faces (horizontal)
6721 
6722  //top
6723  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5*size.z);
6724  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
6725  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6726 
6727  //bottom
6728  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5*size.z);
6729  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
6730  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6731 
6732  }else{ //normals point outward
6733 
6734  // x-z faces (vertical)
6735 
6736  //right
6737  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5*size.y,0);
6738  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
6739  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6740 
6741  //left
6742  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5*size.y,0);
6743  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
6744  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6745 
6746  // y-z faces (vertical)
6747 
6748  //front
6749  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5*size.x,0,0);
6750  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
6751  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6752 
6753  //back
6754  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5*size.x,0,0);
6755  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
6756  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6757 
6758  // x-y faces (horizontal)
6759 
6760  //top
6761  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5*size.z);
6762  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
6763  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6764 
6765  //bottom
6766  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5*size.z);
6767  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
6768  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
6769 
6770  }
6771 
6772  return UUID;
6773 
6774 }
6775 
6776 std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk( const uint Ndivs, const vec3& center, const vec2& size ){
6777  return addDisk(Ndivs,center,size,make_SphericalCoord(0,0),make_RGBAcolor(1,0,0,1));
6778 }
6779 
6780 std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk( const uint Ndivs, const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation ){
6781  return addDisk(Ndivs,center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(1,0,0,1));
6782 }
6783 
6784 std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk( const uint Ndivs, const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation, const RGBcolor& color ){
6785  return addDisk(Ndivs,center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(color,1));
6786 }
6787 
6788 std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk( const uint Ndivs, const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation, const RGBAcolor& color ){
6789 
6790  std::vector<uint> UUIDs;
6791  UUIDs.resize(Ndivs);
6792 
6793  for( int i=0; i<Ndivs; i++ ){
6794 
6795  float dtheta = 1.f/float(Ndivs)*2.f*M_PI;
6796 
6797  UUIDs.at(i) = addTriangle( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i)),0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i+1)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i+1)),0), color );
6798  getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs.at(i))->rotate( rotation.elevation, "y" );
6799  getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs.at(i))->rotate( rotation.azimuth, "z" );
6800  getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs.at(i))->translate( center );
6801 
6802  }
6803 
6804  return UUIDs;
6805 
6806 }
6807 
6808 std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk( const uint Ndivs, const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation, const char* texture_file ){
6809 
6810  std::vector<uint> UUIDs;
6811  UUIDs.resize(Ndivs);
6812 
6813  for( int i=0; i<Ndivs; i++ ){
6814 
6815  float dtheta = 1.f/float(Ndivs)*2.f*M_PI;
6816 
6817  UUIDs.at(i) = addTriangle( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i)),0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i+1)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i+1)),0), texture_file, make_vec2(0.5,0.5), make_vec2(0.5*(1+cosf(dtheta*float(i))),0.5*(1+sinf(dtheta*float(i)))), make_vec2(0.5*(1+cosf(dtheta*float(i+1))),0.5*(1+sinf(dtheta*float(i+1)))) );
6818  getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs.at(i))->rotate( rotation.elevation, "y" );
6819  getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs.at(i))->rotate( rotation.azimuth, "z" );
6820  getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs.at(i))->translate( center );
6821 
6822  }
6823 
6824  return UUIDs;
6825 
6826 }
6827 
6828 void Context::loadPData( pugi::xml_node p, uint UUID ){
6829 
6830  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_int"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_int")){
6831 
6832  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
6833  std::vector<int> datav;
6834  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
6835  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
6836  int tmp;
6837  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
6838  datav.push_back(tmp);
6839  }
6840  }
6841 
6842  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
6843 
6844  if( datav.size()==1 ){
6845  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
6846  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
6847  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
6848  }
6849 
6850  }
6851 
6852  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_uint"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_uint")){
6853 
6854  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
6855  std::vector<uint> datav;
6856  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
6857  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
6858  uint tmp;
6859  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
6860  datav.push_back(tmp);
6861  }
6862  }
6863 
6864  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
6865 
6866  if( datav.size()==1 ){
6867  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
6868  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
6869  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_UINT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
6870  }
6871 
6872  }
6873 
6874  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_float"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_float")){
6875 
6876  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
6877  std::vector<float> datav;
6878  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
6879  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
6880  float tmp;
6881  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
6882  datav.push_back(tmp);
6883  }
6884  }
6885 
6886  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
6887 
6888  if( datav.size()==1 ){
6889  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
6890  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
6891  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
6892  }
6893 
6894  }
6895 
6896  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_double"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_double")){
6897 
6898  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
6899  std::vector<double> datav;
6900  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
6901  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
6902  double tmp;
6903  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
6904  datav.push_back(tmp);
6905  }
6906  }
6907 
6908  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
6909 
6910  if( datav.size()==1 ){
6911  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
6912  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
6913  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
6914  }
6915 
6916  }
6917 
6918  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_vec2"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_vec2")){
6919 
6920  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
6921  std::vector<vec2> datav;
6922  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
6923  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
6924  std::vector<float> tmp;
6925  tmp.resize(2);
6926  int c = 0;
6927  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
6928  c++;
6929  if( c==2 ){
6930  datav.push_back(make_vec2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
6931  c=0;
6932  }
6933  }
6934  }
6935 
6936  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
6937 
6938  if( datav.size()==1 ){
6939  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
6940  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
6941  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
6942  }
6943 
6944  }
6945 
6946  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_vec3"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_vec3")){
6947 
6948  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
6949  std::vector<vec3> datav;
6950  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
6951  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
6952  std::vector<float> tmp;
6953  tmp.resize(3);
6954  int c = 0;
6955  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
6956  c++;
6957  if( c==3 ){
6958  datav.push_back(make_vec3(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2)));
6959  c=0;
6960  }
6961  }
6962  }
6963 
6964  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
6965 
6966  if( datav.size()==1 ){
6967  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
6968  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
6969  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
6970  }
6971 
6972  }
6973 
6974  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_vec4"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_vec4")){
6975 
6976  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
6977  std::vector<vec4> datav;
6978  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
6979  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
6980  std::vector<float> tmp;
6981  tmp.resize(4);
6982  int c = 0;
6983  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
6984  c++;
6985  if( c==4 ){
6986  datav.push_back(make_vec4(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2),tmp.at(3)));
6987  c=0;
6988  }
6989  }
6990  }
6991 
6992  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
6993 
6994  if( datav.size()==1 ){
6995  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
6996  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
6997  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
6998  }
6999 
7000  }
7001 
7002  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_int2"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_int2")){
7003 
7004  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
7005  std::vector<int2> datav;
7006  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
7007  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
7008  std::vector<int> tmp;
7009  tmp.resize(2);
7010  int c = 0;
7011  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
7012  c++;
7013  if( c==2 ){
7014  datav.push_back(make_int2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
7015  c=0;
7016  }
7017  }
7018  }
7019 
7020  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
7021 
7022  if( datav.size()==1 ){
7023  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
7024  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
7025  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT2,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
7026  }
7027 
7028  }
7029 
7030  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_int3"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_int3")){
7031 
7032  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
7033  std::vector<int3> datav;
7034  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
7035  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
7036  std::vector<int> tmp;
7037  tmp.resize(3);
7038  int c = 0;
7039  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
7040  c++;
7041  if( c==3 ){
7042  datav.push_back(make_int3(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2)));
7043  c=0;
7044  }
7045  }
7046  }
7047 
7048  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
7049 
7050  if( datav.size()==1 ){
7051  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
7052  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
7053  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT3,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
7054  }
7055 
7056  }
7057 
7058  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_int4"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_int4")){
7059 
7060  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
7061  std::vector<int4> datav;
7062  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
7063  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
7064  std::vector<int> tmp;
7065  tmp.resize(4);
7066  int c = 0;
7067  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
7068  c++;
7069  if( c==4 ){
7070  datav.push_back(make_int4(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2),tmp.at(3)));
7071  c=0;
7072  }
7073  }
7074  }
7075 
7076  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
7077 
7078  if( datav.size()==1 ){
7079  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
7080  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
7081  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT4,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
7082  }
7083 
7084  }
7085 
7086  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_string"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_string")){
7087 
7088  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
7089  std::vector<std::string> datav;
7090  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
7091  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
7092  std::string tmp;
7093  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
7094  datav.push_back(tmp);
7095  }
7096  }
7097 
7098  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
7099 
7100  if( datav.size()==1 ){
7101  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
7102  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
7103  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_STRING,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
7104  }
7105 
7106  }
7107 
7108 }
7109 
7110 std::vector<uint> Context::loadXML( const char* filename ){
7111 
7112  std::cout << "Loading XML file: " << filename << "..." << std::flush;
7113 
7114  XMLfiles.push_back( filename );
7115 
7116  uint ID;
7117  std::vector<uint> UUID;
7118 
7119  // Using "pugixml" parser. See pugixml.org
7120  pugi::xml_document xmldoc;
7121 
7122  //load file
7123  pugi::xml_parse_result result = xmldoc.load_file(filename);
7124 
7125  //error checking
7126  if (!result){
7127  std::cout << "failed." << std::endl;
7128  std::cerr << "XML [" << filename << "] parsed with errors, attr value: [" << xmldoc.child("node").attribute("attr").value() << "]\n";
7129  std::cerr << "Error description: " << result.description() << "\n";
7130  std::cerr << "Error offset: " << result.offset << " (error at [..." << (filename + result.offset) << "]\n\n";
7131  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
7132  }
7133 
7134  pugi::xml_node helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
7135 
7136  if( helios.empty() ){
7137  std::cout << "failed." << std::endl;
7138  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): XML file must have tag '<helios> ... </helios>' bounding all other tags." << std::endl;
7139  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
7140  }
7141 
7142  //-------------- TIME/DATE ---------------//
7143 
7144  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("date"); p; p = p.next_sibling("date")){
7145 
7146  pugi::xml_node year_node = p.child("year");
7147  const char* year_str = year_node.child_value();
7148  int year = atoi( year_str );
7149 
7150  pugi::xml_node month_node = p.child("month");
7151  const char* month_str = month_node.child_value();
7152  int month = atoi( month_str );
7153 
7154  pugi::xml_node day_node = p.child("day");
7155  const char* day_str = day_node.child_value();
7156  int day = atoi( day_str );
7157 
7158  setDate( day, month, year );
7159 
7160  }
7161 
7162  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("time"); p; p = p.next_sibling("time")){
7163 
7164  pugi::xml_node hour_node = p.child("hour");
7165  const char* hour_str = hour_node.child_value();
7166  int hour = atoi( hour_str );
7167 
7168  pugi::xml_node minute_node = p.child("minute");
7169  const char* minute_str = minute_node.child_value();
7170  int minute = atoi( minute_str );
7171 
7172  pugi::xml_node second_node = p.child("second");
7173  const char* second_str = second_node.child_value();
7174  int second = atoi( second_str );
7175 
7176  setTime( second, minute, hour );
7177 
7178  }
7179 
7180  //-------------- PATCHES ---------------//
7181  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("patch"); p; p = p.next_sibling("patch")){
7182 
7183  // * Patch Transformation Matrix * //
7184  float transform[16];
7185  pugi::xml_node transform_node = p.child("transform");
7186 
7187  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 3 floats
7188  const char* transform_str = transform_node.child_value();
7189  if( strlen(transform_str)==0 ){
7190  transform[0]=1.f;transform[1]=0.f;transform[2]=0.f;transform[3]=0.f;
7191  transform[4]=0.f;transform[5]=1.f;transform[6]=0.f;transform[7]=0.f;
7192  transform[8]=0.f;transform[9]=0.f;transform[10]=1.f;transform[11]=0.f;
7193  transform[12]=0.f;transform[13]=0.f;transform[14]=0.f;transform[15]=1.f;
7194  }else{
7195  std::istringstream stream(transform_str);
7196  float tmp;
7197  int i=0;
7198  while( stream >> tmp ){
7199  transform[i] = tmp;
7200  i++;
7201  }
7202  if( i!=16 ){
7203  std::cout << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): Transformation matrix does not have 16 elements. Assuming identity matrix." << std::endl;
7204  transform[0]=1.f;transform[1]=0.f;transform[2]=0.f;transform[3]=0.f;
7205  transform[4]=0.f;transform[5]=1.f;transform[6]=0.f;transform[7]=0.f;
7206  transform[8]=0.f;transform[9]=0.f;transform[10]=1.f;transform[11]=0.f;
7207  transform[12]=0.f;transform[13]=0.f;transform[14]=0.f;transform[15]=1.f;
7208  }
7209  }
7210 
7211  // * Patch Texture * //
7212  std::string texture_file;
7213  pugi::xml_node texture_node = p.child("texture");
7214  const char* texfile = deblank(texture_node.child_value());
7215  if( strlen(texfile)==0 ){
7216  texture_file = "none";
7217  }else{
7218  texture_file = texfile;
7219  }
7220 
7221  // * Patch Texture (u,v) Coordinates * //
7222  std::vector<vec2> uv;
7223  pugi::xml_node uv_node = p.child("textureUV");
7224  const char* texUV = uv_node.child_value();
7225  if( strlen(texUV)>0 ){
7226  std::istringstream uv_stream(texUV);
7227  std::vector<float> tmp;
7228  tmp.resize(2);
7229  int c = 0;
7230  while( uv_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
7231  c++;
7232  if( c==2 ){
7233  uv.push_back(make_vec2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
7234  c=0;
7235  }
7236  }
7237  if( c!=0 ){
7238  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): textureUV for patch does not contain an even number of elements. Skipping..." << std::endl;
7239  uv.resize(0);
7240  }
7241  if( uv.size()!=4 ){
7242  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): textureUV for patch does not contain four pairs of (u,v) coordinates. Skipping..." << std::endl;
7243  uv.resize(0);
7244  }
7245  }
7246 
7247  // * Patch Diffuse Colors * //
7248  RGBAcolor color;
7249  pugi::xml_node color_node = p.child("color");
7250 
7251  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 2 floats
7252  const char* color_str = color_node.child_value();
7253  if( strlen(color_str)==0 ){
7254  color = make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1);//assume default color of black
7255  }else{
7256  color=string2RGBcolor(color_str);
7257  }
7258 
7259  // * Add the Patch * //
7260  if( strcmp(texture_file.c_str(),"none")==0 ){
7261  ID=addPatch( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec2(1,1), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), color );
7262  }else{
7263  if( uv.size()==0 ){
7264  ID=addPatch( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec2(1,1), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), texture_file.c_str() );
7265  }else{
7266  ID=addPatch( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec2(1,1), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), texture_file.c_str(), 0.5*(uv.at(2)+uv.at(0)), uv.at(2)-uv.at(0) );
7267  }
7268  }
7269  getPrimitivePointer(ID)->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
7270 
7271  UUID.push_back(ID);
7272 
7273  //vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv//
7274  //This is for backward compatability (<v0.5.3)//
7275  //vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv//
7276 
7277  // * Patch Centers * //
7278  vec3 center;
7279  pugi::xml_node center_node = p.child("center");
7280 
7281  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 3 floats
7282  const char* center_str = center_node.child_value();
7283  if( strlen(center_str)!=0 ){
7284  center=string2vec3(center_str);
7285  getPatchPointer(ID)->translate(center);
7286  }
7287 
7288  // * Patch Sizes * //
7289  vec2 size;
7290  pugi::xml_node size_node = p.child("size");
7291 
7292  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 2 floats
7293  const char* size_str = size_node.child_value();
7294  if( strlen(size_str)!=0 ){
7295  size=string2vec2(size_str);
7296  getPatchPointer(ID)->scale(make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1));
7297  }
7298 
7299  // * Patch Rotations * //
7300  SphericalCoord rotation;
7301  pugi::xml_node rotation_node = p.child("rotation");
7302 
7303  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 2 floats
7304  const char* rotation_str = rotation_node.child_value();
7305  if( strlen(rotation_str)!=0 ){
7306  vec2 rot = string2vec2(rotation_str);
7307  getPatchPointer(ID)->rotate(rot.x,"y");
7308  getPatchPointer(ID)->rotate(rot.y,"z");
7309  }
7310 
7311  //^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^//
7312 
7313  // * Primitive Data * //
7314 
7315  loadPData( p, ID );
7316 
7317  }//end patches
7318 
7319  //-------------- TRIANGLES ---------------//
7320 
7321  //looping over any triangles specified in XML file
7322  for (pugi::xml_node tri = helios.child("triangle"); tri; tri = tri.next_sibling("triangle")){
7323 
7324  // * Triangle Transformation Matrix * //
7325  float transform[16];
7326  pugi::xml_node transform_node = tri.child("transform");
7327 
7328  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 3 floats
7329  const char* transform_str = transform_node.child_value();
7330  if( strlen(transform_str)==0 ){
7331  transform[0]=1.f;transform[1]=0.f;transform[2]=0.f;transform[3]=0.f;
7332  transform[4]=0.f;transform[5]=1.f;transform[6]=0.f;transform[7]=0.f;
7333  transform[8]=0.f;transform[9]=0.f;transform[10]=1.f;transform[11]=0.f;
7334  transform[12]=0.f;transform[13]=0.f;transform[14]=0.f;transform[15]=1.f;
7335  }else{
7336  std::istringstream stream(transform_str);
7337  float tmp;
7338  int i=0;
7339  while( stream >> tmp ){
7340  transform[i] = tmp;
7341  i++;
7342  }
7343  if( i!=16 ){
7344  std::cout << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): Transformation matrix does not have 16 elements. Assuming identity matrix." << std::endl;
7345  transform[0]=1.f;transform[1]=0.f;transform[2]=0.f;transform[3]=0.f;
7346  transform[4]=0.f;transform[5]=1.f;transform[6]=0.f;transform[7]=0.f;
7347  transform[8]=0.f;transform[9]=0.f;transform[10]=1.f;transform[11]=0.f;
7348  transform[12]=0.f;transform[13]=0.f;transform[14]=0.f;transform[15]=1.f;
7349  }
7350  }
7351 
7352  // * Triangle Texture * //
7353  std::string texture_file;
7354  pugi::xml_node texture_node = tri.child("texture");
7355  const char* texfile = deblank(texture_node.child_value());
7356  if( strlen(texfile)==0 ){
7357  texture_file = "none";
7358  }else{
7359  texture_file = texfile;
7360  }
7361 
7362  // * Triangle Texture (u,v) Coordinates * //
7363  std::vector<vec2> uv;
7364  pugi::xml_node uv_node = tri.child("textureUV");
7365  const char* texUV = uv_node.child_value();
7366  if( strlen(texUV)>0 ){
7367  std::istringstream uv_stream(texUV);
7368  std::vector<float> tmp;
7369  tmp.resize(2);
7370  int c = 0;
7371  while( uv_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
7372  c++;
7373  if( c==2 ){
7374  uv.push_back(make_vec2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
7375  c=0;
7376  }
7377  }
7378  if( c!=0 ){
7379  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): textureUV for patch does not contain an even number of elements. Skipping..." << std::endl;
7380  uv.resize(0);
7381  }
7382  if( uv.size()!=3 ){
7383  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): textureUV for triangle does not contain three pairs of (u,v) coordinates. Skipping..." << std::endl;
7384  uv.resize(0);
7385  }
7386  }
7387 
7388  // * Triangle Diffuse Colors * //
7389  RGBAcolor color;
7390  pugi::xml_node color_node = tri.child("color");
7391 
7392  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 2 floats
7393  const char* color_str = color_node.child_value();
7394  if( strlen(color_str)==0 ){
7395  color = make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1);//assume default color of black
7396  }else{
7397  color=string2RGBcolor(color_str);
7398  }
7399 
7400  //vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv//
7401  //This is for backward compatability (<v0.5.3)//
7402  //vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv//
7403 
7404  // * Triangle Vertices //
7405  std::vector<vec3> vert_pos;
7406  vert_pos.resize(3);
7407 
7408  pugi::xml_node vertices = tri.child("vertex");
7409 
7410  for(int i=0;i<3;i++){
7411 
7412  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 3 floats
7413  const char* str = vertices.child_value();
7414  vert_pos.at(i)=string2vec3(str);
7415 
7416  if( strlen(str)==0 ){
7417  if( i==0 ){
7418  break;
7419  }else if( i==1 ){
7420  std::cout << "failed." << std::endl;
7421  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): Only 1 vertex was given for triangle #" << tri << " (requires 3)." << std::endl;
7422  }else if( i==2) {
7423  std::cout << "failed." << std::endl;
7424  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): Only 2 vertices were given for triangle #" << tri << " (requires 3)." << std::endl;
7425  }
7426  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
7427  }
7428 
7429  vertices = vertices.next_sibling("vertex");
7430 
7431  }
7432 
7433  //^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^//
7434 
7435  // * Add the Triangle * //
7436  if( strcmp(texture_file.c_str(),"none")==0 || uv.size()==0 ){
7437  ID = addTriangle( vert_pos.at(0), vert_pos.at(1), vert_pos.at(2), color );
7438  }else{
7439  ID = addTriangle( vert_pos.at(0), vert_pos.at(1), vert_pos.at(2), texture_file.c_str(), uv.at(0), uv.at(1), uv.at(2) );
7440  }
7441  getPrimitivePointer(ID)->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
7442 
7443  UUID.push_back(ID);
7444 
7445  // * Primitive Data * //
7446 
7447  loadPData( tri, ID );
7448 
7449  }
7450 
7451  //-------------- VOXELS ---------------//
7452  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("voxel"); p; p = p.next_sibling("voxel")){
7453 
7454  // * Voxel Transformation Matrix * //
7455  float transform[16];
7456  pugi::xml_node transform_node = p.child("transform");
7457 
7458  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 3 floats
7459  const char* transform_str = transform_node.child_value();
7460  if( strlen(transform_str)==0 ){
7461  transform[0]=1.f;transform[1]=0.f;transform[2]=0.f;transform[3]=0.f;
7462  transform[4]=0.f;transform[5]=1.f;transform[6]=0.f;transform[7]=0.f;
7463  transform[8]=0.f;transform[9]=0.f;transform[10]=1.f;transform[11]=0.f;
7464  transform[12]=0.f;transform[13]=0.f;transform[14]=0.f;transform[15]=1.f;
7465  }else{
7466  std::istringstream stream(transform_str);
7467  float tmp;
7468  int i=0;
7469  while( stream >> tmp ){
7470  transform[i] = tmp;
7471  i++;
7472  }
7473  if( i!=16 ){
7474  std::cout << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): Transformation matrix does not have 16 elements. Assuming identity matrix." << std::endl;
7475  transform[0]=1.f;transform[1]=0.f;transform[2]=0.f;transform[3]=0.f;
7476  transform[4]=0.f;transform[5]=1.f;transform[6]=0.f;transform[7]=0.f;
7477  transform[8]=0.f;transform[9]=0.f;transform[10]=1.f;transform[11]=0.f;
7478  transform[12]=0.f;transform[13]=0.f;transform[14]=0.f;transform[15]=1.f;
7479  }
7480  }
7481 
7482  // * Voxel Diffuse Colors * //
7483  RGBAcolor color;
7484  pugi::xml_node color_node = p.child("color");
7485 
7486  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 2 floats
7487  const char* color_str = color_node.child_value();
7488  if( strlen(color_str)==0 ){
7489  color = make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1);//assume default color of black
7490  }else{
7491  color=string2RGBcolor(color_str);
7492  }
7493 
7494  // * Add the Voxel * //
7495  ID = addVoxel( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec3(0,0,0), 0, color );
7496  getPrimitivePointer(ID)->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
7497 
7498  UUID.push_back(ID);
7499 
7500  //vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv//
7501  //This is for backward compatability (<v0.5.3)//
7502  //vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv//
7503 
7504  // * Voxel Centers * //
7505  vec3 center;
7506  pugi::xml_node center_node = p.child("center");
7507 
7508  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 3 floats
7509  const char* center_str = center_node.child_value();
7510  if( strlen(center_str)!=0 ){
7511  center=string2vec3(center_str);
7512  getVoxelPointer(ID)->translate(center);
7513  }
7514 
7515  // * Voxel Sizes * //
7516  vec3 size;
7517  pugi::xml_node size_node = p.child("size");
7518 
7519  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 2 floats
7520  const char* size_str = size_node.child_value();
7521  if( strlen(size_str)!=0 ){
7522  size=string2vec3(size_str);
7523  getVoxelPointer(ID)->translate(size);
7524  }
7525 
7526  // * Voxel Rotation * //
7527  float rotation;
7528  pugi::xml_node rotation_node = p.child("rotation");
7529 
7530  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 2 floats
7531  const char* rotation_str = rotation_node.child_value();
7532  if( strlen(rotation_str)!=0 ){
7533  rotation = atof(rotation_str);
7534  getVoxelPointer(ID)->rotate(rotation,"z");
7535  }
7536 
7537  //^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^//
7538 
7539  // * Primitive Data * //
7540 
7541  loadPData( p, ID );
7542 
7543  }
7544 
7545  //-------------- GLOBAL DATA ---------------//
7546 
7547  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_int"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_int")){
7548 
7549  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
7550  std::vector<int> datav;
7551  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
7552  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
7553  int tmp;
7554  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
7555  datav.push_back(tmp);
7556  }
7557  }
7558 
7559  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
7560 
7561  if( datav.size()==1 ){
7562  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
7563  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
7564  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
7565  }
7566 
7567  }
7568 
7569  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_uint"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_uint")){
7570 
7571  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
7572  std::vector<uint> datav;
7573  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
7574  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
7575  uint tmp;
7576  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
7577  datav.push_back(tmp);
7578  }
7579  }
7580 
7581  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
7582 
7583  if( datav.size()==1 ){
7584  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
7585  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
7586  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_UINT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
7587  }
7588 
7589  }
7590 
7591  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_float"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_float")){
7592 
7593  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
7594  std::vector<float> datav;
7595  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
7596  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
7597  float tmp;
7598  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
7599  datav.push_back(tmp);
7600  }
7601  }
7602 
7603  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
7604 
7605  if( datav.size()==1 ){
7606  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
7607  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
7608  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
7609  }
7610 
7611  }
7612 
7613  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_double"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_double")){
7614 
7615  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
7616  std::vector<double> datav;
7617  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
7618  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
7619  double tmp;
7620  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
7621  datav.push_back(tmp);
7622  }
7623  }
7624 
7625  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
7626 
7627  if( datav.size()==1 ){
7628  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
7629  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
7630  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
7631  }
7632 
7633  }
7634 
7635  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_vec2"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_vec2")){
7636 
7637  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
7638  std::vector<vec2> datav;
7639  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
7640  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
7641  std::vector<float> tmp;
7642  tmp.resize(2);
7643  int c = 0;
7644  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
7645  c++;
7646  if( c==2 ){
7647  datav.push_back(make_vec2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
7648  c=0;
7649  }
7650  }
7651  }
7652 
7653  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
7654 
7655  if( datav.size()==1 ){
7656  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
7657  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
7658  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
7659  }
7660 
7661  }
7662 
7663  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_vec3"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_vec3")){
7664 
7665  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
7666  std::vector<vec3> datav;
7667  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
7668  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
7669  std::vector<float> tmp;
7670  tmp.resize(3);
7671  int c = 0;
7672  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
7673  c++;
7674  if( c==3 ){
7675  datav.push_back(make_vec3(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2)));
7676  c=0;
7677  }
7678  }
7679  }
7680 
7681  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
7682 
7683  if( datav.size()==1 ){
7684  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
7685  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
7686  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
7687  }
7688 
7689  }
7690 
7691  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_vec4"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_vec4")){
7692 
7693  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
7694  std::vector<vec4> datav;
7695  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
7696  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
7697  std::vector<float> tmp;
7698  tmp.resize(4);
7699  int c = 0;
7700  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
7701  c++;
7702  if( c==4 ){
7703  datav.push_back(make_vec4(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2),tmp.at(3)));
7704  c=0;
7705  }
7706  }
7707  }
7708 
7709  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
7710 
7711  if( datav.size()==1 ){
7712  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
7713  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
7714  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
7715  }
7716 
7717  }
7718 
7719  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_int2"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_int2")){
7720 
7721  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
7722  std::vector<int2> datav;
7723  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
7724  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
7725  std::vector<int> tmp;
7726  tmp.resize(2);
7727  int c = 0;
7728  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
7729  c++;
7730  if( c==2 ){
7731  datav.push_back(make_int2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
7732  c=0;
7733  }
7734  }
7735  }
7736 
7737  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
7738 
7739  if( datav.size()==1 ){
7740  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
7741  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
7742  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT2,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
7743  }
7744 
7745  }
7746 
7747  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_int3"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_int3")){
7748 
7749  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
7750  std::vector<int3> datav;
7751  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
7752  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
7753  std::vector<int> tmp;
7754  tmp.resize(3);
7755  int c = 0;
7756  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
7757  c++;
7758  if( c==3 ){
7759  datav.push_back(make_int3(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2)));
7760  c=0;
7761  }
7762  }
7763  }
7764 
7765  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
7766 
7767  if( datav.size()==1 ){
7768  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
7769  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
7770  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT3,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
7771  }
7772 
7773  }
7774 
7775  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_int4"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_int4")){
7776 
7777  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
7778  std::vector<int4> datav;
7779  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
7780  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
7781  std::vector<int> tmp;
7782  tmp.resize(4);
7783  int c = 0;
7784  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
7785  c++;
7786  if( c==4 ){
7787  datav.push_back(make_int4(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2),tmp.at(3)));
7788  c=0;
7789  }
7790  }
7791  }
7792 
7793  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
7794 
7795  if( datav.size()==1 ){
7796  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
7797  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
7798  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT4,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
7799  }
7800 
7801  }
7802 
7803  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_string"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_string")){
7804 
7805  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
7806  std::vector<std::string> datav;
7807  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
7808  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
7809  std::string tmp;
7810  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
7811  datav.push_back(tmp);
7812  }
7813  }
7814 
7815  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
7816 
7817  if( datav.size()==1 ){
7818  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
7819  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
7820  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_STRING,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
7821  }
7822 
7823  }
7824 
7825  //-------------- TIMESERIES DATA ---------------//
7826  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("timeseries"); p; p = p.next_sibling("timeseries")){
7827 
7828  const char* label = p.attribute("label").value();
7829 
7830  for (pugi::xml_node d = p.child("datapoint"); d; d = d.next_sibling("datapoint")){
7831 
7832  Time time;
7833  pugi::xml_node time_node = d.child("time");
7834  const char* time_str = time_node.child_value();
7835  if( strlen(time_str)>0 ){
7836  int3 time_ = string2int3(time_str);
7837  if( time_.x<0 || time_.x>23 ){
7838  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): Invalid hour of " << time_.x << " given in timeseries. Hour must be positive and not greater than 23." << std::endl;
7839  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
7840  }else if( time_.y<0 || time_.y>59 ){
7841  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): Invalid minute of " << time_.y << " given in timeseries. Minute must be positive and not greater than 59." << std::endl;
7842  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
7843  }else if( time_.z<0 || time_.z>59 ){
7844  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): Invalid second of " << time_.z << " given in timeseries. Second must be positive and not greater than 59." << std::endl;
7845  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
7846  }
7847  time = make_Time(time_.x, time_.y,time_.z);
7848  }else{
7849  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): No time was specified for timeseries datapoint." << std::endl;
7850  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
7851  }
7852 
7853  Date date;
7854  bool date_flag=false;
7855 
7856  pugi::xml_node date_node = d.child("date");
7857  const char* date_str = date_node.child_value();
7858  if( strlen(date_str)>0 ){
7859  int3 date_ = string2int3(date_str);
7860  if( date_.x<1 || date_.x>31 ){
7861  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): Invalid day of month " << date_.x << " given in timeseries. Day must be greater than zero and not greater than 31." << std::endl;
7862  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
7863  }else if( date_.y<1 || date_.y>12 ){
7864  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): Invalid month of " << date_.y << " given in timeseries. Month must be greater than zero and not greater than 12." << std::endl;
7865  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
7866  }else if( date_.z<1000 || date_.z>10000 ){
7867  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): Invalid year of " << date_.z << " given in timeseries. Year should be in YYYY format." << std::endl;
7868  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
7869  }
7870  date = make_Date(date_.x, date_.y, date_.z );
7871  date_flag=true;
7872  }
7873 
7874  pugi::xml_node Jdate_node = d.child("dateJulian");
7875  const char* Jdate_str = Jdate_node.child_value();
7876  if( strlen(Jdate_str)>0 ){
7877  int2 date_ = string2int2(Jdate_str);
7878  if( date_.x<1 || date_.x>366 ){
7879  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): Invalid Julian day of year " << date_.x << " given in timeseries. Julian day must be greater than zero and not greater than 366." << std::endl;
7880  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
7881  }else if( date_.y<1000 || date_.y>10000 ){
7882  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): Invalid year of " << date_.y << " given in timeseries. Year should be in YYYY format." << std::endl;
7883  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
7884  }
7885  date = Julian2Calendar( date_.x, date_.y );
7886  date_flag=true;
7887  }
7888 
7889  if( !date_flag ){
7890  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): No date was specified for timeseries datapoint." << std::endl;
7891  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
7892  }
7893 
7894  float value;
7895  pugi::xml_node value_node = d.child("value");
7896  const char* value_str = value_node.child_value();
7897  if( strlen(value_str)>0 ){
7898  value = atof(value_str);
7899  }else{
7900  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): No value was specified for timeseries datapoint." << std::endl;
7901  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
7902  }
7903 
7904  addTimeseriesData(label,value,date,time);
7905 
7906  }
7907 
7908  }
7909 
7910  std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
7911 
7912  return UUID;
7913 
7914 }
7915 
7916 std::vector<std::string> Context::getLoadedXMLFiles( void ){
7917  return XMLfiles;
7918 }
7919 
7920 void Context::writeXML( const char* filename ) const{
7921  std::cout << "Writing XML file " << filename << "..." << std::flush;
7922 
7923  std::ofstream outfile;
7924  outfile.open(filename);
7925 
7926  outfile << "<?xml version=\"1.0\"?>\n\n";
7927 
7928  outfile << "<helios>\n\n";
7929 
7930  // -- time/date -- //
7931 
7932  Date date = getDate();
7933 
7934  outfile << " <date>" << std::endl;
7935 
7936  outfile << "\t<day>" << date.day << "</day>" << std::endl;
7937  outfile << "\t<month>" << date.month << "</month>" << std::endl;
7938  outfile << "\t<year>" << date.year << "</year>" << std::endl;
7939 
7940  outfile << " </date>" << std::endl;
7941 
7942  Time time = getTime();
7943 
7944  outfile << " <time>" << std::endl;
7945 
7946  outfile << "\t<hour>" << time.hour << "</hour>" << std::endl;
7947  outfile << "\t<minute>" << time.minute << "</minute>" << std::endl;
7948  outfile << "\t<second>" << time.second << "</second>" << std::endl;
7949 
7950  outfile << " </time>" << std::endl;
7951 
7952  // -- primitive stuff -- //
7953 
7954  for( std::map<uint,Primitive*>::const_iterator iter = primitives.begin(); iter != primitives.end(); ++iter ){
7955 
7956  uint p = iter->first;
7957 
7958  Primitive* prim = getPrimitivePointer(p);
7959 
7960  RGBAcolor color = prim->getColorRGBA();
7961 
7962  std::string texture_file = prim->getTextureFile();
7963 
7964  std::vector<std::string> pdata = prim->listPrimitiveData();
7965 
7966  if( prim->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
7967  outfile << " <patch>" << std::endl;
7968  }else if( prim->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
7969  outfile << " <triangle>" << std::endl;
7970  }else if( prim->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL ){
7971  outfile << " <voxel>" << std::endl;
7972  }
7973 
7974  outfile << "\t<UUID>" << p << "</UUID>" << std::endl;
7975  outfile << "\t<color>" << color.r << " " << color.g << " " << color.b << " " << color.a << "</color>" << std::endl;
7976  if( prim->hasTexture() ){
7977  outfile << "\t<texture>" << texture_file << "</texture>" << std::endl;
7978  }
7979  if( pdata.size()>0 ){
7980  for( int i=0; i<pdata.size(); i++ ){
7981  std::string label = pdata.at(i);
7982  size_t dsize = prim->getPrimitiveDataSize( label.c_str() );
7983  HeliosDataType dtype = prim->getPrimitiveDataType( label.c_str() );
7984  if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
7985  outfile << "\t<data_uint label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
7986  std::vector<uint> data;
7987  prim->getPrimitiveData( label.c_str(), data );
7988  for( int j=0; j<data.size(); j++ ){
7989  outfile << data.at(j) << std::flush;
7990  if( j!=data.size()-1 ){
7991  outfile << " " << std::flush;
7992  }
7993  }
7994  outfile << "</data_uint>" << std::endl;
7995  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
7996  outfile << "\t<data_int label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
7997  std::vector<int> data;
7998  prim->getPrimitiveData( label.c_str(), data );
7999  for( int j=0; j<data.size(); j++ ){
8000  outfile << data.at(j) << std::flush;
8001  if( j!=data.size()-1 ){
8002  outfile << " " << std::flush;
8003  }
8004  }
8005  outfile << "</data_int>" << std::endl;
8006  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
8007  outfile << "\t<data_float label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
8008  std::vector<float> data;
8009  prim->getPrimitiveData( label.c_str(), data );
8010  for( int j=0; j<data.size(); j++ ){
8011  outfile << data.at(j) << std::flush;
8012  if( j!=data.size()-1 ){
8013  outfile << " " << std::flush;
8014  }
8015  }
8016  outfile << "</data_float>" << std::endl;
8017  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
8018  outfile << "\t<data_double label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
8019  std::vector<double> data;
8020  prim->getPrimitiveData( label.c_str(), data );
8021  for( int j=0; j<data.size(); j++ ){
8022  outfile << data.at(j) << std::flush;
8023  if( j!=data.size()-1 ){
8024  outfile << " " << std::flush;
8025  }
8026  }
8027  outfile << "</data_double>" << std::endl;
8028  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
8029  outfile << "\t<data_vec2 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
8030  std::vector<vec2> data;
8031  prim->getPrimitiveData( label.c_str(), data );
8032  for( int j=0; j<data.size(); j++ ){
8033  outfile << data.at(j).x << " " << data.at(j).y << std::flush;
8034  if( j!=data.size()-1 ){
8035  outfile << " " << std::flush;
8036  }
8037  }
8038  outfile << "</data_vec2>" << std::endl;
8039  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
8040  outfile << "\t<data_vec3 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
8041  std::vector<vec3> data;
8042  prim->getPrimitiveData( label.c_str(), data );
8043  for( int j=0; j<data.size(); j++ ){
8044  outfile << data.at(j).x << " " << data.at(j).y << " " << data.at(j).z << std::flush;
8045  if( j!=data.size()-1 ){
8046  outfile << " " << std::flush;
8047  }
8048  }
8049  outfile << "</data_vec3>" << std::endl;
8050  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
8051  outfile << "\t<data_vec4 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
8052  std::vector<vec4> data;
8053  prim->getPrimitiveData( label.c_str(), data );
8054  for( int j=0; j<data.size(); j++ ){
8055  outfile << data.at(j).x << " " << data.at(j).y << " " << data.at(j).z << " " << data.at(j).w << std::flush;
8056  if( j!=data.size()-1 ){
8057  outfile << " " << std::flush;
8058  }
8059  }
8060  outfile << "</data_vec4>" << std::endl;
8061  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
8062  outfile << "\t<data_int2 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
8063  std::vector<int2> data;
8064  prim->getPrimitiveData( label.c_str(), data );
8065  for( int j=0; j<data.size(); j++ ){
8066  outfile << data.at(j).x << " " << data.at(j).y << std::flush;
8067  if( j!=data.size()-1 ){
8068  outfile << " " << std::flush;
8069  }
8070  }
8071  outfile << "</data_int2>" << std::endl;
8072  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
8073  outfile << "\t<data_int3 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
8074  std::vector<int3> data;
8075  prim->getPrimitiveData( label.c_str(), data );
8076  for( int j=0; j<data.size(); j++ ){
8077  outfile << data.at(j).x << " " << data.at(j).y << " " << data.at(j).z << std::flush;
8078  if( j!=data.size()-1 ){
8079  outfile << " " << std::flush;
8080  }
8081  }
8082  outfile << "</data_int3>" << std::endl;
8083  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
8084  outfile << "\t<data_int3 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
8085  std::vector<int4> data;
8086  prim->getPrimitiveData( label.c_str(), data );
8087  for( int j=0; j<data.size(); j++ ){
8088  outfile << data.at(j).x << " " << data.at(j).y << " " << data.at(j).z << " " << data.at(j).w << std::flush;
8089  if( j!=data.size()-1 ){
8090  outfile << " " << std::flush;
8091  }
8092  }
8093  outfile << "</data_int4>" << std::endl;
8094  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
8095  outfile << "\t<data_string label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
8096  std::vector<std::string> data;
8097  prim->getPrimitiveData( label.c_str(), data );
8098  for( int j=0; j<data.size(); j++ ){
8099  outfile << data.at(j) << std::flush;
8100  if( j!=data.size()-1 ){
8101  outfile << " " << std::flush;
8102  }
8103  }
8104  outfile << "</data_string>" << std::endl;
8105  }
8106  }
8107  }
8108 
8109  //Patches
8110  if( prim->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
8111 
8112  Patch* patch = getPatchPointer(p);
8113  float transform[16];
8114  prim->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
8115 
8116  outfile << "\t<transform> ";
8117  for( int i=0; i<16; i++ ){
8118  outfile << transform[i] << " ";
8119  }
8120  outfile << "</transform>" << std::endl;
8121  std::vector<vec2> uv = patch->getTextureUV();
8122  if( uv.size()>0 ){
8123  outfile << "\t<textureUV>" << std::flush;
8124  for( int i=0; i<uv.size(); i++ ){
8125  outfile << uv.at(i).x << " " << uv.at(i).y << std::flush;
8126  if( i!=uv.size()-1 ){
8127  outfile << " " << std::flush;
8128  }
8129  }
8130  outfile << "</textureUV>" << std::endl;
8131  }
8132  outfile << " </patch>" << std::endl;
8133 
8134  //Triangles
8135  }else if( prim->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
8136 
8137  float transform[16];
8138  prim->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
8139 
8140  outfile << "\t<transform> ";
8141  for( int i=0; i<16; i++ ){
8142  outfile << transform[i] << " ";
8143  }
8144  outfile << "</transform>" << std::endl;
8145 
8146  std::vector<vec2> uv = getTrianglePointer(p)->getTextureUV();
8147  if( uv.size()>0 ){
8148  outfile << "\t<textureUV>" << std::flush;
8149  for( int i=0; i<uv.size(); i++ ){
8150  outfile << uv.at(i).x << " " << uv.at(i).y << std::flush;
8151  if( i!=uv.size()-1 ){
8152  outfile << " " << std::flush;
8153  }
8154  }
8155  outfile << "</textureUV>" << std::endl;
8156  }
8157  outfile << " </triangle>" << std::endl;
8158 
8159  //Voxels
8160  }else if( prim->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL ){
8161 
8162  float transform[16];
8163  prim->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
8164 
8165  outfile << "\t<transform> ";
8166  for( int i=0; i<16; i++ ){
8167  outfile << transform[i] << " ";
8168  }
8169  outfile << "</transform>" << std::endl;
8170 
8171  outfile << " </voxel>" << std::endl;
8172 
8173  }
8174 
8175  }
8176 
8177  // -- global data -- //
8178 
8179  for( std::map<std::string, GlobalData>::const_iterator iter=globaldata.begin(); iter!=globaldata.end(); ++iter ){
8180  std::string label = iter->first;
8181  GlobalData data = iter->second;
8182  HeliosDataType type = data.type;
8183  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
8184  outfile << " <globaldata_uint label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
8185  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
8186  outfile << data.global_data_uint.at(i) << std::flush;
8187  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
8188  outfile << " " << std::flush;
8189  }
8190  }
8191  outfile << "</globaldata_uint>" << std::endl;
8192  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
8193  outfile << " <globaldata_int label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
8194  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
8195  outfile << data.global_data_int.at(i) << std::flush;
8196  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
8197  outfile << " " << std::flush;
8198  }
8199  }
8200  outfile << "</globaldata_int>" << std::endl;
8201  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
8202  outfile << " <globaldata_float label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
8203  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
8204  outfile << data.global_data_float.at(i) << std::flush;
8205  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
8206  outfile << " " << std::flush;
8207  }
8208  }
8209  outfile << "</globaldata_float>" << std::endl;
8210  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
8211  outfile << " <globaldata_double label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
8212  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
8213  outfile << data.global_data_double.at(i) << std::flush;
8214  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
8215  outfile << " " << std::flush;
8216  }
8217  }
8218  outfile << "</globaldata_double>" << std::endl;
8219  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
8220  outfile << " <globaldata_vec2 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
8221  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
8222  outfile << data.global_data_vec2.at(i).x << " " << data.global_data_vec2.at(i).y << std::flush;
8223  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
8224  outfile << " " << std::flush;
8225  }
8226  }
8227  outfile << "</globaldata_vec2>" << std::endl;
8228  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
8229  outfile << " <globaldata_vec3 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
8230  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
8231  outfile << data.global_data_vec3.at(i).x << " " << data.global_data_vec3.at(i).y << " " << data.global_data_vec3.at(i).z << std::flush;
8232  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
8233  outfile << " " << std::flush;
8234  }
8235  }
8236  outfile << "</globaldata_vec3>" << std::endl;
8237  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
8238  outfile << " <globaldata_vec4 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
8239  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
8240  outfile << data.global_data_vec4.at(i).x << " " << data.global_data_vec4.at(i).y << " " << data.global_data_vec4.at(i).z << " " << data.global_data_vec4.at(i).w << std::flush;
8241  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
8242  outfile << " " << std::flush;
8243  }
8244  }
8245  outfile << "</globaldata_vec4>" << std::endl;
8246  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
8247  outfile << " <globaldata_int2 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
8248  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
8249  outfile << data.global_data_int2.at(i).x << " " << data.global_data_int2.at(i).y << std::flush;
8250  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
8251  outfile << " " << std::flush;
8252  }
8253  }
8254  outfile << "</globaldata_int2>" << std::endl;
8255  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
8256  outfile << " <globaldata_int3 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
8257  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
8258  outfile << data.global_data_int3.at(i).x << " " << data.global_data_int3.at(i).y << data.global_data_int3.at(i).z << std::flush;
8259  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
8260  outfile << " " << std::flush;
8261  }
8262  }
8263  outfile << "</globaldata_int3>" << std::endl;
8264  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
8265  outfile << " <globaldata_int4 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
8266  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
8267  outfile << data.global_data_int4.at(i).x << " " << data.global_data_int4.at(i).y << data.global_data_int4.at(i).z << data.global_data_int4.at(i).w << std::flush;
8268  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
8269  outfile << " " << std::flush;
8270  }
8271  }
8272  outfile << "</globaldata_int4>" << std::endl;
8273  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
8274  outfile << " <globaldata_string label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
8275  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
8276  outfile << data.global_data_string.at(i) << std::flush;
8277  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
8278  outfile << " " << std::flush;
8279  }
8280  }
