8281  outfile << "</globaldata_string>" << std::endl;
8282  }
8283 
8284  }
8285 
8286  // -- timeseries -- //
8287 
8288  for( std::map<std::string, std::vector<float> >::const_iterator iter=timeseries_data.begin(); iter!=timeseries_data.end(); ++iter ){
8289 
8290  std::string label = iter->first;
8291 
8292  std::vector<float> data = iter->second;
8293  std::vector<double> dateval = timeseries_datevalue.at(label);
8294 
8295  assert( data.size()==dateval.size() );
8296 
8297  outfile << " <timeseries label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::endl;
8298 
8299  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size(); i++ ){
8300 
8301  Date date = queryTimeseriesDate( label.c_str(), i );
8302  Time time = queryTimeseriesTime( label.c_str(), i );
8303 
8304  outfile << "\t<datapoint>" << std::endl;
8305 
8306  outfile << "\t <date>" << date.day << " " << date.month << " " << date.year << "</date>" << std::endl;
8307 
8308  outfile << "\t <time>" << time.hour << " " << time.minute << " " << time.second << "</time>" << std::endl;
8309 
8310  outfile << "\t <value>" << data.at(i) << "</value>" << std::endl;
8311 
8312  outfile << "\t</datapoint>" << std::endl;
8313  }
8314 
8315  outfile << " </timeseries>" << std::endl;
8316 
8317  }
8318 
8319  // ----------------- //
8320 
8321  outfile << "\n</helios>\n";
8322 
8323  outfile.close();
8324 
8325  std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
8326 }
8327 
8328 std::vector<uint> Context::loadPLY( const char* filename, const vec3 origin, const float height ){
8329  return loadPLY( filename, origin, height, make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_RGBcolor(0,0,1) );
8330 }
8331 
8332 std::vector<uint> Context::loadPLY( const char* filename, const vec3 origin, const float height, const SphericalCoord rotation ){
8333  return loadPLY( filename, origin, height, rotation, make_RGBcolor(0,0,1) );
8334 }
8335 
8336 std::vector<uint> Context::loadPLY( const char* filename, const vec3 origin, const float height, const RGBcolor default_color ){
8337  return loadPLY( filename, origin, height, make_SphericalCoord(0,0), default_color );
8338 }
8339 
8340 std::vector<uint> Context::loadPLY( const char* filename, const vec3 origin, const float height, const SphericalCoord rotation, const RGBcolor default_color ){
8341 
8342  std::cout << "Reading PLY file " << filename << "..." << std::flush;
8343 
8344  std::string line, prop;
8345 
8346  uint vertexCount=0, faceCount=0;
8347 
8348  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
8349  std::vector<std::vector<int> > faces;
8350  std::vector<RGBcolor> colors;
8351  std::vector<std::string> properties;
8352 
8353  bool ifColor=false;
8354 
8355  std::ifstream inputPly;
8356  inputPly.open(filename);
8357 
8358  if (!inputPly.is_open()) {
8359  std::cerr << "Couldn't open " << filename << std::endl;;
8360  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
8361  }
8362 
8363  //--- read header info -----//
8364 
8365  //first line should always be 'ply'
8366  inputPly>>line;
8367  if( strcmp("ply",line.c_str())!=0 ){
8368  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadPLY): " << filename << " is not a PLY file." << std::endl;
8369  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
8370  }
8371 
8372  //read format
8373  inputPly>>line;
8374  if( strcmp("format",line.c_str())!=0 ){
8375  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadPLY): could not determine data format of " << filename << std::endl;
8376  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
8377  }
8378 
8379  inputPly>>line;
8380  if( strcmp("ascii",line.c_str())!=0 ){
8381  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadPLY): Only ASCII data types are supported." << std::endl;
8382  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
8383  }
8384 
8385  while(strcmp("end_header",line.c_str())!=0){
8386 
8387  inputPly>>line;
8388 
8389  if( strcmp("comment",line.c_str())==0 ){
8390  getline(inputPly, line);
8391  }
8392  else if( strcmp("element",line.c_str())==0 ){
8393 
8394  inputPly>>line;
8395 
8396  if( strcmp("vertex",line.c_str())==0 ){
8397  inputPly>>vertexCount;
8398  }else if( strcmp("face",line.c_str())==0 ){
8399  inputPly>>faceCount;
8400  }
8401 
8402 
8403  }else if( strcmp("property",line.c_str())==0 ){
8404 
8405  inputPly>>line; //type
8406 
8407  if( strcmp("list",line.c_str())!=0 ){
8408 
8409  inputPly>>prop; //value
8410  properties.push_back(prop);
8411 
8412  }
8413 
8414  }
8415 
8416 
8417  }
8418 
8419  for( uint i=0; i<properties.size(); i++ ){
8420  if( strcmp(properties.at(i).c_str(),"red")==0 ){
8421  ifColor = true;
8422  }
8423  }
8424  std::cout<< "forming " << faceCount << " triangles..." << std::flush;
8425 
8426  vertices.resize(vertexCount);
8427  colors.resize(vertexCount);
8428  faces.resize(faceCount);
8429 
8430 
8431  //--- read vertices ----//
8432 
8433  for( uint row=0; row<vertexCount; row++ ){
8434 
8435  for( uint i=0; i<properties.size(); i++ ){
8436  if( strcmp(properties.at(i).c_str(),"x")==0 ){ //Note: permuting x,y,z to match our coordinate system (z-vertical instead of y-vertical)
8437  inputPly >> vertices.at(row).y;
8438  }else if( strcmp(properties.at(i).c_str(),"y")==0 ){
8439  inputPly >> vertices.at(row).z;
8440  }else if( strcmp(properties.at(i).c_str(),"z")==0 ){
8441  inputPly >> vertices.at(row).x;
8442  }else if( strcmp(properties.at(i).c_str(),"red")==0 ){
8443  inputPly >> colors.at(row).r;
8444  colors.at(row).r /= 255.f;
8445  }else if( strcmp(properties.at(i).c_str(),"green")==0 ){
8446  inputPly >> colors.at(row).g;
8447  colors.at(row).g /= 255.f;
8448  }else if( strcmp(properties.at(i).c_str(),"blue")==0 ){
8449  inputPly >> colors.at(row).b;
8450  colors.at(row).b /= 255.f;
8451  // }else if( strcmp(properties.at(i).c_str(),"alpha")==0 ){
8452  // inputPly >> colors.at(row).a;
8453  }else{
8454  inputPly >> line;
8455  }
8456  }
8457 
8458  }
8459 
8460  //determine bounding box
8461 
8462  vec3 boxmin = make_vec3(10000,10000,10000);
8463  vec3 boxmax = make_vec3(-10000,-10000,-10000);
8464 
8465  for( uint row=0; row<vertexCount; row++ ){
8466 
8467  if(vertices.at(row).x < boxmin.x ){
8468  boxmin.x = vertices.at(row).x;
8469  }
8470  if(vertices.at(row).y < boxmin.y ){
8471  boxmin.y = vertices.at(row).y;
8472  }
8473  if(vertices.at(row).z < boxmin.z ){
8474  boxmin.z = vertices.at(row).z;
8475  }
8476 
8477  if(vertices.at(row).x > boxmax.x ){
8478  boxmax.x = vertices.at(row).x;
8479  }
8480  if(vertices.at(row).y > boxmax.y ){
8481  boxmax.y = vertices.at(row).y;
8482  }
8483  if(vertices.at(row).z > boxmax.z ){
8484  boxmax.z = vertices.at(row).z;
8485  }
8486 
8487  }
8488 
8489  //center PLY object at `origin' and scale to have height `height'
8490  float scl = height/(boxmax.z-boxmin.z);
8491  for( uint row=0; row<vertexCount; row++ ){
8492  vertices.at(row).z -= boxmin.z;
8493 
8494  vertices.at(row).x *= scl;
8495  vertices.at(row).y *= scl;
8496  vertices.at(row).z *= scl;
8497 
8498  vertices.at(row) = rotatePoint(vertices.at(row),rotation) + origin;
8499  }
8500 
8501  //--- read faces ----//
8502 
8503  uint v, ID;
8504  std::vector<uint> UUID;
8505  for( uint row=0; row<faceCount; row++ ){
8506 
8507  inputPly >> v;
8508 
8509  faces.at(row).resize(v);
8510 
8511  for( uint i=0; i<v; i++ ){
8512  inputPly >> faces.at(row).at(i);
8513  }
8514 
8515  //Add triangles to context
8516 
8517  for( uint t=2; t<v; t++ ){
8518 
8519  RGBcolor color;
8520  if( ifColor ){
8521  color = colors.at(faces.at(row).front());
8522  }else{
8523  color = default_color;
8524  }
8525 
8526  vec3 v0 = vertices.at(faces.at(row).front());
8527  vec3 v1 = vertices.at(faces.at(row).at(t-1));
8528  vec3 v2 = vertices.at(faces.at(row).at(t));
8529 
8530  if( (v0-v1).magnitude()==0 || (v0-v2).magnitude()==0 || (v1-v2).magnitude()==0 ){
8531  continue;
8532  }
8533 
8534  ID = addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color );
8535 
8536  UUID.push_back(ID);
8537 
8538  }
8539 
8540  }
8541 
8542  std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
8543 
8544  return UUID;
8545 
8546 }
8547 
8548 void Context::writePLY( const char* filename ) const{
8549 
8550  std::ofstream PLYfile;
8551  PLYfile.open(filename);
8552 
8553  PLYfile << "ply" << std::endl << "format ascii 1.0" << std::endl << "comment HELIOS generated" << std::endl;
8554 
8555  std::vector<int3> faces;
8556  std::vector<vec3> verts;
8557  std::vector<RGBcolor> colors;
8558 
8559  size_t vertex_count = 0;
8560 
8561  for( std::map<uint,Primitive*>::const_iterator iter = primitives.begin(); iter != primitives.end(); ++iter ){
8562 
8563  uint p = iter->first;
8564 
8565  std::vector<vec3> vertices = getPrimitivePointer(p)->getVertices();
8566  PrimitiveType type = getPrimitivePointer(p)->getType();
8567  RGBcolor C = getPrimitivePointer(p)->getColor();
8568  C.scale(255.f);
8569 
8570  if( type==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
8571 
8572  faces.push_back( make_int3( vertex_count, vertex_count+1, vertex_count+2 ) );
8573  for( int i=0; i<3; i++ ){
8574  verts.push_back( vertices.at(i) );
8575  colors.push_back( C );
8576  vertex_count ++;
8577  }
8578 
8579  }else if( type==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
8580 
8581  faces.push_back( make_int3( vertex_count, vertex_count+1, vertex_count+2 ) );
8582  faces.push_back( make_int3( vertex_count, vertex_count+2, vertex_count+3 ) );
8583  for( int i=0; i<4; i++ ){
8584  verts.push_back( vertices.at(i) );
8585  colors.push_back( C );
8586  vertex_count ++;
8587  }
8588 
8589  }
8590 
8591  }
8592 
8593  PLYfile << "element vertex " << verts.size() << std::endl;
8594  PLYfile << "property float x" << std::endl << "property float y" << std::endl << "property float z" << std::endl;
8595  PLYfile << "property uchar red" << std::endl << "property uchar green" << std::endl << "property uchar blue" << std::endl;
8596  PLYfile << "element face " << faces.size() << std::endl;
8597  PLYfile << "property list uchar int vertex_indices" << std::endl << "end_header" << std::endl;
8598 
8599  for( size_t v=0; v<verts.size(); v++ ){
8600  PLYfile << verts.at(v).x << " " << verts.at(v).y << " " << verts.at(v).z << " " << round(colors.at(v).r) << " " << round(colors.at(v).g) << " " << round(colors.at(v).b) << std::endl;
8601  }
8602 
8603  for( size_t f=0; f<faces.size(); f++ ){
8604  PLYfile << "3 " << faces.at(f).x << " " << faces.at(f).y << " " << faces.at(f).z << std::endl;
8605  }
8606 
8607  PLYfile.close();
8608 
8609 
8610 }
8611 
8612 std::vector<uint> Context::loadOBJ( const char* filename, const vec3 origin, const float height, const SphericalCoord rotation, const RGBcolor default_color ){
8613  return loadOBJ(filename,origin,height,rotation,default_color,"ZUP");
8614 }
8615 
8616 std::vector<uint> Context::loadOBJ( const char* filename, const vec3 origin, const float height, const SphericalCoord rotation, const RGBcolor default_color, const char* upaxis ){
8617 
8618  std::cout << "Reading OBJ file " << filename << "..." << std::flush;
8619 
8620  if( strcmp(upaxis,"XUP") && strcmp(upaxis,"YUP") && strcmp(upaxis,"ZUP") ){
8621  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadOBJ): Up axis of " << upaxis << " is not valid. Should be one of 'XUP', 'YUP', or 'ZUP'." << std::endl;
8622  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
8623  }
8624 
8625  std::string line, prop;
8626 
8627  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
8628  std::vector<vec2> texture_uv;
8629  std::map<std::string,std::vector<std::vector<int> > > face_inds, texture_inds;
8630  //std::vector<RGBcolor> colors;
8631 
8632  std::map<std::string,std::string> material_textures;
8633 
8634  std::vector<uint> UUID;
8635 
8636  std::ifstream inputOBJ, inputMTL;
8637  inputOBJ.open(filename);
8638 
8639  if (!inputOBJ.is_open()) {
8640  std::cerr << "Couldn't open " << filename << std::endl;;
8641  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
8642  }
8643 
8644  //determine the base file path for 'filename'
8645  std::string fstring = filename;
8646  std::string filebase;
8647  for( int i=fstring.size()-1; i>=0; i-- ){
8648  if( strncmp(&fstring[i],"/",1)==0 ){
8649  for( int ii=0; ii<=i; ii++ ){
8650  filebase.push_back(fstring.at(ii));
8651  }
8652  break;
8653  }
8654  }
8655 
8656  //determine bounding box
8657  float boxmin = 100000;
8658  float boxmax = -100000;
8659 
8660  std::string current_material = "none";
8661 
8662  while( inputOBJ.good() ){
8663 
8664  inputOBJ>>line;
8665 
8666  // ------- COMMENTS --------- //
8667  if( strcmp("#",line.c_str())==0 ){
8668  getline(inputOBJ, line);
8669 
8670  // ------- MATERIAL LIBRARY ------- //
8671  }else if( strcmp("mtllib",line.c_str())==0 ){
8672  getline(inputOBJ, line);
8673  std::string material_file = deblank(line.c_str());
8674  material_textures = loadMTL( filebase, material_file.c_str() );
8675 
8676  // ------- VERTICES --------- //
8677  }else if( strcmp("v",line.c_str())==0 ){
8678  getline(inputOBJ, line);
8679  //parse vertices into points
8680  vec3 verts(string2vec3(line.c_str()));
8681  vertices.push_back(verts);
8682 
8683  if(verts.z < boxmin ){
8684  boxmin = verts.z;
8685  }
8686  if(verts.z > boxmax ){
8687  boxmax = verts.z;
8688  }
8689 
8690  // ------- TEXTURE COORDINATES --------- //
8691  }else if( strcmp("vt",line.c_str())==0 ){
8692  getline(inputOBJ, line);
8693  //parse coordinates into uv
8694  vec2 uv(string2vec2(line.c_str()));
8695  texture_uv.push_back(uv);
8696 
8697  // ------- MATERIALS --------- //
8698  }else if( strcmp("usemtl",line.c_str())==0 ){
8699  getline(inputOBJ, line);
8700  current_material = line;
8701 
8702  // ------- FACES --------- //
8703  }else if( strcmp("f",line.c_str())==0 ){
8704  getline(inputOBJ, line);
8705  //parse face vertices
8706  std::istringstream stream(line);
8707  std::string tmp, digit;
8708  std::vector<int> f, u;
8709  while( stream.good() ){
8710 
8711  stream >> tmp;
8712 
8713  digit="";
8714  int ic = 0;
8715  for( int i=0; i<tmp.size(); i++ ){
8716  if( isdigit(tmp[i]) ){
8717  digit.push_back( tmp[i] );
8718  ic++;
8719  }else{
8720  break;
8721  }
8722  }
8723 
8724  f.push_back( atoi(digit.c_str()) );
8725 
8726  digit="";
8727  for( int i=ic+1; i<tmp.size(); i++ ){
8728  if( isdigit(tmp[i]) ){
8729  digit.push_back( tmp[i] );
8730  }else{
8731  break;
8732  }
8733  }
8734 
8735  u.push_back( atoi(digit.c_str()) );
8736 
8737  }
8738  face_inds[current_material].push_back(f);
8739  texture_inds[current_material].push_back(u);
8740 
8741  // ------ OTHER STUFF --------- //
8742  }else{
8743  getline(inputOBJ, line);
8744  }
8745  }
8746 
8747  float scl = height/(boxmax-boxmin);
8748 
8749  for(std::map<std::string,std::vector<std::vector<int> > >::const_iterator iter = face_inds.begin(); iter != face_inds.end(); ++iter){
8750 
8751  std::string current_material = iter->first;
8752  std::string texture;
8753  if( material_textures.find(current_material)!=material_textures.end() ){
8754  texture = material_textures.at(current_material);
8755  }
8756 
8757  for( size_t i=0; i<face_inds.at(current_material).size(); i++ ){
8758 
8759  for( uint t=2; t<face_inds.at(current_material).at(i).size(); t++ ){
8760 
8761  RGBcolor color = default_color;
8762 
8763  vec3 v0 = vertices.at(face_inds.at(current_material).at(i).at(0)-1);
8764  vec3 v1 = vertices.at(face_inds.at(current_material).at(i).at(t-1)-1);
8765  vec3 v2 = vertices.at(face_inds.at(current_material).at(i).at(t)-1);
8766 
8767  if( (v0-v1).magnitude()==0 || (v0-v2).magnitude()==0 || (v1-v2).magnitude()==0 ){
8768  continue;
8769  }
8770 
8771  if( strcmp(upaxis,"YUP")==0 ){
8772  v0 = rotatePointAboutLine(v0,make_vec3(0,0,0),make_vec3(1,0,0),0.5*M_PI);
8773  v1 = rotatePointAboutLine(v1,make_vec3(0,0,0),make_vec3(1,0,0),0.5*M_PI);
8774  v2 = rotatePointAboutLine(v2,make_vec3(0,0,0),make_vec3(1,0,0),0.5*M_PI);
8775  }
8776 
8777  v0 = rotatePoint(v0,rotation);
8778  v1 = rotatePoint(v1,rotation);
8779  v2 = rotatePoint(v2,rotation);
8780 
8781  uint ID;
8782  if( !texture.empty() && texture_inds.at(current_material).at(i).size()>0 ){//has texture
8783 
8784  if( t<texture_inds.at(current_material).at(i).size() ){
8785  int iuv0 = texture_inds.at(current_material).at(i).at(0)-1;
8786  int iuv1 = texture_inds.at(current_material).at(i).at(t-1)-1;
8787  int iuv2 = texture_inds.at(current_material).at(i).at(t)-1;
8788 
8789  ID = addTriangle( origin+v0*scl, origin+v1*scl, origin+v2*scl, texture.c_str(), texture_uv.at(iuv0), texture_uv.at(iuv1), texture_uv.at(iuv2) );
8790 
8791  vec3 normal = getPrimitivePointer(ID)->getNormal();
8792 
8793  }
8794  }else{
8795  ID = addTriangle( origin+v0*scl, origin+v1*scl, origin+v2*scl, color );
8796  }
8797 
8798  UUID.push_back(ID);
8799 
8800  }
8801  }
8802  }
8803 
8804  std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
8805 
8806  return UUID;
8807 
8808 }
8809 
8810 std::map<std::string, std::string> Context::loadMTL( std::string filebase, std::string material_file ){
8811 
8812  std::ifstream inputMTL;
8813 
8814  //first look for mtl file using path given in obj file
8815  inputMTL.open(material_file.c_str());
8816  if( !inputMTL.is_open() ){
8817  //if that doesn't work, try looking in the same directry where obj file is located
8818  material_file = filebase+material_file;
8819  material_file.erase( remove( material_file.begin(), material_file.end(), ' ' ), material_file.end() );
8820  for( int i=material_file.size()-1; i>=0; i-- ){
8821  if( strcmp(&material_file.at(i),"l")==0 ){
8822  break;
8823  }else{
8824  material_file.erase(material_file.begin()+i);
8825  }
8826  }
8827  if( material_file.empty() ){
8828  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadMTL): Material file does not have correct file extension (.mtl)." << std::endl;
8829  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
8830  }
8831  inputMTL.open( material_file.c_str() );
8832  if( !inputMTL.is_open() ){
8833  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadOBJ): Material file " << material_file << " given in .obj file cannot be found." << std::endl;
8834  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
8835  }
8836  }
8837 
8838  std::map<std::string, std::string> material_textures;
8839 
8840  std::string line;
8841 
8842  inputMTL>>line;
8843 
8844  while( inputMTL.good() ){
8845 
8846  if( strcmp("#",line.c_str())==0 ){ //comments
8847  getline(inputMTL, line);
8848  inputMTL>>line;
8849  }else if( strcmp("newmtl",line.c_str())==0 ){ //material library
8850  getline(inputMTL, line);
8851  std::string material_name = line;
8852  material_textures[material_name] = "";
8853 
8854  //std::cout << "Found a material library: " << material_name << std::endl;
8855 
8856  while( strcmp("newmtl",line.c_str())!=0 && inputMTL.good() ){
8857 
8858  if( strcmp("map_a",line.c_str())==0 ){
8859  getline(inputMTL, line);
8860  }else if( strcmp("map_Ka",line.c_str())==0 ){
8861  getline(inputMTL, line);
8862  }else if( strcmp("map_Kd",line.c_str())==0 ){
8863  getline(inputMTL, line);
8864 
8865  std::istringstream stream(line);
8866  std::string tmp;
8867  while( stream.good() ){
8868  stream >> tmp;
8869  int e = tmp.size();
8870  if( (strncmp(&tmp[e-1],"g",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-2],"n",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-3],"p",1)==0 ) || (strncmp(&tmp[e-1],"g",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-2],"p",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-3],"j",1)==0 ) || (strncmp(&tmp[e-1],"g",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-2],"e",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-3],"p",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-4],"j",1)==0 ) ){
8871 
8872  std::string texturefile = tmp;
8873  std::ifstream tfile;
8874 
8875  //first look for texture file using path given in mtl file
8876  tfile.open(texturefile.c_str());
8877  if( !tfile.is_open() ){
8878  //if that doesn't work, try looking in the same directry where obj file is located
8879  tfile.close();
8880  texturefile = filebase+texturefile;
8881  tfile.open( texturefile.c_str() );
8882  if( !tfile.is_open() ){
8883  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadOBJ): Texture file " << texturefile << " given in .mtl file cannot be found." << std::endl;
8884  }
8885  }
8886  tfile.close();
8887 
8888  material_textures[material_name] = texturefile;
8889  }
8890  }
8891 
8892  }else if( strcmp("map_Ks",line.c_str())==0 ){
8893  getline(inputMTL, line);
8894  }else{
8895  getline(inputMTL, line);
8896  }
8897 
8898  inputMTL>>line;
8899  }
8900 
8901  }else{
8902  getline(inputMTL, line);
8903  inputMTL>>line;
8904  }
8905  }
8906 
8907  return material_textures;
8908 
8909 }
8910 
8911 void Context::writeOBJ( const char* filename ) const{
8912 
8913  //To-Do list for OBJ writer
8914  // - image files need to be copied to the location where the .obj file is being written otherwise they won't be found.
8915  // - should parse "filename" to check that extension is .obj, and remove .obj extension when appending .mtl for material file.
8916  // - it is possible to get duplicate materials. Should have more sophisticated checking for that.
8917  // - it would make more sense to write patches and alphamasks as quads rather than two triangles
8918 
8919  std::cout << "Writing OBJ file " << filename << "..." << std::flush;
8920 
8921  std::ofstream file;
8922 
8923  file.open(filename);
8924 
8925  file << "# Helios generated OBJ File" << std::endl;
8926  file << "# baileylab.ucdavis.edu/software/helios" << std::endl;
8927  file << "mtllib " << filename << ".mtl" << std::endl;
8928 
8929  std::vector<int3> faces;
8930  std::vector<vec3> verts;
8931  std::vector<vec2> uv;
8932  std::vector<int3> uv_inds;
8933 
8934  std::vector<std::string> textures;
8935  std::vector<RGBcolor> colors;
8936 
8937  size_t vertex_count = 1; //OBJ files start indices at 1
8938  size_t uv_count = 1;
8939 
8940  for( std::map<uint,Primitive*>::const_iterator iter = primitives.begin(); iter != primitives.end(); ++iter ){
8941 
8942  uint p = iter->first;
8943 
8944  std::vector<vec3> vertices = getPrimitivePointer(p)->getVertices();
8945  PrimitiveType type = getPrimitivePointer(p)->getType();
8946  RGBcolor C = getPrimitivePointer(p)->getColor();
8947 
8948  if( type==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
8949 
8950  faces.push_back( make_int3( vertex_count, vertex_count+1, vertex_count+2 ) );
8951  colors.push_back( C );
8952  for( int i=0; i<3; i++ ){
8953  verts.push_back( vertices.at(i) );
8954  vertex_count ++;
8955  }
8956 
8957  std::vector<vec2> uv_v = getTrianglePointer(p)->getTextureUV();
8958  if( getTrianglePointer(p)->hasTexture() ){
8959  uv_inds.push_back( make_int3(uv_count, uv_count+1, uv_count+2) );
8960  textures.push_back(getTrianglePointer(p)->getTextureFile());
8961  for( int i=0; i<3; i++ ){
8962  uv.push_back( uv_v.at(i) );
8963  uv_count ++;
8964  }
8965  }else{
8966  textures.push_back("");
8967  uv_inds.push_back( make_int3(-1,-1,-1) );
8968  }
8969 
8970  }else if( type==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
8971 
8972  faces.push_back( make_int3( vertex_count, vertex_count+1, vertex_count+2 ) );
8973  faces.push_back( make_int3( vertex_count, vertex_count+2, vertex_count+3 ) );
8974  colors.push_back( C );
8975  colors.push_back( C );
8976  for( int i=0; i<4; i++ ){
8977  verts.push_back( vertices.at(i) );
8978  vertex_count ++;
8979  }
8980 
8981  std::vector<vec2> uv_v;
8982  std::string texturefile;
8983  uv_v = getPatchPointer(p)->getTextureUV();
8984  texturefile = getPatchPointer(p)->getTextureFile();
8985 
8986  if( getPatchPointer(p)->hasTexture() ){
8987  textures.push_back(texturefile);
8988  textures.push_back(texturefile);
8989  uv_inds.push_back( make_int3(uv_count, uv_count+1, uv_count+2) );
8990  uv_inds.push_back( make_int3(uv_count, uv_count+2, uv_count+3) );
8991  if( uv_v.size()==0 ){//default (u,v)
8992  uv.push_back( make_vec2(0,1) );
8993  uv.push_back( make_vec2(1,1) );
8994  uv.push_back( make_vec2(1,0) );
8995  uv.push_back( make_vec2(0,0) );
8996  uv_count+=4;
8997  }else{//custom (u,v)
8998  for( int i=0; i<4; i++ ){
8999  uv.push_back( uv_v.at(i) );
9000  uv_count ++;
9001  }
9002  }
9003  }else{
9004  textures.push_back("");
9005  textures.push_back("");
9006  uv_inds.push_back( make_int3(-1,-1,-1) );
9007  uv_inds.push_back( make_int3(-1,-1,-1) );
9008  }
9009 
9010  }
9011 
9012  }
9013 
9014  assert( uv_inds.size()==faces.size() );
9015  assert( textures.size()==faces.size() );
9016  assert( colors.size()==faces.size() );
9017 
9018  for( size_t v=0; v<verts.size(); v++ ){
9019  file << "v " << verts.at(v).x << " " << verts.at(v).y << " " << verts.at(v).z << std::endl;
9020  }
9021 
9022  for( size_t v=0; v<uv.size(); v++ ){
9023  file << "vt " << uv.at(v).x << " " << uv.at(v).y << std::endl;
9024  }
9025 
9026  std::string current_texture = "";
9027  int material_count = 1;
9028 
9029  for( size_t f=0; f<faces.size(); f++ ){
9030 
9031  if( current_texture.compare(textures.at(f))!=0 ){
9032  current_texture = textures.at(f);
9033  file << "usemtl material" << material_count << std::endl;
9034  material_count ++;
9035  }
9036 
9037  //assert( faces.at(f).x <= verts.size() && faces.at(f).y <= verts.size() && faces.at(f).z <= verts.size() );
9038  if( uv_inds.at(f).x<0 ){
9039  file << "f " << faces.at(f).x << " " << faces.at(f).y << " " << faces.at(f).z << std::endl;
9040  }else{
9041  //assert( uv_inds.at(f).x <= uv.size() && uv_inds.at(f).y <= uv.size() && uv_inds.at(f).z <= uv.size() );
9042  file << "f " << faces.at(f).x << "/" << uv_inds.at(f).x << " " << faces.at(f).y << "/" << uv_inds.at(f).y << " " << faces.at(f).z << "/" << uv_inds.at(f).z << std::endl;
9043  }
9044  }
9045 
9046 
9047  file.close();
9048 
9049  char mtlfilename[50];
9050  sprintf(mtlfilename,"%s.mtl",filename);
9051  file.open(mtlfilename);
9052 
9053  current_texture = "";
9054  material_count = 1;
9055  RGBcolor current_color = make_RGBcolor(0.010203,0.349302,0.8372910);
9056 
9057  for( size_t f=0; f<faces.size(); f++ ){
9058 
9059  if( textures.at(f).compare("")!=0 ){ //has texture
9060  if( current_texture.compare(textures.at(f))!=0 ){ //new texture
9061  current_texture = textures.at(f);
9062  file << "newmtl material" << material_count << std::endl;
9063  file << "Ka 1.0 1.0 1.0" << std::endl;
9064  file << "Kd 1.0 1.0 1.0" << std::endl;
9065  file << "Ks 0.0 0.0 0.0" << std::endl;
9066  file << "illum 2 " << std::endl;
9067  file << "map_Ka " << current_texture << std::endl;
9068  file << "map_Kd " << current_texture << std::endl;
9069  file << "map_d " << current_texture << std::endl;
9070 
9071  material_count ++;
9072  }
9073  }else{ //does not have texture
9074  if( current_color.r!=colors.at(f).r && current_color.g!=colors.at(f).g && current_color.b!=colors.at(f).b ){ //new color
9075  current_texture = textures.at(f);
9076  current_color = colors.at(f);
9077  file << "newmtl material" << material_count << std::endl;
9078  file << "Ka " << current_color.r << " " << current_color.g << " " << current_color.b << std::endl;
9079  file << "Kd " << current_color.r << " " << current_color.g << " " << current_color.b << std::endl;
9080  file << "Ks 0.0 0.0 0.0" << std::endl;
9081  file << "illum 2 " << std::endl;
9082 
9083  material_count ++;
9084  }
9085  }
9086 
9087  }
9088 
9089  file.close();
9090 
9091 
9092  std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
9093 
9094 }
9095 
9096 Context::~Context(){
9097 
9098  for( std::map<uint,Primitive*>::iterator iter = primitives.begin(); iter != primitives.end(); ++iter ){
9099  Primitive* prim = getPrimitivePointer(iter->first);
9100  delete prim;
9101  }
9102 
9103  for( std::map<uint,CompoundObject*>::iterator iter = objects.begin(); iter != objects.end(); ++iter ){
9104  CompoundObject* obj = getObjectPointer(iter->first);
9105  delete obj;
9106  }
9107 
9108 }

helios::Primitive::listPrimitiveData
